story:
I bought the DJI Phantom 4 about two months ago to film Ultimate Frisbee from a unique perspective. In addition to Ultimate, I film different cities and locations that I travel to and visit. 

In early October I was flying the drone in the mountains of B.C. I lost signal and the drone crashed into the mountain side on return to the home base. Since I can not afford to buy a new drone myself I'm looking for help from the public to fund a new one.

Anything helps thank you very much.

Since I can not afford to buy a new drone myself I'm looking for help from the public to fund a new one.Anything helps thank you very much.

story:
Meet Birdie

 

The easiest way to take stunning aerial photography

Birdie is an aerodynamic accessory for action cams like the GoPro. Launch it into the air while your camera takes continuous photos or videos on the way up to maximum altitude, and on the way back down. 

At 5-10x cheaper than an entry level drone, you now have access to aerial photography like never-before. Birdie feels like a game of catch! The resulting photos are candid, capturing authentic in-the-moment expressions.

Are you ready to make it fly?

 

 

 

 

   

Birdie in action

Birdie is a beach success

 

Take Birdie along for the ride

 

Sunsets have never looked this good

 

Bring Birdie sightseeing

 

 

 
Your mountain hike just got higher

 

 

A typical day at the park

 

 

Birdie isn't afraid to get wet

 

 

Explore video possibilities

 

 

Lifestyle images

In the car

At the beach

 

Birdie Tips

 

 

How Birdie works

 

 

 

What's inside the package ?

Birdie includes the following components: one base with bumper, six arms joined together with a fabric strip and one fabric bag.

 

 

 

Note: There is no action camera included. You must have your own action camera to use Birdie.

 

 

Weight & Dimension 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Production timeline

The product development is complete. We are taking the next step to get funding. With your support, Birdie will be flying soon.

                          

                          

 

                           

 

Funding

After countless prototypes and rigorous testing, our final design is complete. We promise to deliver on time, and bring you an expertly crafted product that you will enjoy.

We’ve invested a lot of our savings in this project, but going into production isn’t cheap. Please help us to close the gap by requesting your Birdie now!

A large volume of Birdies are required in order to fulfill our first order with our factory.

 

Risks & Challenges

 

From day one we've been very focused on our commitment to deliver an excellent product on time. 

Manufacturing is a complex and demanding process. We've chosen a manufacturing partner with lot of experience in the field, who has guided us through the process of choosing the right molds and materials, selecting the right factories, etc.

Initially we wanted to launch our campaign by Q4 2015. We realized how important it was to be able to guarantee delivery dates and have our production chain set up before launching the campaign, so we took some time to get everything just right. We are confident in the quality of our components, as well as the speed and reliability of our manufacturers. 

Now we have everything set up for production. Our aim is to raise $15,000 for our first batch production. 

We will deliver on time. Guaranteed!

 

The future of Birdie

 
If our campaign is successfully funded and Birdiepics are being taken around the world, our focus will shift to building a second version of Birdie that will allow other cameras (including smartphones) to take aerial photography.
 

The team behind Birdie

 

We are a team of Uruguayan engineers who have been working in the tech industry for a long time now.

As early adopters, technology fans, and enthusiastic travellers, we've worked on projects ranging from drones, NFC and value added services and platforms for mobile operators around the globe.

Shiran Engineering, a well known design company, with more than 25 years of experience taking products to the market, has joined our team.

While we’ve come far for an incredibly small team with a minimal budget we’ve almost reached the finish line. We need your help in making this technology a reality.

 
 

 

 

 

FAQ

1)  What’s Birdie ?

Birdie is a gadget for your actioncam that let you take aerial pictures in a simple and fun way. When you take pictures with Birdie, it feels like playing a game, and you get amazing pictures from a new perspective.

2)  Does Birdie include a camera ?

No, Birdie does not include a camera. You will need your own action cam, its corresponding housing and thumb screw to insert it into Birdie and take pictures.

3)  May I use any camera with Birdie ?

GoPro HERO 3+ ,  4  and 5 are supported.

There are some other actioncams that have the same housing as the GoPro Hero 3+ or 4 that may work as well, but these have not been tested. We are planning to add support for other cameras and mobile phones in future development of the product.

4)  What will I receive exactly if I buy a Birdie ?

You will receive a carry bag, a Birdie base and six Birdie arms with a fabric that joins them together.

The base and arms are made of plastic, and the bag and arm’s fabric are made from parachute fabric.

The base includes a nut in order to support the GoPro case screw easily, and foam coverage in the bottom.

5)  Are there several colors available for Birdie?

Not currently. Birdie v1 has a white base and arms, and orange fabric and foam base coverage.

6)  Do I need to be strong to throw Birdie up?

Birdie is lightweight, and easy to throw. Throwing Birdie 2-3 metres in the air is enough. It’s designed for men, women and kids 10 and up.

7) Can I use Birdie anywhere?

Birdie works anywhere! It has been tested on the ground, sand, water, and snow. To get the best results we recommend using it outdoors on a sunny day. Lots of light helps to get better pictures.

 

Partnerships & Credits

 

We’d like to thank the Indiegogo community for your support! We couldn’t do this without you!

Special thank you to Eliana Martinez for her help with the initial idea, and Alberto Menestrina and Andres Roppa for the great contribution on the initial design.

Also a special thanks to 5D2 and Wasabi for being part of the project. Last but not least, a big thank you to our partner Shiran Engineering.

 

 

 

About Customs, Duties & Taxes

 

When ordering your Birdie, you're responsible for assuring the product can be lawfully imported to the destination country.

The recipient is the importer of record and must comply with all laws and regulations of the destination country. Orders shipped internationally may be subject to import taxes, customs duties and fees levied by the destination country. The recipient of an international shipment may be subject to such import taxes, customs duties and fees, which are levied once a shipment reaches the recipient's country. Additional charges for customs clearance must be fulfilled by the recipient; We have no control over these charges, nor can we predict what they may be.

Customs policies vary widely from country to country; you should contact your local customs office for more information. When customs clearance procedures are required, it can cause delays beyond our original delivery estimates.

Note:

Customs offices in some countries require the importer of record to provide a particular form of identification before releasing a shipment. You may be required to provide an identification number such as a Unique Identification Number, CPF, or Tax ID.

Countries that require an identification number include: Brazil, Chile, China, Ecuador, India, Israel, Peru, Qatar, South Africa, South Korea, Taiwan, and Turkey.

Please let us know your ID if you think it should be included in the shipping info.

story:
This Indiegogo is to help out a sweet, caring and dear friend – Robb “Crayz” Courtney. Recently Robb’s camera lens broke. This is the camera that he has used to capture many amazing images for sites such as keepingitnerdy.com and legionofnerds.com as well as for many of his friends. He has done this all at no charge because he has such a large heart and wants to help each and everyone one of us feel amazing about ourselves and wants us to have photos that we can cherish.

All of the money that is raised (minus the fees from this site and paypal) will go towards repairing the lens to Robb’s camera. He has given use so many great images, at no charge, that I believe that it is time that we all gave back to him. If Robb has ever taken your photo or has taken photos for your website please take the time to give back to him. By helping to replace his lens he will be able to continue to help us to create wonderful and beautiful photographs.

Robb is an amazing friend, a hard working single father, and has gone above and beyond for many of us. Please take a few moments to help him like he has helped so many of us.

You can help our be contributing to this fundraiser and by sharing it via all social media outlets.

If you do not know Robb or are not familiar with his work please see some examples at https://www.facebook.com/pages/CrAyZ-Photography or www.crayzfotos.com.

Thank you for helping me to help out one of my best friends in the world.

story:
Hello Friends, Colleagues, and Clients!

Last night when I got home I found that my house had been broken into and all of my photography gear and my laptop had been stolen. This is devastating to me, as without these tools I can't do my work. As many of you know, I am a doula and birth photographer. I capture the intimate and unique moments of when a couple become parents for the first time.

If you're unfamiliar with my work, please visit some of the websites that have featured me, including the Huffington Post, the Daily Mail, My Modern Met, and Disney.
 
And for more of my birth stories, have a browse through here:  www.jackiedivesbirthdoula.com/blog

My work has also been important in helping the birth movement. I have received emails from women all around the world who have told me that seeing my photos has helped them become confident and excited about their own birthing experiences.

My greatest passion is photography and I had worked so hard to acquire the equipment I need to work in this field.

I learned a tough lesson about insuring my gear, and will never again go without doing this. When you're first starting out, like I am, insurance seems like a huge expense, and I naively let it slide.

I would appreciate any help to get myself back on my feet and photographing families again. Thanks so much! 

The above video is just there to give you an idea about what I do and why I do it :)

story:
Spark is the most versatile camera remote on the market. With three different modes of control, Spark was built to adapt to whatever situation you are shooting in. Whether you're taking a fun group photo, capturing a long exposure of the stars, or settling down and setting up a time lapse, Spark gives you instant control. With your phone or without it.

 

 

 

Spark combines the speed of infrared triggering, with the reliability of a traditional wired trigger, and the power and feature set of smartphone app control.

 

 

 

 

 

Spark can communicate with your camera's infrared sensor to command it to take a photo every time you press Spark’s button. This allows for easy group photos and selfies, without having to try to outrun your camera’s built-in timer.

 

If you've dreamed of capturing beautiful, sharp images in low light at night, Spark is made for you. The ability to trigger your camera without touching it allows for a perfectly still exposure, meaning even long shutter speeds come out crisp. So whether you are traveling to foreign landscapes, or trying to catch a family photo in fading light, you will be amazed at the photos you can take with Spark.

 

Many photographers know the experience of coming back from a trip or a family gathering only to have lots of photos of friends and family, and none of themselves. With Spark, you can control your camera from wherever you are standing and get great photos of yourself as well.

Spark connects to your camera through the external trigger port and is compatible with hundreds of DSLR's, mirrorless cameras, and even some point and shoots.

Compatible brands include Canon, Nikon, Sony, Olympus, Panasonic, Fujifilm, Pentax, Contax, Samsung, Hasselblad, Sigma, Kodak, and Konica Minolta. To see an exact list of camera models please see the FAQ on Camera Compatibility. 

 

Spark's long exposure feature allows you to capture scenes the human eye cannot see and gives photographers a huge amount of creative control. With the ability to trigger manual Bulb photos like a traditional wired trigger and do timed long exposures through the app you can fine tune your star trails shot and have the perfect timing while light painting.

 

  

 

Five years ago, we launched our first product, a motion time lapse device called Radian. We've been making time lapse and camera control gear ever since, and Spark is our most refined product yet. We started with everything we've learned over the years about app enabled camera control, and added phone-less time lapse programming for ultra quick setup. Just set your interval between photos by pressing and holding Spark's button, and Spark will take enough photos to create 10 seconds of timelapse footage.  

 

 

The free Spark Camera Control app instantly connects to Spark over Bluetooth Low Energy, and gives you access to all of Spark's advanced features. Set up a Bulb ramping timelapse, take a minute long exposure of the stars, or just set up a quick photobooth sequence of you and your friends - all from your phone. The App will be free and available for both iOS and Android as soon as Spark is ready to ship. 

 

Spark is designed to go where you go, including your biggest adventures. Ultra lightweight and super low profile, Spark can travel on your camera or in a small pocket. Spark's portability ensures that you can have it with you anytime you have your camera.

 

Spark will last for over 2,000 hours of use and automatically go to sleep when you’re not using it. To wake Spark up, simply press the button. And if the battery does run out, pop open the case and replace it with a new coin battery (the same standard one that watches use).

 

Sometimes it takes more than one camera to get the shot. With Spark you can trigger up to three synchronized cameras at once, so you can get multiple angles of the same moment with one press of the button.

Spark Demo Video

 

 

 

 

When we first started Alpine Labs, we were inspired to make better photography tools for motion time lapse so that we could capture the beauty of Yosemite. We launched our first product, Radian, in 2012. Since then we've released, Michron, Radian 2, and Pulse, all through the crowdfunding community. Over the years we started tinkering with remote camera control and exploring what that allows you to capture with your camera. 

Last year we shipped Pulse, the most powerful way to control your camera from your phone. Now we are back to introduce Spark.

Inspired by what we had done with Pulse and excited about the possibilities of infrared triggering and Bluetooth 4, we started working on a product that combined the power of app control with speed of infrared triggering. We learned from our backers and looked into how we could design something that totally changed expectations on battery life and versatility.

Thanks to our team's experience and our work with Pulse, the electronics prototypes matured quickly. Size is a big challenge, so fitting Spark electronics into the form factor we designed took time and some PCB (printed circuit board) trickery. Overall we are excited to have such refined prototypes and to already be working on DFM (design for manufacturing)

 

 

In 2012, Alpine Labs was born through crowdfunding. Fueled by a passion for time lapse we launched Radian, a compact device that allowed you to add motion to your shots and control it from your phone. Five years and four products later, we are back to launch Spark. We love being a part of this community. The support of backers like you has allowed us to bring our ideas to life and make some of the best photography gear on the market. We hope you’ll join us in the next step of the journey.

Press Kit

story:
My Passion

I'm a freelancer, blogger and amateur photographer. It is my dream to blog using pictures and share it to the world. I'm planning to learn more about photography by researching and self study the concepts of it.



What I Need

So far I'm doing my blogs using my computer in the office and my phone as a camera and edit the pictures using a website.

I need a decent laptop where I can use for blogging and a digital camera to jump start learning in photography. I can use it wherever I travel few cities around the world and join few amateur photography contests.

Make A Difference

With your support, I can fulfill my dreams and achieved my goal in learning photography.

Please Help

Please help me with the resources I need. Support, donate and share my post. I will appreciate your help in my venture.

I'm a freelancer, blogger and amateur photographer. It is my dream to blog using pictures and share it to the world. I'm planning to learn more about photography by researching and self study the concepts of it. What I Need
So far I'm doing my blogs using my computer in the office and my phone as a camera and edit the pictures using a website. I need a decent laptop where I can use for blogging and a digital camera to jump start learning in photography. I can use it wherever I travel few cities around the world and join few amateur photography contests.Make A Difference
With your support, I can fulfill my dreams and achieved my goal in learning photography. Please Help
Please help me with the resources I need. Support, donate and share my post. I will appreciate your help in my venture.

story:
My name is Adrian González, Undocumented and currently living in Anaheim, CA. I first began documenting the immigrant youth movement, through photography, during the summer of 2010 at a hunger strike in Los Angeles using a smart phone. As the months passed, I attended many events, protests, actions meetings where I continued to photograph the struggle to change policy. I am a strong believer that we must make our own marks. Through my phone, I was able to capture moments in our history that made it possible to change the conversations happening around those living in the United States without "papers". My photos were used in many publications and presentations. Here is a link to my flickr account http://bit.ly/19LdLtg

In February of 2011, I was able to buy my first Digital SLR Camera. After purchasing my Nikon D3100, I began to take a step back during our demonstrations where I was no longer participating in the chants but rather experience it on a different level. I was now able to strategically look for a variety of angles to capture beautiful moments. For those of you who have seen me at a demonstration, you know that one can easily lose sight of me because if I'm not on the floor I'm on top of a tree. My camera and I have been from Northern California to San Diego, along the San Ysidro port of entry, to Florida, Texas, Colorado documenting our movement.

During the summer of last year, I was able to expand my subject matter and I began to take photos at birthday parties and even weddings. Although, as of now, It's not a career of mine to document a (life) celebration, I do take any opportunity I can to make an income. However, it's not very often that I am able to do so.

This is where you all come in to play. Because I want to be able to go further with my photography to make some sort of career with it, I am asking for some assistance. I would like to upgrade my current Nikon D3100 to a Nikon D600. The D600 will allow me to give better quality images for the next Birthday celebration, wedding or family gathering. I currently don't have the funds to purchase it all by myself. The only job I have now is babysitting twice a week. 

I have always been willing to donate my photos to be used for class presentations, printed and online articles, to flyers and fundraisers. Whether I'm able to upgrade or not, I will continue to do donate my time and photos for the movement. However, if I am able to upgrade I can provide better quality images during photo gigs and be more confident in looking for those paying jobs than wait for them to come to me.

If you're unable to help financially, please share with those you who may be able to contribute.

Thank you very much.

story:
Click HERE to check out the new campaign

Snap - The Smallest 4K Action Camera

 

Videos Shared by Mokacam Users

Diving Test by REC on YouTube, no video & audio adjustments

 

Test Video by 布拉格世界 on YouTube

By FLX bike

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Join the Design Competition to win the Free Mokacam

https://www.myminifactory.com/competition/submi...

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 
 

 

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

 

 

Q: Are you offering a warranty on Mokacam?
A: Yes, we are offering a 1 year warranty. Warranty is only for exchange of a defective unit. No returns for refund.

Q: What are all the supporting resolutions and fps (frames per second)?
A: 4K@25fps, 1080p@60fps/30fps, 720p@120fps/60fps, VGA@240fps.

Q: Are there any zooming functions?
A: Yes, through the App, you will be able to control the zoom on the camera while recording.

Q: Are there any slow motion capabities?
A: Yes, slow motion is available when recording at the higher fps. For example: 60fps@1080p, 120fps@720p.

Q: Can you take time lapse videos?
A: Yes, you can set the camera to time lapse mode and choose the time lap between 3s/5s/10s/30s/1m/3m through the App.

Q: Will there be an Android App?
A: Yes, there is an Android and iOS App.

Q: How do you know how much power is left in the batteries?
A: You can see the battery status on the add-on screen, or in the App.

Q: How do you know how much memory is remaining?
A: You can see the remaining storage status on the add-on screen, or in the App.

Q: What is the sensitivity in low-light?
A: The aperture is F2.8, and the ISO is between 100-6400.

Q: Will Mokacam come with the adapter mount to be compatible with GoPro mounts?
A: Yes, every Mokacam will include the adapter for GoPro mounts.

Q: What is the maximum supported Micro SD card storage?
A: 64 GB.

Q: Is the add-on screen a touch screen?
A: The add-on screen is not a touch screen. It is operated through 4 buttons at the top of the add-on screen.

Q: How strong is the rear magnet?
A: There is only a single magnet on the back of Mokacam. It is very strong and will stick even when your car is moving fast on a bumpy road. It takes some strength to remove Mokacam from a metal surface.

 

Q: Does Mokacam come with a memory card?
A: No, we are not including a memory card with your order.

Q: What's the video recording duration for 1080P 60FPS and 64 Gig of memory?
A: At 60FPS, 64 Gigs will record 6 hours of footage. At 30FPS, 64 Gigs will record 12 hours.

Q: What is the zoom range?
A: The zoom range is 15cm - 400cm

Q: Will a charging cable come with Mokacam?
A: Yes, each package will include a Micro USB for charging.

Q: Will it have looped recording capability
A: Yes, you can change the settings in the screen module

Q: What are the ratings for the waterproof case?
A: 200 feet/60 meters with waterproof case, could work with or without the back battery

 

Q: How many hours will Mokacam last if only used for taking pictures?
A: There are many factors and conditions to calculate this, but generally the battery life should last you for more than 1 day.

Q: Can Mokacam connect to a microphone through a 3.5mm mic adapter?
A: Mokacam does not have a 3.5mm port because we are trying to keep the camera as small as possible.

Q: Can you stream live video using Mokacam?
A: Yes, you can stream live vide using the application. Unfortunately Mokacam does not support streaming through an IP.

Q: Can Mokacam handle extreme temperatures?
A: Yes, Mokacam has been tested to work at -20C degrees.

Q: Is Mokacam compatible with a standard tripod?
A: Yes, the base of Mokacam includes a standard 1/4 inch screw slot.

 

Q: Can Mokacam be controlled by Lecia S2's remote-control unit?
A: Mokacam can only be controlled with the wireless Mokacam remote control

Q: How does Mokacam remove the barrel distortion?
A: The wide-angle lens captures everything in full 4K with barrel distortion. Mokacam removes the distortion from the original images through software.

Q: How do you control the white balance, or is this automatic?
A: Mokacam has several modes for different white balances, there is also a mode for automatic white balance as well.

Q: Can Mokacam use Fog-Free inserts commonly used in other action cams?
A: Yes, there will be room inside the waterproof casing to place Fog-Free inserts

Q: How long will it take to completely charge the internal camera battery?
A: This depends on the type of charger you are using, but generally it will take 2 hours.

Q: How long will it take to completely charge the add-on battery and rotatable screen module?
A: This depends on the type of charger you are using, but generally it will take 2 hours.

 

 

Q: Is there an HDR mode?
A: No, Mokacam does not have an HDR mode.

Q: Will this camera shoot 25 and 50fps?
A: Currently only the listed FPS settings are supported by Mokacam, FPS can be adjusted through a video editing software.

Q: What is the Battery Life (estimated time) of Mokacam?
A: 1080P @ 30fps is estimated at 1h 30m, 4K @ 15fps is estimated at 50m

Q: Do you have a Photo Burst mode?
A: Yes, Mokacam provides Photo Burst for 3/5/10 per second

Q: Is there a way to reverse the picture if the camera is upside down?
A: Yes, there will be a mode for reversing the picture

 

Q: What is the focal length for Mokacam?
A: Focal length of Mokacam is 35mm.

Q: What is the WIFI range?
A: WIFI range is about 10m - 20m.

 

Q: Does Mokacam have external sync capabilities (genlock)?
A: Not currently, but we are working on different applications, such as stereoscopic imaging, multicam, VR (Virtual Reality)

 

Q: What is the Dynamic range of Mokacam?
A: The dynamic range is from 100 to 6400 *same as GoPro Hero 4

Q: If you set a setting using the screen attachment, can you remove the screen and keep the settings on Mokacam?
A: Yes, the setting won't change after you remove the screen.

Q: So, will it work with a USB to 3.5mm mic adapter for go pro to connect an external mic?
A: We are working on this part, but GoPro adaptor need to be confirmed

 

Q: Can the battery pack be attached when the waterproof casing is on?
A: We will provide 2 optional back cap for the waterproof case, one should work with battery pack and the other should work without.

Q: Can we find the app on the android and iOS stores? And if so, what is it called?
A: There is a test version called iSharecam which provides all the operation of Mokacam, but we are working on the formal version, which provides much more functions.

Q: You mention on the page that the memory card that is supported if Micro SD, would this be Micro SDXC or Micro SDHC?
A: . Micro SDXC or SDHC also works

Q: Is the focus automatic? Or is that done also through the screen?
A: Focus is automatic.

 

Q: Will the iOS app allow bulk transfer of pics to iPad via 802.11?
A: Yes, we are working to provide this feature in the Mokacam app.

Q: Are the time lapse frames viewable as both individual pics and also as video?
A: You can set it to picture or video mode through the Mokacam app.

Q: Will the API available?
A: It is currently not available.

Q: What justified your limitation to 15 fps?
A: This is a limitation from the Image Processing Solution.

Q: how would you recommend attaching this to a drone?
A: We are working on partners to provide mounts to drones.

Q: Does the Mokacam have an IR filter?
A: Currently we are still working on an IR filter which will be separate and removable.

Q: How save is it to place that camera near a laptop or computer without the magnet risking interference/erasing of possible data on your laptop/pc's hard disks?!
A: The magnet is strong but quite small, there is very little risk regarding interference/erasing of possible data on your laptop.

Q: With such a strong magnet, as you claim, will this pose problems to take the camera with you on board of an airplane when travelling?
A: The magnet is strong but quite small, so there will be no problem taking it on board.

 

Q: Can you tell me what you expect the battery life to be when performing a time-lapse photo sequence (say 1 frame every 10s)?
A: Since the camera will be kept at power on mode, the battery life will be about 3 hours. So we suggest you to connect the camera with back battery and screen module, then the battery life would be extended up to 9 hours.

Q: Mokacam can charge on 100-220 volts right?
A: The Mokacam should not be charged on 100-220 volt, it should be charged by a Micro-USB cable, which means it depends on the USB adapter in your region.

Q: Is it possible to use a Bluetooth remote?
A: Mokacam provides remote control via 2.4G, which is more stable than Bluetooth.

Q: May I know if the Mokacam is also compatible with GoPro remotes?
A: No, it cannot. You can only use the remote provided with Mokacam.

Q: Do you think the camera can be used in drone FPV flying?
A: Yes, the camera can be connected to the FPV transmission device through a special Micro-USB cable.

Q: Will it have a similar feature to GoPro ProTune or support a raw format
A: Unfortunately no, we are only providing JPG format only.

Q: What is also the thickness of the attachable battery?
A: The attachable battery module is 12mm in thickness.

Q: What is the bitrate of the camera for videos?
A: H.264 codec.

Q: Can you adjust the aperture and shutter speed?
A: No, these will adjust automatically.

 

Q: Will the USB port will be able to stream video for FPV?
A: Yes.

Q: Will Mokacam support underwater filters for scuba diving?
A: We've designed Mokacam to support a lens cap - so eventually we will develop additional functions or accessories such as a filter in the near future.

Q: How much time it will last if shooting 1080p at 60fps?
A: The time will be 1h 20m.

Q: Does the cam only record in NTSC or can one switch to PAL too?
A: You can switch this setting using the screen module.

 

Q: Do you have provision for firmware update in case of a buggy first release?
A: We are focusing on the tooling and mass production of first batch, so it’s a bit early for us to talk about firmware update. But we will release the firmware with instructions when it is necessary.

Q: What is the depth of field of the Mokacam lens?
A: The aperture is F 2.8 and the focus is 35mm equivalent.

Q: Is there any reason why 1 second time lapse was not added as that would be really useful.
A: We will evaluate 1s time lapse during the tooling and will release update if it is added.

Q: Can you please make the pink color more Pink?
A: Yes, we will look into increasing the pink color!

Q: I was wondering why the WG version is being offered, and not the new WGS version.
A: The WGS was designed for GoPro Session which is much smaller (but not 4K), so it will limit the movement for Mokacam.

Q: Is this gimbal any weather proof for slight rain and/or other moisty circumstances?
A: This gimbal is not weather proof.

 

Risks and challenges

While we're doing a lot of the work ourselves, obviously we have to rely on others (manufacture, shipping) to provide their end. We're confident that these parts will be no problem, as we're talking to established companies here. We will also go to China ourselves to oversee production, and Shuo has worked with the factory we wish to use before, so communication between us and the factory will not be an issue. But talking to other people who have run Indiegogo, there is always something that comes up, be it customs, shipping, the manufacturing not being up to scratch or any other of the many things that can delay the process. We will do our best, and hope to deliver on time, and whatever happens we will keep you updated every step along the way.

 

We will definitely deliver a great product, and hope to do so on time!

 

Thanks from the whole team :)

 

Legal Disclaimer

 

"Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed."

story:
We have completely sold out our second batch of pre-orders. We are now taking pre-orders for the third batch. Delivery is expected in April 2018. 

Pre-Order price available for a limited time only. 

Happy Stargazing! 

 

Meet Tiny1

 

 

 

The world’s first astrophotography camera made to be 

small, smart and sociable


Captured with Tiny1 Prototype

 

 

       

"Tiny1 is Hubble in your hands"

Dr. Bidushi Bhattacharya, Ex-NASA/JPL Scientist

 

 

 

       

 

“TinyMOS brings astrophotography to the masses”

CNBC

As featured on

 

TinyMOS Story
 
TinyMOS began in 2014. I was a professional photographer and on a stargazing trip. I saw a sky full of stars - the Milky Way stretched horizon to horizon. Armed with a Nikon D4 DSLR and years of photography knowledge, I could not capture the sights before me.
 
We built the Tiny1 so that now, you can.
 
Tiny1 is the world's smallest, smartest and most social astronomy camera. It helps you plan, capture and share your star filled sky experience - all from the palm of your hands. Here's a gallery of what we have captured, over 2 years of development.
 
Back us, to put the wonders of the night sky and exploration in the hands of everyone.
 

- Grey Tan, Founder and CEO, TinyMOS (Image Yosemite, California 2015)

 
CAPTURED WITH THE TINY1
 
Series of time lapses - Milky Way, ISS transit, Solar eclipse, Moon

 

 

 

Sun captured in H-Alpha Narrowband

 

PRODUCT COMPARISON
Traditional Astrophotography Gear

 

1,500USD to 5,000USD and up

5kg-10kg and up

Complex multi-brand setup for hardware and software
 

Now you only need

Tiny1
(scale compared)

Tiny1
(quarter for scale)

 

 

 

 

Less than 500USD for all

Approximately 700g for everything

Unified control on camera and smart phone

 

Now everyone can take pictures of the stars without worrying about expensive equipment and expert knowledge. The Tiny1 makes astrophotography a point-and-shoot experience with these unique features.

 

 

 

Smart
Top-of-the-line tech and instant image processing  


Sociable
Pairs with your smartphone and compatible with any lens in the market

Small

113mm x 69mm x 22mm of astrophotography genius
 

 

 

 

 
 

  

Interactive Star Map

Tiny1 helps you plan your astronomy imaging. The Interactive Star Map is a unique interface to easily locate and shoot celestial objects.

It shows you the stars and constellations in real time and has a search function built in to guide you.

Find out for yourself. Download the TinyMOS Demo app here.

 

TinyMOS Universe feature! We'll put your name beside a star when you back us. Only on Indiegogo!

Interactive star map uses augmented reality to tell you what you see in real time.
 
**Backers who contribute more than $20 will get their name beside a star in a special version of the star map**

Built-in presets help you to easily capture a variety of celestial objects
 
 

  

Mobile App

Pair your Tiny1 with your smartphone to easily share pictures over WiFi

Control your Tiny1 over WiFi to reduce camera shake.

 

 

 

 

 

 

  
Lens Adapter
Any lens in the market can be attached to the Tiny1 with ease, including DSLR, Mirrorless and even telescopes!
 
A 200mm telephoto transforms into a 1400mm equivalent telescope with the Tiny1 attached. Perfect for viewing the Moon.
 
A small telescope now gives you the view of Saturn and its rings!

Mount your DSLR lenses and telescopes on the Tiny1 with adapters
 

 

 

      
Community Building
Share directly to social media, organise and attend star parties.

 

 





CTO Lih Wei guides us through Tiny1's technical capabilities.

(Trust him, he's an engineer)

How we made the Tiny1 tiny and powerful

 

 

  

Back Illuminated Sensor

Two times better than front illuminated sensors at converting light to signal. Higher fidelity images at the pixel level.

 

      

Advance Noise Reduction

Patent pending built-in noise reduction algorithm that self calibrates and reduces noise effectively.

     

Aluminium Mono Body

Made of aircraft grade aluminium; the strong and durable body also acts as a heat sink to reduce thermal noise.

 

 

Hear what people have to say about TinyMOS at TechCrunch Startup Battlefield

 

 

               


 

 

The TinyMOS Team

 

Supported by

 

 

Development Partner

 

 

FAQs

Can you use it in the day?

Yes. We have a day mode switch which turns on the IR cut filter and the colours comes out natural.

Why use a small sensor?

Small sensor has several benefits.

  1. Smaller system size. A smaller sensor allows you to use a smaller lens and get more zoomed in.

  2. Better technology. New technologies are proven on small sensors first. That’s why each new generation of small sensor cameras improve more than each new generation of large sensor cameras.

Why only 4MP?

TLDR: Pixel level perfection, crisp and sharp photos.

General consumer cameras advertise their cameras by their pixel count. It is easy to understand by customers and easy to market. However, the resolution only tells a small part of the story on how good a camera is.

More megapixels mean bigger enlargements. However, if you zoom into the photo captured by your 16MP smartphone, you will realize that you are just zooming into noise. There is no real information and it is a waste of storage.

You will get poorer performance in low light, as the gaps between pixels are not light sensitive. The losses means that the high megapixel sensors collects less light.

Can it shoot things other than astronomy stuff?

Yes. Tiny1 is designed for travel. Just switch off the astronomy mode, it will switch on the IR cut filter and plants stay green and humans stop glowing.

Can I do time lapse?

Yes. The original concept was a time lapse camera only; it will have a well featured time lapse mode built in.

Will it work in winter?

Depends on where you are. It’s designed for temperatures of -10 to 55 degree Celsius.

Can it shoot videos?

Yes. It even has audio in for external microphone and audio out for live monitoring. Do remember that space has no sound. We keep forgetting ;)

Are your photos edited?

Yes, but the enhancements are built into the camera. You can disable them if you like.

Isn’t the point to star system already on the Play Store on Android?

Yes, and no. The software is a derivative of Google’s API. We want to avoid reinventing the wheel. However, the implementation on a camera is novel. The sensors we use are higher specification than the even flagship phones. Further software enhancements will improve accuracy even further.

The lens has coma

Yes, the camera’s kit lens has coma. The lens is optimised for large aperture and coma is unfortunately, a common trade-off.

We are looking into aspherical optics to solve that, they will be released after the crowdfunding campaign has been delivered.

Does it shoot RAW?

Yes, it shoots a variety of RAW.  .DNG and .RAW. We recommend DNG as it is lossless but compressed. .RAW is very troublesome to retrieve for minimal benefits. We may support .FITS in the future as an update.

story: Nowadays I am studying an MA in Documentary Photography and Photojournalism at London College of Communication. Last October 26th someone stole my camera inside the university. I did a report to the police and we are trying to find who it was but I don’t have much hope in getting my camera back. For that reason I decided to start a crowd founding campaign. The idea for buying a new camera is to sell prints and offer photo session in and outside the studio. I am nothing without my camera, as its my tool of work.

story:
Introducing Beoncam -- the world’s first removable 360-degree 5MP panoramic camera housed in an elegant smartwatch. Beoncam is built with an “always on,” single-touch system that is paired with a long-lasting rechargeable battery, ensuring you can capture that moment with just the touch of a button.

Beoncam is your "always on" smart camera companion that you can wear on your wrist, hook onto your bike or attach to a tripod. Take 360-degree photos and videos and even live stream video at a moment's notice.  

 

We live in a world full of wonder. From a baby’s first steps to love at first sight. We want you to be able to experience them, soak them up and capture them without having to stop everything to grab your camera. Beoncam is your solution to bulky, clumsy and slow cameras. It’s wearable, lightweight, compact and even splash proof. It’s also removable and attachable to different surfaces so it fits your lifestyle and creativity.

No longer settle for choosing between a selfie or the view in front of you. With Beoncam, you can capture you and the world around you in mere seconds in 360-degree HD.  It also allows you to view live streaming via the Beoncam companion app - you can even share it in a snap with your friends because moments that matter are even better when shared.

Photography is about visual storytelling. The pictures I take with a camera represent the imagination I want to create with reality. Taking an image and freezing a moment in time reveals how precious life truly is. We live in a fast-paced world so life is too short to miss a moment that matters.

My love for photography and being able to preserve the moments is the reason for Beoncam’s birth and existence. It is a labor of love that spanned some 18 months and one made possible by passion, purpose & persistence.

Chee Teck Lee

Founder

Beoncam is life changing, it allows you to be prepared for that special moment with the touch of the wrist. What could adding Beoncam into your life look like?

Your wife looks amazing in the sunset, but you left your camera in the car.

Before: Fumble around in your bag to find the camera. By the time you find it and get it powered on and ready to go, the sun has already gone down.

Beoncam: Immediately take an amazing picture of her and enjoy the rest of the sunset with your arm around her.

Your son takes his first steps. Your camera is in your purse and you don’t want to leave him mid-stride.

Before: Miss capturing his first steps because you want to be there in case he falls and your camera is too far away.

Beoncam: Instantly capture both your son's reaction and yours and instantly share it with your husband, parents, in-laws and friends!

You are hosting a birthday party for your grandmother's 80th birthday and as you come out with the cake candles lit, everyone begins singing and grandma has a huge grin on her face.

Before: Your hands are full, so you really hope someone else at the party has their camera or phone out taking video. Spend time after the party trying to figure out if anyone has.

Beoncam: You get a 360-degree video of not only grandma, but all of the other teary-eyed guests singing. You send it out to all of the party guests for a party momento no-one will forget!

We have designed and created some of our own accessories to fit with Beoncam that will allow you to use it anywhere with ease. We also created a cradle with a base adapter mount which is compatible with most GoPro accessories. Here is a list of all the accessories that comes with Beoncam:

  1. Wrist Strap + Strap Ring – You can wear Beoncam on your wrist and wear it with you anywhere.
  2. Cradle with Tripod Adapter Mount – For Charging Beoncam and to mount Beoncam onto other accessories with the Screw Adapter Mount Head (e.g. Tripod and GoPro compatible accessories).
  3. Bicycle handlebar ring – You can place Beoncam on the bicycle handlebar to capture yourself and the scenery around you.
  4. Helmet clip – You can clip Beoncam in-front or behind on your helmet to capture everything around you.
  5. Flat clip – With the flat clip, you can clip Beoncam on your bag or on your pocket or you can wear it like a pendent (string will be provided).
  6. USB cable.
  7. Lens cloth.
  8. Carry pouch.
  9. Quick user guide.
  10. One Year Warranty.

 

Waterproof Casing for Beoncam

Since Beoncam is only splash proof, we have designed a waterproof casing specifically for the camera so you can use it while in the pool or any water activities up to a depth of 20 feet (6 meters). The waterproof casing can be purchased for $19 and you can save up to 40% of its retail price. Actual product may vary from the image shown.

The Beoncam app allows you to remotely control the camera to capture and view images/videos, as well as share your moments with family and friends. We have created both iOS and Android versions of the app so everyone can use Beoncam.

  • Beoncam is connected to all of your loved ones near and far through its companion app for iOS and Android.
     
  • Connect Beoncam to your iOS or Android device through Bluetooth for controlling and Wi-Fi (hotspot) to view live preview and downloading images/videos from Beoncam to the app.
  • Remotely control Beoncam’s 360-degree camera.
  • Immediately view capture images and video.
     
  • Instantly share videos and pictures with friends and family through Facebook, Whatsapp and YouTube.
     
  • Dress up any shot or video with image enhancing filters.

Beoncam is designed to work seamlessly with the mobile app. First, you will have to pair Beoncam with the app via Bluetooth and Wi-Fi (which is the hotspot). Once paired, you can easily control Beoncam to do live previewing, capturing of image and recording of video.

Other than that, you can also download the photos and videos from the camera onto the app (using your smartphone as a hotspot) and the photos and videos will be stored on the app for sharing on your social media anytime you want.

Check out a sample video taken using our prototype (Note: the actual production units will have better resolution):

 

The app also allows you to view the image and video in different views such as in Raw, Equirectangular, Spherical and Wide angle format.

USING THE BEONCAM APP:

Save Image / Video from App to Gallery

To store the Image / Video onto your smartphone gallery, select the Image / Video on the ‘SAVED TO APP’ Tab and click the download button. The Image / Video you have selected will be downloaded onto your Gallery for viewing them without using the Beoncam’s app. 

 

Sharing Image / Video from Beoncam’s App to Social Media

To share Image / Video to your social media account (E.g Facebook, Whatsapp, YouTube), select the Image / Video and click the upload button and select and share the moments to your family and friends.

 

Download Image / Video from Beoncam itself to App

Go to Album and select Beoncam Tab, click on the Image / Video and it will automatically download onto your app folder (Pictures\BEONCAM) so that you will have a copy of the Image / Video on your smartphone. 

Since the idea was born back in 2015, we have been busy working on building Beoncam to make it the best wearable camera ever. Our in-house optics expert has spent six months in designing the lens with several integrations along with extensive testing. Beoncam features seven glass lens designed to optimized the performance.

The core principles that Beoncam is designed around are convenience, ease of use and a long stand-by time for the user. We have carefully selected a dedicated electronic system (SoC) which is customized for this wearable product to be the "heart" of Beoncam’s system. With it’s ultra low power consumption and sophisticated power management, Beoncam is able to achieve almost a week of stand-by time, three hours of continuous recording time, wireless live preview and many other features.

   


Beoncam is a 360° + 190° FOV wearable panoramic camera. The super wide-angle lens together with an efficient CMOS Sensor and the low power consumption SoC enable the camera to produce JPEG image and H.264 HD Video instantly. Beoncam is simple to use with only 3 buttons - On/Off, Image Capture and Video Recording. Image/video is stored into the 8GB built-in memory provided in the camera.

The system has a "Live Preview" feature that allows downloading of images/videos via a Wi-Fi hotspot,all simply by using the free Beoncam mobile app (iOS and Android).

Beoncam has a highly optimized PMU which enables long standby time (four days) and long video recording capability of three hours per charge with the embedded Li-Ion polymer cell.

We have the working prototype ready so with the funds we raise from the campaign, we will use the majority of the funds to go into production and set-up quality control with testing to ensure every Beoncam is made perfectly. In addition, we will also use part of the funding to enhance photo and video post processing on the app along with other improvements to make your experience even better.

Spacemap was founded two years ago in Singapore by our Founder Chee Teck Lee, a veteran in optics design and manufacturing. Keen to build a product that enables users to capture and share moments that are valuable to them, he embarked on the journey to develop Beoncam.

Over the past 2 years, Spacemap has expanded to form a team of highly motivated and passionate individuals with expertise in optics, electronics, app software and business development. Spacemap is committed to develop Beoncam and other innovation products.

How much does Beoncam weigh?

55g.

What is the wristband made of?

Thermoplastic elastomer (TPE) Material.

What is the size of Beoncam?

46.6mm diameter x 25mm.

What colors does it come in?
Space grey. 

What accessories does it come with?

Wrist Strap + Strap Ring, Cradle, Bicycle Handlebar Ring, Helmet Clip, Flat Clip, Micro USB Cable.  

Is it waterproof?

No, Beoncam is splash proof.

Are we planning to make Beoncam waterproof?

Beoncam will not be waterproof. However, we will be providing a waterproof casing for $19.

How does Beoncam connect to the app?

Bluetooth and Wi-Fi (Hotspot).

How do you share images and pictures with the app?

You may upload images and videos on social media found on your smartphone (e.g. YouTube, Twitter, Facebook, Whatsapp, Email).

With pictures and video 360-degrees, are you in the image/video as well if you are wearing it?

It depends on the way you capture the image. If camera is facing the front, you will not be in the image/video. If camera is being held parallel to you, you will be.

How long does the battery last?

Four days standby time and three hours continuous recording on one charge.

Is the battery removable?

No, battery is not removable from Beoncam.

How does the battery charge?

A cradle is provided to charge Beoncam using Micro USB.

How long can you video for?

Three hours continuous recording.

What is the difference between Beoncam and other panoramic cameras?

Beoncam is a wearable panoramic camera that you can strap on your wrist or clip it on your bag or pocket so the camera is always with you.  

How many smartphone device can Beoncam be connected with?

Only one device.

Is Beoncam compatible with VR?

No, Beoncam is not compatible with VR.

Does Beoncam comes with an app?

Yes, both iOS and Android.

Does Beoncam work on both Android and iOS?

Yes.

When will the iOS version be ready?

iOS version will be ready when we start to deliver Beoncam.

Can you increase the image pixel?

We are always looking at ways we can improve the resolution so we are exploring the possibility.

What is the internal memory of Beoncam? Can the memory be increased?

8GB internal memory. Unfortunately no, the memory cannot be increase internally.

How many pictures can you take with it?

About 7,000 images.

Are you trying to compete with GoPro?

No, we are not trying to compete with GoPro. Beoncam is designed as a lifestyle wearable.

How long is the warranty? What does it cover?

We provide one year warranty and it covers the camera and cradle.  

Does the cost of the perk cover taxes and tariffs?
No, VAT and GST not included in the shipping cost.

I’m having problems claiming my perk, who should I reach out to?
If you have problems claiming your perk, please contact us at support@spacemap.me.

Since Beoncam is only splash proof, we have designed a waterproof casing specifically for the camera so you can use it while in the pool or any water activities up to a depth of 20 feet (6 meters). The waterproof casing can be purchased for $19 and you can save up to 40% of its retail price. Actual product may vary from the image shown.


The Beoncam app allows you to remotely control the camera to capture and view images/videos, as well as share your moments with family and friends. We have created both iOS and Android versions of the app so everyone can use Beoncam.

Beoncam is connected to all of your loved ones near and far through its companion app for iOS and Android. 
Connect Beoncam to your iOS or Android device through Bluetooth for controlling and Wi-Fi (hotspot) to view live preview and downloading images/videos from Beoncam to the app.

Remotely control Beoncam’s 360-degree camera.

Immediately view capture images and video. 
Instantly share videos and pictures with friends and family through Facebook, Whatsapp and YouTube. 
Dress up any shot or video with image enhancing filters.

Beoncam is designed to work seamlessly with the mobile app. First, you will have to pair Beoncam with the app via Bluetooth and Wi-Fi (which is the hotspot). Once paired, you can easily control Beoncam to do live previewing, capturing of image and recording of video.Other than that, you can also download the photos and videos from the camera onto the app (using your smartphone as a hotspot) and the photos and videos will be stored on the app for sharing on your social media anytime you want.Check out a sample video taken using our prototype (Note: the actual production units will have better resolution): The app also allows you to view the image and video in different views such as in Raw, Equirectangular, Spherical and Wide angle format.USING THE BEONCAM APP:Save Image / Video from App to GalleryTo store the Image / Video onto your smartphone gallery, select the Image / Video on the ‘SAVED TO APP’ Tab and click the download button. The Image / Video you have selected will be downloaded onto your Gallery for viewing them without using the Beoncam’s app.  Sharing Image / Video from Beoncam’s App to Social MediaTo share Image / Video to your social media account (E.g Facebook, Whatsapp, YouTube), select the Image / Video and click the upload button and select and share the moments to your family and friends. Download Image / Video from Beoncam itself to AppGo to Album and select Beoncam Tab, click on the Image / Video and it will automatically download onto your app folder (Pictures\BEONCAM) so that you will have a copy of the Image / Video on your smartphone. Since the idea was born back in 2015, we have been busy working on building Beoncam to make it the best wearable camera ever. Our in-house optics expert has spent six months in designing the lens with several integrations along with extensive testing. Beoncam features seven glass lens designed to optimized the performance.The core principles that Beoncam is designed around are convenience, ease of use and a long stand-by time for the user. We have carefully selected a dedicated electronic system (SoC) which is customized for this wearable product to be the "heart" of Beoncam’s system. With it’s ultra low power consumption and sophisticated power management, Beoncam is able to achieve almost a week of stand-by time, three hours of continuous recording time, wireless live preview and many other features.   Beoncam is a 360° + 190° FOV wearable panoramic camera. The super wide-angle lens together with an efficient CMOS Sensor and the low power consumption SoC enable the camera to produce JPEG image and H.264 HD Video instantly. Beoncam is simple to use with only 3 buttons - On/Off, Image Capture and Video Recording. Image/video is stored into the 8GB built-in memory provided in the camera.The system has a "Live Preview" feature that allows downloading of images/videos via a Wi-Fi hotspot,all simply by using the free Beoncam mobile app (iOS and Android).Beoncam has a highly optimized PMU which enables long standby time (four days) and long video recording capability of three hours per charge with the embedded Li-Ion polymer cell.We have the working prototype ready so with the funds we raise from the campaign, we will use the majority of the funds to go into production and set-up quality control with testing to ensure every Beoncam is made perfectly. In addition, we will also use part of the funding to enhance photo and video post processing on the app along with other improvements to make your experience even better.Spacemap was founded two years ago in Singapore by our Founder Chee Teck Lee, a veteran in optics design and manufacturing. Keen to build a product that enables users to capture and share moments that are valuable to them, he embarked on the journey to develop Beoncam.Over the past 2 years, Spacemap has expanded to form a team of highly motivated and passionate individuals with expertise in optics, electronics, app software and business development. Spacemap is committed to develop Beoncam and other innovation products.How much does Beoncam weigh?55g.What is the wristband made of?Thermoplastic elastomer (TPE) Material.What is the size of Beoncam?46.6mm diameter x 25mm.What colors does it come in?Space grey. What accessories does it come with?Wrist Strap + Strap Ring, Cradle, Bicycle Handlebar Ring, Helmet Clip, Flat Clip, Micro USB Cable.  Is it waterproof?No, Beoncam is splash proof.Are we planning to make Beoncam waterproof?Beoncam will not be waterproof. However, we will be providing a waterproof casing for $19.How does Beoncam connect to the app?Bluetooth and Wi-Fi (Hotspot).How do you share images and pictures with the app?You may upload images and videos on social media found on your smartphone (e.g. YouTube, Twitter, Facebook, Whatsapp, Email).With pictures and video 360-degrees, are you in the image/video as well if you are wearing it?It depends on the way you capture the image. If camera is facing the front, you will not be in the image/video. If camera is being held parallel to you, you will be.How long does the battery last?Four days standby time and three hours continuous recording on one charge.Is the battery removable?No, battery is not removable from Beoncam.How does the battery charge?A cradle is provided to charge Beoncam using Micro USB.How long can you video for?Three hours continuous recording.What is the difference between Beoncam and other panoramic cameras?Beoncam is a wearable panoramic camera that you can strap on your wrist or clip it on your bag or pocket so the camera is always with you.  How many smartphone device can Beoncam be connected with?Only one device.Is Beoncam compatible with VR?No, Beoncam is not compatible with VR.Does Beoncam comes with an app?Yes, both iOS and Android.Does Beoncam work on both Android and iOS?Yes.When will the iOS version be ready?iOS version will be ready when we start to deliver Beoncam.Can you increase the image pixel?We are always looking at ways we can improve the resolution so we are exploring the possibility.What is the internal memory of Beoncam? Can the memory be increased?8GB internal memory. Unfortunately no, the memory cannot be increase internally.How many pictures can you take with it?About 7,000 images.Are you trying to compete with GoPro?No, we are not trying to compete with GoPro. Beoncam is designed as a lifestyle wearable.How long is the warranty? What does it cover?We provide one year warranty and it covers the camera and cradle.  Does the cost of the perk cover taxes and tariffs?No, VAT and GST not included in the shipping cost.I’m having problems claiming my perk, who should I reach out to?If you have problems claiming your perk, please contact us at support@spacemap.me.

story:
Lanmodo Vast Pro Night Vision System is an innovation that will bring you a safer driving journey. Featured with dual 1080P high resolution, full-color image, recording function, parking monitoring, and G-sensor, it will provide you a new driving experience day and night.This is real feedback from one of our customers. He shared his story about how Lanmodo Vast Night Vision changed his life.

He had been missing his grandchild’s birthday for over 2 years at the time, as he was impaired by his poor vision at night. It was Lanmodo Vast that helped him overcome this problem. He is now able to freely and frequently visit his family
and friends.
 
The team at Lanmodo is pleased to hear the story. Our goal was always to bring
products that can help people improve & enrich their lives - we work hard to
continue doing so.

Featured with dual 1080P high resolution and full-color image for its both front and rear-view cameras, Vast Pro will provide drivers with a clear and crisp image even in darkness. 

Lanmodo Vast Pro is designed with a Sony CMOS sensor chip and 7-layer full glass to capture a clear image in full-color at night. The view distance can up to 300M/984ft, providing drivers more reaction time to avoid an accident. 

Lanmodo Vast Pro provides real-time recording with a clear image at 1080P for day and night to enhance your driving safety. The front and rearview cameras of the Vast Pro can record simultaneously, and it supports a maximum capacity of 128G. 

Compare Lanmodo Vast Pro with Other Dashcam & Mobile Phone

Front 45° monitoring range & Rear 170° monitoring range to record all things well to protect your car during parking. 
 
 
G-sensor detects a sudden collision and separately saves the collision footage to protect your car. All videos are stored in the TF card and named by recording time, you can directly playback videos on the system or check them on your computer through a card reader. 
 

  • 1080P high resolution & full-color image to capture a clear image of behind road conditions.
  • Supports real-time recording and parking monitoring.
  • IP67 waterproof, keep it safe from raindrops.

​

Even on the heavy rainy day, Lanmodo Vast Pro can capture a clear image of road conditions. No worry about blurry vision anymore. 

It's easy to meet some animals during night driving on country roads or dark roads without lights, Lanmodo Vast Pro can help drivers spot them in advance to avoid accidents in time. 

Lanmodo Vast Pro can provide a clear image of road conditions while driving through the dark tunnel. Check the video to see the difference between the naked eye's vision and Vast Pro's night vision. 
Compare to the Vast, the install stability of Lanmodo Vast Pro has been increased by washable, durable, and sticky Nano glue suction cup or base. Get one Lanmodo Vast Pro to fit in various car models, and it can be moved from one to another car easily.  

Method 1: Installation on Dashboard

Step 1: Insert Micro SD card into the card slot;
Step 2: Fix the system to the base;
Step 3: Place the system on the dashboard;
Step 4: Connect the system to the cigarette lighter or OBD for power supply

 

Method 2: Installation on Windshield

Step 1: Insert Micro SD card into the card slot;
Step 2: Fix the system to the suction cup;
Step 3: Connect the system to the cigarette lighter or OBD for power supply;
Step 4: Change the Installation to be "On Windshield" on the menu page;
Step 5: Install the system on the windshield.
Step 1: Fix the rearview camera to the back of the car;
Step 2: Wire up the rearview camera to the night vision system;
Step 3: Connect the red wire on the extended cable to the reversing lamp positive.

Our 1st-generation Lanmodo Vast gains great feedback from customers about its excellent night visibility. After a year of hard work, we launched our 2nd-generation Lanmodo Vast Pro with recording & parking monitor features, which received nice feedback from many Youtubers too. 

Reviewed By Japanese Youtuber: Kurumania K

Reviewed By Polish Youtuber: KrychuTIR

We believe most people already knew Lanmodo brand well, this is the third time we come back to Indiegogo platform to release our creative products for the car enthusiast and driver. We hope this new innovative Lanmodo Vast Pro Night Vision System can bring you a new driving experience and help you drive safely. 

Shipping


Where do we ship?

We are able to ship worldwide. VAT and GST not included. Free shipping to the US, add shipping for the rest of the world.

When do we start shipping?

We plan to ship the product in January 2021. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.    

*Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

FAQs

What is it? 

Lanmodo Vast Pro is an ultimate dual 1080P night vision system integrated with a dash camera that provides all-in-one driving protection.


What features are available?

Lanmodo Vast Pro is featured with many features to ensure safe driving. With 1080P high-resolution full-color image, it provides drivers with a clear and crisp image even in darkness. Night vision view distance up to 984ft (300m), sees much farther than headlights to inform drivers of the road situation in advance.  A real-time recording function to be used as a dashcam. 24H parking monitor and G-sensor detects the collision footage to protect your car. 

Why do I need this? 

Are you worried about driving at night? Have you ever met animals on some country roads? Did you feel uncomfortable while driving in some driver-unfriendly conditions? Do you want a monitor with a video playback function to check what happens to your car during parking? All those concerns can be solved by Lanmodo Vast Pro, and you will enjoy a new driving experience. 

Why crowdfunding?

This is the third time we come to Indiegogo, and we believe that this crowdfunding platform is the best way. Our first-generation Lanmodo Vast Night Vision gains great feedback from customers. And then, we have spent extensive research and testing to bring forth the absolute best solutions to create the finest product with additional multi-functions such as night vision system, recorder, and parking monitor. We are excited to share this innovation with the world and make it available on Indiegogo.  Through the financing process, we hope to find backers who would become our loyal customers and supporters. By launching this new product with Indiegogo, every step of our progress is inseparable from your support and we would love to get your kindly suggestion and feedback. We are open to more input and have many other ideas for function options. 

Is there a warranty?    

Each Lanmodo Vast Pro comes with a 1-year limited warranty. We also ensure that every unit is free from manufacturer defects and handled with the utmost care during shipment. What’s more, if you have any questions or needs during using it, the friendly Customer Care team at Lanmodo will provide detailed videos and instructions to assist you to solve it. 

If I have other questions, who should I contact?    

Please reach out to our Customer Care team on the comments section of this Indiegogo page for any other inquiries you may have!

story:
Universal Clip Mobile Phone Lens 3 in 1 PhotoLens(wide Angle Lens+macro Lens+ Fish Eye Lens) Easy to Carry for Apple Iphone 4 4s 5 5c 5s & Ipad / Mini & Samsung Galaxy S3 S4 Note2 Note3 Series & Htc & Tablet Pc / Laptops & Other Smart Phone Etc

Thebestone series Universal Clip Wide angle & Macro Lens & Fish eye lens Detachable For Digital Camera Mobile Phone Clip 3 in 1 Lens.Portable and detachable, you can take photo with your devices at any time

100% brand new and high quality .Without vignetting and dark circle.Nano high penetrability, low reflection coating technique

Lens cover to avoid damage to lens.Special coating on lens provides professional quality.High Clarity: Made of high-class glass & top-grade technology

Flexible design,Manufactured with environmental,Slim fit and light weight,Fashionable.includes wide angle lens / macro lens / fisheye lens in one small bag, convenient package that easily fits in your pocket.

Раскрытый обзор продукта.

Unleash your creativity and take amazing mobile photos with this practical and effective lens kit. The universal design of the kit allows you to use it easily with a multitude of different portable devices, so you can always take great shots on the go! 

  

Unleash your creativity and take amazing mobile photos with this practical and effective lens kit. The universal design of the kit allows you to use it easily with a multitude of different portable devices, so you can always take great shots on the go! 

Descriptions: 

wide angle lens will increase about 49% view range so you can take picture of large ranges,such as group or people,buildings and landscape. The wide angle will allow you to conquer what was once too large a scene to capture, stretch the limits of your lens to capture cityscapes, large group shots and more. 

with this macro lens you can be take picture of a tiny object clearly in the detail(the shot distance is between 1.5-2.3cm).The macro will enable you to get super close to object to pick up all those small details you usually miss. 

180° Fish Eye Lens like all others is actually an ultra-wide angle lens. With it, your phone lens will capture rounded images instead of square ones. It provides a real deal hemispherical view that makes everyone look like they're living in a bubble. 

Both lenses attach easily the most mobile phone cameras.everying is included in the pack no special fixings are required!

Detail:

Macro lens:close-up 1.5cm,shot distance 15~23mm 

Dimensions (main body): 15.8mm (DN) x 6.5mm (L) 


Wide angle lens: improves up to 49%,Wide 0.67X + Super Macro 

Dimensions (main body):20mm (DN) x 11.2mm (L) 


Fish eye lens: Up to 180° 

Dimensions (main body): 25mm (DN) x 15mm (L) 


Package included: 

1 X wide angle lens+ macro lens+ fish eye lens 

1 X Lens cover 

1 X Black bag 

1 X black detachable clip which install the lens


Delivery:

Contributors will have the option to choose color before we begin shipping.

FREE USA Shipping

If you are shipping your SONICable outside of the USA please add the $5 perk to help cover the cost of Shipping.

Please SHARE if you like our product ,below our VIDEO there are sharing tools:
