story:
Offer you five options of MFT, Sony E, Fuji X, Nikon Z, and Canon EF-M mount, covering a wide range of mirrorless cameras on the market.

*Activate the APS-C mode when using a compatible full-frame camera.


Within one year, SIRUI launched the affordable and portable 50mm and 35mm F1.8 1.33x Anamorphic lenses which amassed over 3.8 million in sales through Indiegogo and gains tremendous popularity in the Industry. In just 6 months, the third SIRUI Anamorphic lens - 24mm F2.8 1.33x, finally get access to the market.

Although all the SIRUI Anamorphic lenses can deliver you a 2.4:1 widescreen look, the 50mm performs best in portrait shots, especially when moving close to catch the subject’s facial details. In addition, the 35mm excels at harmonizing the subject and the background.

The brand-new SIRUI 24mm Anamorphic lens can broaden the camera coverage to the maximum, effective in a wide variety of scenes.

Getting one of the SIRUI Anamorphic lenses can make your cinematic dream come true, but having the three lenses all in your bag helps you to express your cinematic art to the acme. 

Want a cinematic look

Without hurting your wallet bad?

Now you can!

Using an anamorphic lens can capture more horizontal information from a scene while not changing the height. The 24mm lens with the front-mounted cylindrical element compresses the image along the longer dimension to fit into the available sensor space, so when de-squeezing the recorded image with a post-edition software, you can get the superior widescreen cinematic footage where all pixels you paid are used.

Besides, the anamorphic element group in the lens squeezes the horizontal field of view 1.33 times to produce the 2.4:1 aspect ratio. As the focal length shortened to 24mm, the angle of view also gets wider, rendering an expansive horizon.

Landscape

With the view angle extended, this wide-angle anamorphic lens can cover a wider range of the landscape.

Background Rendering

Perfectly balance your composition by generating a smooth extensive background while highlighting the subject.

Street Snap

Quickly capture a distinct street snap with obvious geometric perception, particularly over a long distance.

Limited Space

Break the space limit to show more information of a cramped position, such as an in-car shoot.

Night Photography

For a vivid city or starry night shot, opening the aperture wide allows more lights entering to speed up focusing.
Compared to the other two brothers, one of the obvious changes for the 24mm lens is reducing the minimum focusing distance to 0.6m, therefore, you don’t have to back away too much to focus the subject when shooting space is limited.

The front cylinder lens element can elongate the shape of out-of-focus details into the oval bokeh and also can spread the bluish light out left and right across the frame. The two anamorphic light features can enrich your footage and leave a deep impression on your audiences.

Shift the apertures via the smooth Aperture ring to achieve the optimum overall brightness and sharpness of an image. As the aperture movement range up or down, both the depth of field and background blurring vary in degree, consequently deciding the extent of captured details.

Not just for video use, this lens allows you to distinguish your photo from a standard 16:9 photo, with all the noticeable anamorphic elements including a spectacular 2.4:1 rectangular look, blue light streak, and oval bokeh.

The precision aluminum alloy enhances the strength of the lens housing. Assembling with the solid housing, the copper Aperture and Focus rings are designed with an anti-slip teeth surface for smooth, comfortable focus and light adjustment.

The high-class Schott glass lens elements with Nano-coating can suppress aberration and vignette, rendering excellent resolution and sharpness to a cinematic image.
Providing excellent portability and functionality, the SIRUI Anamorphic lenses are a prior choice for both individual and team uses to improve the film’s aesthetics.



Since 2001, SIRUI has always striven to move forward towards and continue expanding the SIRUI Brand. With innovative R&D, an excellent manufacturing process, and worldwide marketing, SIRUI has become a global enterprise, developing, manufacturing, and marketing photographic products.

As one of the SmartImage Industry leaders in China, SIRUI attracts exceptional and talented people to its photographic product manufacturing headquarter, which spans 30,000 square meters and is equipped with the latest technology. Domestically, SIRUI has operations in 31 provinces, with showrooms in Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou, among others. SIRUI also has a global presence with over 300 sales locations in more than 60 countries, including Germany, Japan, the USA, Canada, the EU, Southeast Asia, and the Middle East.

Manufactured with high standards, SIRUI’s innovative photographic products have received numerous accolades and awards at notable international events including the 2018 Red Dot Design Awards, the 2018 German Design Awards, CES 2019, NAB Show 2019. SIRUI greatly appreciates the ongoing support and confidence received from our customers and the professional photography community.

SIRUI is committed to providing excellence in product performance and functionality. Drawing on our experience in product development, design, and production, it is our goal to provide our customers with high quality innovative photographic products to advance the progress of the Imaging Industry. That’s why SIRUI achieved a big success with the 50mm and 35mm F1.8 1.33x Anamorphic Lenses. Since their launch, the 50mm and 35mm Anamorphic Lenses have gained tremendous popularity in professional media organizations and among photographers. To diversify the anamorphic lens line, SIRUI is launching the third high-precision 24mm F2.8 Anamorphic 1.33x Lens for users to extend the capability of their shoots.

FOLLOW US @SIRUIIMAGING

Night Photography
For a vivid city or starry night shot, opening the aperture wide allows more lights entering to speed up focusing. Compared to the other two brothers, one of the obvious changes for the 24mm lens is reducing the minimum focusing distance to 0.6m, therefore, you don’t have to back away too much to focus the subject when shooting space is limited.The front cylinder lens element can elongate the shape of out-of-focus details into the oval bokeh and also can spread the bluish light out left and right across the frame. The two anamorphic light features can enrich your footage and leave a deep impression on your audiences.

Shift the apertures via the smooth Aperture ring to achieve the optimum overall brightness and sharpness of an image. As the aperture movement range up or down, both the depth of field and background blurring vary in degree, consequently deciding the extent of captured details.Not just for video use, this lens allows you to distinguish your photo from a standard 16:9 photo, with all the noticeable anamorphic elements including a spectacular 2.4:1 rectangular look, blue light streak, and oval bokeh.The precision aluminum alloy enhances the strength of the lens housing. Assembling with the solid housing, the copper Aperture and Focus rings are designed with an anti-slip teeth surface for smooth, comfortable focus and light adjustment.The high-class Schott glass lens elements with Nano-coating can suppress aberration and vignette, rendering excellent resolution and sharpness to a cinematic image.Providing excellent portability and functionality, the SIRUI Anamorphic lenses are a prior choice for both individual and team uses to improve the film’s aesthetics.Since 2001, SIRUI has always striven to move forward towards and continue expanding the SIRUI Brand. With innovative R&D, an excellent manufacturing process, and worldwide marketing, SIRUI has become a global enterprise, developing, manufacturing, and marketing photographic products.As one of the SmartImage Industry leaders in China, SIRUI attracts exceptional and talented people to its photographic product manufacturing headquarter, which spans 30,000 square meters and is equipped with the latest technology. Domestically, SIRUI has operations in 31 provinces, with showrooms in Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou, among others. SIRUI also has a global presence with over 300 sales locations in more than 60 countries, including Germany, Japan, the USA, Canada, the EU, Southeast Asia, and the Middle East.Manufactured with high standards, SIRUI’s innovative photographic products have received numerous accolades and awards at notable international events including the 2018 Red Dot Design Awards, the 2018 German Design Awards, CES 2019, NAB Show 2019. SIRUI greatly appreciates the ongoing support and confidence received from our customers and the professional photography community.SIRUI is committed to providing excellence in product performance and functionality. Drawing on our experience in product development, design, and production, it is our goal to provide our customers with high quality innovative photographic products to advance the progress of the Imaging Industry. That’s why SIRUI achieved a big success with the 50mm and 35mm F1.8 1.33x Anamorphic Lenses. Since their launch, the 50mm and 35mm Anamorphic Lenses have gained tremendous popularity in professional media organizations and among photographers. To diversify the anamorphic lens line, SIRUI is launching the third high-precision 24mm F2.8 Anamorphic 1.33x Lens for users to extend the capability of their shoots.FOLLOW US @SIRUIIMAGING

story:
Hello world!  My name is Jonathan Ferris-Bohorquez.  I'm a photographer that specializes in live music and other performance arts.  My goal is to consistently capture the emotion of a performer's passion in the still frame.  The frozen image bears a stark contrast from the absorption of an overall performance, and the capture of intensity, passion, drive, motivation, and the ambiance of the instant is how I see the artist's love expressed.

Having spent years as an unsigned, minimally recognized musician, I learned to appreciate the purity of motivation for an artist without agenda.  As such, I take great pleasure in devoting my services to artists for free.  Their love for their craft motivates and inspires me and, as such, I attempt to return that passion in my chosen format out of gratitude.  The artist benefits from the quality of my images in relation to the nature and personality of their on-stage presence.  My photographs are suitable for drawing people to future shows and documenting previous performances.

Regrettably, my chosen lens has gone and died on me.  It's final breaths were exhaled doing what it was originally purchased to do - documenting live music.  The vast majority of frames it captured were devoted to dark, dank clubs and the musicians who make these environments worth visiting.  Without the equipment however, the photographs must cease, and that is where YOU come into the equation.

Help me acquire a replacement so I may continue to donate my services to musicians in and around the Madison area.  Local music, music management, booking agents, unsigned artists, the overall music community, as well as the nationally touring acts that our community supports will continue to benefit from the images I'm able to produce.

The Pentax DA* 16-50mm F/2.8 retails for $1,400.00 at http://www.bhphotovideo.com, my preferred equipment provider.  The image/glass quality of this lens, when combined with the lowlight aperture and the variable focal length, make this item the primary tool for poorly lit performance venues where the subjects are frequently in movement.

Any funds provided will contribute towards the purchase and shipment of this item. If the requested total is not met provided funds will still be applied towards this goal, though personal funds are slow in the making.  

Before you decide on the donation amount you can afford, please pay attention to the listed perks.  I don't want handouts.  I want work!  Your donations will equate professional-level photos for you and your loved ones.  Depending on whether you are donating as an individual or as part of a group, there are options for you.  I provide services that include audition head shots, family portraits, child photography, and sports/performance images.  If you can't contribute monetarily, spread the word of this fundraising event.  If I've photographed you or your music project, share my request with all who've enjoyed the images of you I've provided.

story:
Having no hair made him look even hairier.

The urgent care center was flooded with patients after the news of a new deadly virus was made public.

He decided to live his life by the big beats manifesto.

Iguanas were falling out of the trees.

Please tell me you don't work in a morgue.

The father died during childbirth.

All you need to do is pick up the pen and begin.

She was the type of girl who wanted to live in a pink house.

He colored deep space a soft yellow.

It was the best sandcastle he had ever seen.

Abstraction is often one floor above you.

Malls are great places to shop; I can find everything I need under one roof.

Getting up at dawn is for the birds.

Nudist colonies shun fig-leaf couture.

The thunderous roar of the jet overhead confirmed her worst fears.

Please wait outside of the house.

For oil spots on the floor, nothing beats parking a motorbike in the lounge.

He set out for a short walk, but now all he could see were mangroves and water were for miles.

Sixty-Four comes asking for bread.

With a single flip of the coin, his life changed forever.
story_txt:

All you need to do is pick up the pen and begin.

Sixty-Four comes asking for bread.
With a single flip of the coin, his life changed forever.

story:
Short Summary

Photography is a very expensive career, i need all the help i can get as i'm starting up my proffesional business. Already in debt i need some support, and exposure to clients, i know ONE of you out there is that missing link that can make me Boom

My business includes:

  • Live bands
  • Portrait, portfolio work
  • Landscape
  • Pet/animal
  • Commercial work

I am open to any creative photoshoots you or someone you may know is looking for, shoot me an email(no pun intended) and lets make some magic!

What i Need & What You Get

This campaign is to raise money for a new lens for more versitle creative shots, i just purchased my new proffesional Nikon body, and money is tight going to Mohawk college and all the equipment i need, and will need for the future.

The Impact

The impact of this campaign would not only provided me with financial support, but it would also get me recognized potentially across the world as i learn and grow thoughout my career

Your support, exposure, and positive comments make a huge difference to my attitude, and outlook on my inspirations of becoming a professional photographer.

If i reach my goal, or better yet exceed my goal, the money will go directly to the purchase of a Nikon 10.5mm Fisheye lens, 800$ value

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share my page,
  • Throw my name out to any potential customer
  • Tell your friends there is a new guy in town and will meet your demands for Alot cheaper then your registered professional

Mike Radd! Radd Photography, help my dreams come true!

story:
Thanks for stopping by, but...

We moved this project to Kickstarter. If you would like to join us please navigate to our live campaign here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/957253584/the-parrot-a-compact-teleprompter-for-dslr-cameras

Description

Parrots have always been great at mimicking your speech, but this parrot can deliver your lines. The Parrot Teleprompter is an affordable, compact, and professional teleprompter designed for use with DSLR and mirrorless cameras.

If you have ever tried memorizing lines for a video you know how much time goes into filming multiple takes, and then editing out all the mistakes.

Professionals use teleprompters which results in a higher quality polished look. Teleprompters allow the subject to look directly at the camera which ensures proper eye contact. Other methods result in an obvious lack of genuine eye contact and warmth.

How is the parrot teleprompter different?

The parrot teleprompter has been carefully designed to be portable and functional. By reducing the size and eliminating unnecessary components we were able to make the parrot teleprompter affordable for professional and Indy film makers alike.

Rewards


How do you use it?

The Parrot teleprompter is easy to set up and easy to use. Here are the steps:

1. Remove the protective hood cover

2. Pull down the phone clamp and insert a smartphone (The integrated rubber grip and clamp springs will secure the phone in place)

3. Remove the protective adapter cover

4. Screw the integrated 77mm adapter onto your camera lens. (If your camera lens is a different size it will require a lens adapter.)

Technical Specifications/Features
story_txt:
Thanks for stopping by, but...
We moved this project to Kickstarter. If you would like to join us please navigate to our live campaign here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/957253584/the-parrot-a-compact-teleprompter-for-dslr-camerasDescriptionParrots have always been great at mimicking your speech, but this parrot can deliver your lines. The Parrot Teleprompter is an affordable, compact, and professional teleprompter designed for use with DSLR and mirrorless cameras. If you have ever tried memorizing lines for a video you know how much time goes into filming multiple takes, and then editing out all the mistakes. Professionals use teleprompters which results in a higher quality polished look. Teleprompters allow the subject to look directly at the camera which ensures proper eye contact. Other methods result in an obvious lack of genuine eye contact and warmth.How is the parrot teleprompter different?The parrot teleprompter has been carefully designed to be portable and functional. By reducing the size and eliminating unnecessary components we were able to make the parrot teleprompter affordable for professional and Indy film makers alike. Rewards

How does it work?
The Parrot teleprompter utilizes a special two way beam splitter mirror to display text from a smartphone to the reader and at the same time it allows the camera to see through it while the text remains invisible to the camera.How the Parrot Teleprompter works


 How to use the lens cap holder


How do you use it?
The Parrot teleprompter is easy to set up and easy to use. Here are the steps:
1. Remove the protective hood cover
2. Pull down the phone clamp and insert a smartphone (The integrated rubber grip and clamp springs will secure the phone in place)
3. Remove the protective adapter cover
4. Screw the integrated 77mm adapter onto your camera lens. (If your camera lens is a different size it will require a lens adapter.) 

How to use the Parrot Teleprompter


Technical Specifications/Features

story:
Growing up, I was passionate about photography. My heros were Andre Kurtez, Henri Cartier Bresson and Robert Capra. I spent my first couple of years in London prowling the East End, searching for the ‘Decisive Moment’ – that undefinable split second that finds greatness even in the most mundane of things.

A few years after finishing a Diploma in Art and Design at Sir John Cass School of Art I managed to open my own studio in Spitalfields Market and spent the 90’s shooting the pop stars of the day;All Saints and the Spice Girls, Boyzone and The Back Street Boys,Natalie Imbruglia and even JayZ.

The Decisive Moment, I discovered, exisits in portraiture as well as street photography. Expression is a moving target and I found the instincts required to capture somebody’s character already developed by my experience in the street.

During long and varied carreer, in everything from business to fiction, I have never lost the will to capture people and their world in camera – it’s time to now pick-up, proffesionally, where I left off.

If you would like to become part of my new folio and simultainiously help raise the money needed for up to date equipment here is your chance. I am aiming to raise £3000 over the next 60 days. To that end I’m providing my services for a fraction of my old dayrate.

The money raised is mostly for a new camera as I still have most of my old studio lighting gear. If you need your pictures before the end date don’t worry as I still  have access to proffesional gear via my hire accounts and the old buddies favour bank.

Although most of my work was portraiture I have also covered many other subjects including theatre, interiors, live concerts and events. I have even been known to shoot the odd wedding for special friends.

Please check out the link here to my Facebook photography page (via the Facebook icon below) and share it if you have a mind to.  Some shots are also in the gallery here (tab at the top above the little girls).

The work you see here is a small propotion of what I shot in the 90’s, quite a lot of it went missing when I closed the studio and put stuff into storage at the end of the 90’s. I hope it gives you a flavour of what I do.

 

Thanks for reading

 

Mark

story:
Aktiv – Many Features in One simple device, Ready for action

Action Camera, Security Camera, 4K Camera, Waterproof

Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/aktiv4k/

Who is tired of having to choose between OVER EXPENSIVE  and LOW QUALITY cameras?

We have created the perfect solution for anyone in need of a camera. Smooth quality 4K video with AKTIV.

The most stable action camera. We have worked on this a lot, in order to make AKTIV as stable as possible. New technology has been integrated in AKTIV + physical stabilization.

Share with friends and family instantly!

Action camera:

With its tough exterior AKTIV can easily be taken anywhere with you. Don’t worry about dropping, or hitting it on hard surfaces.

AKTIV has been tested under water and has passed tests of up to 3.5 meters under water.  It can easily be used while doing water sports from swimming to kite boarding and surfing.  Attach it by using the special attachments.

Attach AKTIV to bikes and motorcycles while riding. Capture the best images with the stabilization that AKTIV provides. This makes it easier for you when editing the images you want to use. Most of the time these don’t even need editing.

Security- manage home security in a simple and easy way.

With the new software we are working on, Aktiv will learn your homes patterns, so that it can alert you when something is different. Keep your home safe while you are away.

Get these notifications directly to your smart phone!

Use voice control to make it easy to tell Aktiv what to do and when to do it. Start recording, take pictures, or even share with friends and family via Social Networks.

Attach Aktiv to your car and record your journey while travelling, or use it as a way to keep it safe while away for long periods of time.

Attach to the back of your vehicle and use it to help you park in hard locations.

You can also attach more than one device to see all the difficult angles.

Attach Aktiv to your helmet, or back pack while doing outdoor activities. Share instantly through the Wi-Fi connection available.Choose and cut exactly the segments that you want to share with friends and your network on any platforms.

Aktiv has a protective, shock resistant cover that is water proof, so it can be taken on all types of adventures and won’t ever be left behind.

Basically attach to any surface with the attachments available and use at any time.

Take a look at how the first prototype was made and what will be done after the campaign is over.

On the road to building AKTIV –action camera we have made many friends and collaborated with many people from all over the world.  Thank you all for your help and the insight you gave us throughout the project.

Timeline:

Whats inside the box?

Wireless charger

Extra on the go power bank

Special attachments (magnet)

Waterproof storage bag

 

Technical Specifications:

During the mass production process the final aspect and tech specs might vary from the original prototype.

We are aiming mostly for 2 stretch marks in order to add more features and make Aktiv as good as possible. Here they are below. 

By the way, you can help by sharing the campaign via social media, email, text etc.

Perks:

 

Meet the team behind this great project!

FAQs:

We will continue adding questions and answers here throughout the campaign. This will make the campaign clearer for any new backers that might have questions about Aktiv. Thank you everyone for your questions! 

You can contact us through the comments section, or through messages.

Q: How will you know how much battery is left?

A: You will be able to access and view through the mobile app, or the small screen if we reach that stretch goal.

Q: Will there be a mobile app for iOS and Android devices?

A: Yes, these are the 2 platforms that we are concentrating on at the moment.

Q: How do you know how much memory is left?

A: You will be able to access and view through the mobile app, or the small screen if we reach that stretch goal.

Q: Will Aktiv come with a memory card?

A: No, Aktiv will not come with a memory card.

Q: How do you change setting of your Aktiv action camera?

A: At the moment you will be able to enter the settings through the mobile app. If the stretch mark is reached, we will add a small screen where these setting can be changed.

Q: Can I connect more than one Aktiv cameras to one device?

A: Yes, we made this possible through the mobile app, so that you can capture more than one angle.

Q: What's the video recording duration for 1080P 60FPS and 32 GB of memory?

A: At 60FPS, 32 GB will record 3 hours of footage. At 30FPS, 32 GB will record 6 hours.

Q: When will perks be delivered? 

A: We estimate the shipping date for the month of May,We will definitely deliver a great product, and hope to do so on time!

story:
Short Summary

Experienced photographer seeking funding for new camera to reignite artistic vision.

  • Featured by Yahoo/Flickr, Fujifilm, and Getty Images
  • Portfolio: www.flickr.com/theleestudio
  • Offering discounted photoshoots in the Boston area on weekends, either street style or portraiture.
  • New camera will not only contribute to me putting out better images, but you will also be able to get to explore Boston with me and have your photos taken in a fresh, new way for 2019.

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Camera model is Fujifilm X-T3; the MSRP is 1499; I'm looking for 1600 in order to cover taxes and shipping.
  • I will block out the next 21 weekends of the year to do photoshoots for all contributors. I will also provide complimentary polaroid prints of the shoot to each person I shoot with.
  • You get to have a professional photographer in your rolodex ;) 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you can't contribute, but love my work in the past, I'd appreciate it if you could share this campaign!
story_txt:
Short Summary
Experienced photographer seeking funding for new camera to reignite artistic vision.

Featured by Yahoo/Flickr, Fujifilm, and Getty Images
Portfolio: www.flickr.com/theleestudio

Offering discounted photoshoots in the Boston area on weekends, either street style or portraiture.
New camera will not only contribute to me putting out better images, but you will also be able to get to explore Boston with me and have your photos taken in a fresh, new way for 2019.


What We Need & What You Get
Break it down for folks in more detail:

Camera model is Fujifilm X-T3; the MSRP is 1499; I'm looking for 1600 in order to cover taxes and shipping.
I will block out the next 21 weekends of the year to do photoshoots for all contributors. I will also provide complimentary polaroid prints of the shoot to each person I shoot with.
You get to have a professional photographer in your rolodex ;) 


Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't contribute, but love my work in the past, I'd appreciate it if you could share this campaign!

story:
Ordinary photos and videos can only be shown on display devices as image plane which we are no longer satisfied with this. Instead, we want something that’s more interactive as well as creating immersive experience for people. 

Here we come up the idea of SnapCam360, a handheld 360 pocket camera combining snap shot and 360o camera function, for you to take photos and videos easily with a single device.

And now you can share the new perspective with everybody with SnapCam360. Thanks to the two social media giants, Facebook and YouTube. They have begun to support 360o videos, making 360 videos become more and more popular this year.

Check this out! SnapCam360 Reliving Together in 2016.




It is the whole new experience of capturing your pleasure moment in 360o with a simple click! Share it with the world and amaze everybody around you! Drag it, Spin it and Move it around to experience it with your own point of view!

Thinking of capturing the entire beautiful environment and all the lovely faces at the same time? With SnapCam360, capturing a 360o photos and videos are just one click away. 

Recommend Shooting Position for 360 Experience

360 Experience Performance

You can experience your 360 photos and videos by Circle & Dome modes like you have never seen before. 

Recommend Shooting Position for Circle & Dome

Circle & Dome Performance

Taking panorama photo by rotating the camera and image stitching software? No!! With SnapCam360, you can take panorama photos and videos easily with a single click in a second. 

Recommend Shooting Position for Panorama

Panorama Performance


You can have your videos and photos appear in 2 segments, dividing the 360o into upper and lower half. You may say it’s similar to Panorama, but the beauty of “Segment” is that you don’t need to have a long screen.

Recommend Shooting Position for Segment


Segment Performance

Sometime you just want to capture your memorable moments spontaneously and quickly, “Snap Shot” mode perfectly fits you and you will absolutely love it!

Recommend Shooting Position for SnapShot

SnapShot Performance


Don’t worry! We will never miss “Selfie” which is a must for a handheld camera right in your pocket! You and all your friends’ pretty faces can be captured easily in group Selfie! Or you can name it Ussie!!

Selfie & Ussie Performance



Want to have a remote control for the SnapCam360? No worries, besides using buttons on the SnapCam360 to control the camera, you can connect your smart device to the SnapCam360 with our free mobile app to watch exactly what you are framing and shooting in live mode, change settings and features, control start and stop of recording, playback and enjoy the moment of 360o by moving your body around. It works on most iOS and Android devices.


and more…


With SnapCam360 and the mobile app, you are just one click ahead to create and experience the immersive 360 videos and photos. You do not need to have any image stitching software and professional skills. It’s quick and easy.


Being out for long without a chance for charging the SnapCam360? You can choose the package with extra battery.

Taking Burst Mode can capture quick speed successive motion images. Just switch your camera into Burst Mode and you can capture in quick succession by pressing the shuttle button. You can then select the best image of the motion.


You can create a short but impressive video in 360 o with SnapCam360. Plenty of options are available to choose in order to help you taking the perfect time-lapse.

With aperture f2.0, you can capture better quality videos and photos in a dim environment or night time.

The SnapCam360 is designed for you to carry it around every day. Its pocket size design perfectly fits your hand holding position, suitable for you to shoot in both 360 mode and SnapShot mode.


Would that be great to carry your SnapCam360 with lifestyle Leather sleeve? You will get a genuine leather sleeve for our specific Perks. 

(Above picture is for reference only)




We will continue to work for the SnapCam 360 project to bring more valuable items for our backers and end customers. These stretch goals are just a start and we will continue to bring up new ideas to make SnapCam360 more perfect.





360 videos and photos and virtual reality (VR) application are definitely the hottest topic for the world in 2016. In order to let more people to capture their own treasurable and magical moment with the latest 360 technology, SnapCam360 is designed to be handy, user-friendly, and most importantly is affordable to everyone. 

From the long way of research, development, modeling and prototyping, here we come to our final stage of the project. We need your support to help us bringing SnapCam360 to the world, sharing the fun and joyful immersive 360 experience with all of you!



Other Members



Our team has been working on SnapCam360 project for more than 17 months and now coming to the final stage before mass production. We work closely with our manufacturing partner on the details of fine tuning on both hardware and software. According to the current progress, we are confident that SnapCam360 can be delivered on time.

In order to make sure SnapCam360 can smoothly be delivered to our dearest backers’ hand, we are now dealing with several shipping parties to ensure SnapCam360 can be shipped in the most efficient way to your country. We will try our best on avoiding any delay due to shipment.

We will always keep you updated with our latest progress. Thanks for your support and stay tuned with us!

Please be advised that import taxes, duties and related customs fees may be charged once the SnapCam360 arrives at your country. These charges are determined by the customs office of the regarding destination.

Payment of these charges and taxes is the responsibility of the backers and will not be covered by Miracle Elite. For further details of charges, please contact your local customs office.

In some occasions packages may be delayed due to custom clearance.


Folks, if you like our project idea, please don’t hesitate to help us get the word out and make some noise about SnapCam360. You can use the Indiegogo share tools on the left column to share our campaign on social media, or find us by clicking the links below. Thanks for your every single share and we always appreciate it!

If you are interested to become a Reseller or purchase in wholesale quantities, please contact us by info@hvyourown.com.


Q: Can you record video or photo during charging?

A: Yes, SnapCam360 supports charging and recording at the same time!

Q: How long can the battery last for?

A: 105 mins for recording at 1440P 30FPS with Wifi Off.

  45 mins for recording at 1440P 30FPS with Wifi On.

 You can find the battery level on SnapCam360’s LCD screen or in the App.

Q: If I accidentally turn on the camera in my bag or pocket, will it use up all the battery power?

A: No, after 4 mins of no operation, SnapCam360 will automatically turn off to save battery power.

Q: How many photos or videos can be stored in the memory card?

A: It depends on the size of your memory card. Say with a 32GB Micro-SD card, you can store up to 5000 photos (in 8M) or 50 mins video (in 1440P). You can also find the remaining storage status anytime on SnapCam360’s LCD screen or in the App.

Q: Does SnapCam360 come with a micro-SD memory card?

A: No, micro-SD memory is not included in any perk.

Q: Can SnapCam360 take Time Lapse videos?

A: Yes, SnapCam360 supports time lapse mode, you can choose the time interval of taking photos in 3s/5s/10s/30s/1min. Also, you can set your duration for taking the time lapse by 5mins/10mins/15mins/20mins/30mins/60mins.

Q: Is the Time Lapse video taken by SnapCam360 with 360-degree scene view?

A: Yes. It plays like the normal 360 videos.

Q: Can SnapCam360 take Time Lapse in photo format?

A: Yes, if you choose to shoot via Photo mode, the time lapse will be recorded in photo format.

Q: Does SnapCam360 support Photo Burst mode?

A: Yes, Photo Burst function is available in SnapCam360, with 3/5/10 photos per second, or continues to burst while holding the capture button.

Q: Would the video look blur if I take the video while moving around?

A: No, the SnapCam360 has built-in image stabilization which reduces distracting vibrations from videos by smoothing the transition from one frame to another.

Q: What is the loop recording mode?

A: SnapCam360 will continue to record photos and videos and delete the oldest photos and videos records automatically when the memory card is full.

Q: Is SnapCam360 compatible with a standard tripod?

A: Yes, SnapCam360 has a standard 1/4 inch screw slot built at the bottom.

Q: What is the white balance setting in SnapCam360?

A: You can choose from different setting in SnapCam360 for white balance: Daylight/Cloudy/Fluorescent/Incandescent/Auto.

Q: Is the App available for Andriod and iOS? What keyword should I search for?

A: You can find the App available in both Google Play Store and Apple App Store in June 2016. Just search for “SnapCam360” and here you go.

Q: How to charge the SnapCam360’s battery?

A: A Micro-USB cable can be used to charge SnapCam360’s battery, you can charge it by plugging into any USB power adaptor with minimum 1 Amp current output.

Q. How long does it require to charge SnapCam360’s battery in full?

A: 1.5 hrs approx. with USB 1A power charging.

Q: What accessories are included in the packaging of SnapCam360?

A: 30cm micro-USB sync/charge cable, battery, protective sleeve and wrist strap.

Q: What is the video coding format using in SnapCam360?

A: H.264. It is currently one of the most commonly used formats for the recording, compression and distribution of video content.

Q: What are the color options for SnapCam360?

A: We are currently busying on the tooling and mass production of the first batch of SnapCam360 in white color. But we will keep this topic open, and please give us your comment on your preferred color.

Q: Does SnapCam360 come with warranty?

A: Yes, SnapCam360 comes with 1 year limited warranty against defects in materials and workmanship under normal use. Please keep your purchase record, from Indiegogo or other channels, for the warranty claim.

Q: How to get the recorded photos and videos from SnapCam360?

A:

For Smartphone/Tablet:

1. You can get your photos and videos through Wi-Fi by using the App “SnapCam360”, which is available for both iOS and Android

For personal computer:

1. You can connect SnapCam360 to the computer with Micro USB cable; it will be switched to movable hard drive mode automatically

2. Or you can just simply take out the Micro-SD card from SnapCam360 and plug into card-reader to read the files

Q: How to experience 360 o video on PC?

A: You can upload your videos to YouTube/Facebook by using our PC application “SnapCam360 Converter” (the download link is available in the user manual), or just play the video files on 3rd party 360o video player such as “Kolor eyes”.

story:
About this project

Spectacam is a dual video sports camera with WiFi capabilities for the sports enthusiast wanting a lightweight, streamlined, functional and cool looking camera to document their adventures.

Safety – Spectacam will be the silent scarecrow and eyewitness. Cyclists and motorcyclists will have footage of any accidents and incidents that happen on the road. This is especially important if they were assaulted or hit by a hit and run driver for example. Footage can be used to prosecute offending motor vehicles, but hopefully motorists will realize that they are being recorded and treat the Spectacam user with more respect and courtesy. 

Training – Spectacam’s versatile camera adjustment can record multiple angles of the sportsman’s training to have double the footage for post activity analysis.

Experience – Spectacam will record the users experience so they can share it with others. Consumers are reaching a state of “hypermobility,” rapidly adopting mobile technologies and downloading apps that keep them connected anywhere, anytime.

Dual-camera view capability allows user to shoot front and rear videos simultaneously 
 

Smartphone integration allows user to control camera functions live and remotely

Blue LED Lights indicate camera power mode.

Smart adjustability of both cameras makes it easy to change angles of view.

Compact and aerodynamic design makes it one of the smallest and most streamlined helmet cameras in the world.

Versatile mounts can fit a wide variety of helmets as well as handlebars, and other surfaces using included 3M double-sided adhesive. The above image illustrates an example of the camera on the cycling handlebar - front and rear view, with rear view pointing upwards to face cyclist, to capture facial expressions.


TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS

  • Resolution: 2 X 1080p cameras 
  • View Finder/ Playback screen: With iPhone/ Android app 
  • Field of View (FOV): Medium 
  • Memory Storage: Micro SD card 
  • Battery Life: Approx. 3 hours 
  • Weight: approx. 60 grams/ 2.1oz 
  • Microphone: Internal 
  • Waterproof: Water resistant, with the aim of achieving IP55 rating 
  • Mounts Included: Helmet mount which will fit most vented helmets and 3M double-sided adhesive mount for ventless helmets 
  • Camera Angle Adjustment: Manual, built-in 
  • WiFi: Built-in 

HOW IT WORKS

Spectacam mounts directly onto user’s helmet using the Velcro strap mounting system. With a click of the main power button, the camera automatically starts recording. User has the option of connecting to the smart phone via WiFi and Spectacam smart phone app to view live images on both cameras. Images can help the user adjust both cameras angle of view. Other possible options include a rear view only function to use this feature as an electronic “rear view mirror”. Camera settings can be customized via the Spectacam smart phone app.



HOW IT ALL STARTED

Spectacam was conceptualized when 3-time Olympian Josiah Ng first saw a need for a streamlined helmet camera to use on a daily basis, which would help to analyze his training as well as to record his rides for safety reasons. He spent a lot of time training on public roads and often encountered motorists who acted inappropriately or even dangerously towards him. He envisioned having dual cameras recording any potentially negative incidents as well as anything exciting on his rides. 

Josiah formed Specta Technologies to partner with Outerspace Design Group from Melbourne, Australia to design and develop the dual camera prototype. The alpha-prototype was constructed in July 2012. 

Specta Technologies LLC was incorporated in Nevada. Our objective is to bring to market the world’s first dual video sports camera with WiFi capabilities for the sports enthusiast wanting a lightweight, streamlined, functional and cool looking camera to document their adventures.

Here are some early photos featuring our work in progress.

Above: Early concept form development.

Above: Some styling cues.

Above: Concept refinement

Above: Preliminary form mock-up


MANUFACTURING PLAN 

We have commenced the process of engaging suppliers in China and Taiwan to manufacture our cameras. The quality of Spectacam cameras and its internal components will determine the functionality and consistency of the camera. 

Our biggest concern is to ensure that chosen manufacturer and suppliers meet the highest QC standards. Project Manager, Josiah and one of our hardware engineers will travel to the far east to finalize details with our chosen suppliers. Once we have nailed down the fine details, a purchase order will be made and manufacturing will commence. It will take between 12-16 weeks for the completion of cameras, which will bring our shipping date to sometime in May/June 2013. 

Our Indiegogo backers will have exclusive access to updates and photos of our trip documenting every step of our journey!

PATENT

A patent application has been filed with the USPTO. Other patents are currently being pursued in targeted industrialized nations. 

$25 PLEDGE REWARD

We want to give something back as a thank you so we have designed a breathable, race-cut glove with the highest quality materials as a thank you to you all. This is a 5Bling pre-release design glove with a limited Spectacam logo. It is made from breathable / stretchable mesh and synthetic materials so it is totally washable. 

We'll also ship it to you for free. Yes that's everyone in the world! When we're ready to ship out, we'll send you a survey where you will be able to choose your size from XS to XL, and we'll also offer a Women's XS for women with small hands.

CONNECT WITH US

WEBSITE  | FACEBOOK  | TWITTER  | YOUTUBE

We thank you for your support!

Special thanks to Specta Technologies' team members, Outerspace Design, Exit Reality, Dugong Films, Swoot Creative, Indiegogo, Andrew Ong, Danny Stefanic, Russell Ames, Scott & Yoko McClean, friends and family members.

Risks and challenges

We have considered the challenges involved in designing and manufacturing an IP55 rated device, particularly in relation to the two rotating camera housings that must seal throughout their range of movement. For mass manufacture we think the ideal way to produce the required sealing surfaces would be through TPE seals which would be over-moulded onto the rigid housing components.  The design of this type of system is quite complex and challenging.

Another challenge we will have to encounter would be the video compression of the two simultaneous videos. Running 2 cameras at the same time, encoding the video, and streaming it, will have the controller running at maximum speed and will consume up the battery power. Getting 3 hours or more out of the battery will be our mission.

We are fortunate to have on our team a group of world-class designers and engineers at Outerspace Design. They have a proven track record developing high-level products for over 20 years and have worked with top consumer electronics companies like BlueAnt, Quest, TMC and one of the leading smartphone case manufacturers in the world.

Other possible options include a rear view only function to use this feature as an electronic “rear view mirror”. Camera settings can be customized via the Spectacam smart phone app.


HOW IT ALL STARTED
Spectacam was conceptualized when 3-time Olympian Josiah Ng first saw a need for a streamlined helmet camera to use on a daily basis, which would help to analyze his training as well as to record his rides for safety reasons. He spent a lot of time training on public roads and often encountered motorists who acted inappropriately or even dangerously towards him. He envisioned having dual cameras recording any potentially negative incidents as well as anything exciting on his rides. Josiah formed Specta Technologies to partner with Outerspace Design Group from Melbourne, Australia to design and develop the dual camera prototype. The alpha-prototype was constructed in July 2012. Specta Technologies LLC was incorporated in Nevada. Our objective is to bring to market the world’s first dual video sports camera with WiFi capabilities for the sports enthusiast wanting a lightweight, streamlined, functional and cool looking camera to document their adventures.
Here are some early photos featuring our work in progress.


Above: Early concept form development.


Above: Some styling cues.

Above: Concept refinement
Above: Preliminary form mock-upMANUFACTURING PLAN 
We have commenced the process of engaging suppliers in China and Taiwan to manufacture our cameras. The quality of Spectacam cameras and its internal components will determine the functionality and consistency of the camera. Our biggest concern is to ensure that chosen manufacturer and suppliers meet the highest QC standards. Project Manager, Josiah and one of our hardware engineers will travel to the far east to finalize details with our chosen suppliers. Once we have nailed down the fine details, a purchase order will be made and manufacturing will commence. It will take between 12-16 weeks for the completion of cameras, which will bring our shipping date to sometime in May/June 2013. 
Our Indiegogo backers will have exclusive access to updates and photos of our trip documenting every step of our journey!




PATENT
A patent application has been filed with the USPTO. Other patents are currently being pursued in targeted industrialized nations. 


$25 PLEDGE REWARD
We want to give something back as a thank you so we have designed a breathable, race-cut glove with the highest quality materials as a thank you to you all. This is a 5Bling pre-release design glove with a limited Spectacam logo. It is made from breathable / stretchable mesh and synthetic materials so it is totally washable. 
We'll also ship it to you for free. Yes that's everyone in the world! When we're ready to ship out, we'll send you a survey where you will be able to choose your size from XS to XL, and we'll also offer a Women's XS for women with small hands.




CONNECT WITH US
WEBSITE  | FACEBOOK  | TWITTER  | YOUTUBE
We thank you for your support!
Special thanks to Specta Technologies' team members, Outerspace Design, Exit Reality, Dugong Films, Swoot Creative, Indiegogo, Andrew Ong, Danny Stefanic, Russell Ames, Scott & Yoko McClean, friends and family members.







Risks and challenges
We have considered the challenges involved in designing and manufacturing an IP55 rated device, particularly in relation to the two rotating camera housings that must seal throughout their range of movement. For mass manufacture we think the ideal way to produce the required sealing surfaces would be through TPE seals which would be over-moulded onto the rigid housing components.  The design of this type of system is quite complex and challenging.
Another challenge we will have to encounter would be the video compression of the two simultaneous videos. Running 2 cameras at the same time, encoding the video, and streaming it, will have the controller running at maximum speed and will consume up the battery power. Getting 3 hours or more out of the battery will be our mission.
We are fortunate to have on our team a group of world-class designers and engineers at Outerspace Design. They have a proven track record developing high-level products for over 20 years and have worked with top consumer electronics companies like BlueAnt, Quest, TMC and one of the leading smartphone case manufacturers in the world.

story:
Overview:

(We originally discussed this idea on our blog (https://shop.stearmanpress.com/blogs/news/sp-rack-stand-and-drying-rack)  and then did a survey in a newsletter. The results were encouraging, so we've launched the project.)

We've heard about people building some rather creative stands to keep their SP-445 from tipping over. Frankly, the few times it has happened to us were non-events: the lid stayed on and we just stood it back up. But a stand can provide a bit of stability and peace of mind.

On the other hand, drying the SP-445 can be quite frustrating. If you just turn the tank upside down, even hanging over the corner of your sink, there isn't enough air flow to dry it out quickly. If you leave it right side up, water pools in the bottom and it takes forever to dry out.

Note that the rack holds the tank at a slight angle to promote draining. You can even aim a small fan at it to speed things up.

The prototype works great, but will probably get a little tweaking. The only detail we're sure of: production units won't be black (we're tired of it); probably blue or green just to brighten things up.

Project details:

We're going to need to refine the design and build several more prototypes before cutting steel for the production the mold.

Then, the first production run will be at least a thousand pieces.

That all takes time and money. While seven grand isn't all that much in today's world, it's more than we want to risk without some serious, shall we say, "market validation." Hence the Indiegogo.

Just in case you've missed our SP-445 4x5 sheet film system: SP-445

story:
Hi everyone !!

I would like to thank to all the supporters for this first campaign, We have learned lots on this first Crowd funding experience.

Unfortunately the goal has not been reached but this only encourage us to make some improvements for the next crowd funding campaign.

We would like to invite you to follow our next campaign in a few weeks on KICKSTARTER under the same title, "QUADCLIP. Camera Clip & Quick Release System for Digital, SLR & GoPro Cameras"

Kind Regards

JC Martinez

After our last summer holidays I started looking for a way to carry our camera and have it accessible all the time without it hanging on the neck swinging around, carry-on bags were too bulky especially while traveling with kids.

Once back home I did an exhausting research and found a clip that I thought was a good option, but shortly after, I notice that the clip´s plate was difficult to slide in when not looking directly at the insertion slot, not really a natural gesture, also the possible directions how it can be connected was limited, the plastic mechanism will be soon wear off and furthermore it was only compatible with 2 tripod brands... and yes I did not have any of those.

This was the moment when I decided to invent a more compatible and multipurpose product with natural frontal connection gesture. Since then I´ve dedicated most of my time and resources designing, prototyping and testing a better product, finally I came with the perfect solution and named the QUADCLIP.

At this time of the project the PATENT is applied, the product is tested, the manufacturers are selected and now it is ready for production. But that´s only half of the story... now it is the time to take this project to the next step and I need your help and support to make it happen.  

You can be part of the success of this project by pre-ordering a perk from the list beside and as reward, you will obtain one of the  “First Production Run” QUADCLIP´s at a reduce price. The funds here collected will cover the costs of casting molds, CNC parts, first batch of products, packaging and distribution logistics.

That´s not the only way you can help, you can spread the word to your friends who might be looking for an easy and accessible way of carrying a camera with instant access and do great shots just like I have experienced with the QUADCLIP.

Hi, I am JC Martinez, a father, a husband,  a handyman, a passionate outdoorsman and a hobbyist Mechanical Engineer who would like to introduce to you the QUADCLIP , what I believe is "The Swiss Army Knife of Camera Clips and Quick Release Systems".


WHAT IS THE QUADCLIP?

The QUADCLIP is a multipurpose Camera Clip and Quick Release System for D & SLR Cameras and other Electronic Devices. 

QUADCLIP allows you to carry with you a DSLR camera or any device with ¼” or 3/8” screw mounting hole easily and safely to almost anywhere. Take your camera without the hassle of having the camera hanging on your neck, swinging around or inside the bag without quick access.

It’s a Quick Release System that thanks to the Hexabit connector piece it is compatible with almost all the Tripods, Monopods, Dollies, Stabilizers, Flash Brackets and other elements, surfaces, etc.

QUADCLIP can be attached to Belts, Straps, and other Standing Elements such as tripods. Your camera will be now accessible with a click. The Locking Knob prevents any accidental release of your camera. Furthermore it allows you to use your camera with hand straps or necklaces, also your camera can be safely secure to the Clamping Plates or any element by means of strap or webbing attached to one of its fixing loops.

  1. FRONTAL CONNECTION

    1. Frontal connection that makes the QUADCLIP more accessible and easy to use.

    2. You don´t need to look directly at the insertion slot in order to secure your camera.

    3. The frontal gesture is more natural as other "slide in" clip systems.

  2. QRD WITH REALEASE BUTTON

    1. The release button is in the quick release plate, which attaches to the camera making the QUADCLIP easier to detach with one hand and one finger in any position of the camera.

    2. The camera goes with you and so the control of your quick release system.

    3. The mechanism and stoppers are made with industrial grade Stainless Steel and not plastic like others... this clip strong and durable.

    4. The camera can be connected in 12 different ways with the Hexabit and Clamping plates and not only a maximum of 4 ways with the special plate.

  3. HEXABIT CONNECTOR

    1. Attach and detach your camera from almost anywhere.

    2. The HEXABIT connector piece allows quick release of your camera from almost any gadget like tripods, brackets, stabilizers, monopods, utility belts, etc., as well as any base with 1/4" or 3/8" mounting screw.

    3. You only need one Quick Release Plate and as many HEXABIT´s as gadgets you have.

    4. This is real Versatile and High Compatible Quick Release System and unlike others, Clamping Plates are not needed as an "Adapter" for your Photography gadgets.

  4. DYNAMIC CLAMPLING PLATES

    1. Tethering directly from the release attachment to the clamping plates is possible thanks to the multiple slots and loops.

    2. The QUADCLIP comprises multiple mounting screw holes to fix the Clamping Plates in many different ways and surfaces.

    3. The effective (real) clamping plate’s clearance is a bit bigger than other clips.

    4. The swivel lug nuts in the clamping plates allows an easier way to attach the plates to thicker materials, just compress the plates, insert the swivel lug nut and tighten. Forget about the hassle of compressing while twisting to tighten the plates like in other clips.

    5. In conjunction with QRD and the HEXABIT, your camera can be connected in 8 different ways.

  5. GoPro™ ACTION CAMERA COMPATIBILITY

    1. Thanks to the 1/4" mounting screw, it is possible to connect GoPro ™ standard mounting accessories directly to the clamping plates without using the release plate.


The HEXABIT, an universal and small connector piece, compatible with any tripod, dolly, monopod, etc. , with 3/8” or 1/4” mounting screw. It is made of industrial grade CNC Stainless Steel for any professional use. With multiple HEXABITS and one QRD you can connect the same camera in different places.

QRD is the Quick Release Device that fixes to your camera and allows you to easily connect the camera with the HEXABIT. It makes your camera accessible by pressing a smooth button with one single finger. It is lightweight solid Aluminum and Stainless Steel mechanism for safety and longlife use. It also comprises 3 slots to fixe safety, neck and hand straps. A safety lock avoids any risk of accidentally trigger the release button. The QRD can be connected with the HEXABIT in 12 different directions.

The CLAMPING PLATES are strong and light aluminum plates that firmly secures to belts, straps or any flat object within 76mm wide & 20mm thick (3” wide). Thanks to its slim design, the bottom plate can be pass through narrow buckles with a gap of 39mm wide & 16mm height or 6mm height by removing the lugnuts. Additionally comprises 4 slots for webbing up to 18mm wide & 2mm thick (nearly 3/4” webbing). The extra Mounting holes allows the CLAMPING PLATES to be fixed to almost anything by means of screws with 6mm diameter ( ¼” screws), those mounting holes are also thought to attach future products. The HEXABIT mounted on the CLAMPING PLATES connects to the QRD in 8 different directions.

The COVER BAG protects your camera from dust, water splash and avoids the lens without lock switch going down while walking, it is lightweight and easy to use. It comes in 4 different sizes covering most of cameras and lens sizes. It is made of nylon “ripstop”, a tough and water resistant material.


Additional accessories totally compatible with the QUADCLIP. Camera Clip & Quick Release System will be soon available.



Even when we have business agreements with serious and reliable international manufacturers, we are vulnerable to some delays caused by their schedule process. Also Customs clearance execution time varies depending on your country of residence.

If any delay or setback occurs during the execution of this project we will keep you informed and we will let you know our countermeasures.

We are going to do the best possible to meet our time schedule for this project, we want your products at the door of your house as soon as possible so you can put hands on the QUADCLIP and start your photo Adventures.

story:
GuardDrive Pro: Redundant SSD Storage

Have you ever lost important files because they weren't backed up? Do you record video with SSDs and wish there was a way to have redundant recording? Have you lost money or business because you had a storage device fail losing irreplaceable files? If you've ever had a memory card or hard drive die or if you have a business where this scenario would cost you dearly, GuardDrive Pro is the solution to your needs.

GuardDrive Pro is a fully-contained redundant storage device that fits into a standard 2.5" form factor. It works by having two separate solid state drives along with a RAID controller inside the enclosure. This raid controller seamlessly copies your data onto both drives in real-time. This means that if one of the drives or even the controller were to fail, your data would still be safe on the second drive.

Approaching redundancy in this way has many benefits! For one it allows you to add redundancy to situations where it was previously impossible such as many industry standard video recorders from companies like Atomos and Blackmagic Design. There are also no issues with compatibility as the redundant nature is totally hidden from the devices using the GuardDrive Pro. It also means that if you ever needed to, you can remove the internal drives and use them with any computer to retrieve files.

What We Need & What You Get

This is where you come in! To offer the affordable pricing that we want, we need a minimum number of drive orders to produce them in volume. All of the funding from this campaign will go directly to the production of the first batch of GuardDrive Pro units. So we're asking you to back this campaign and pre-order your GuardDrive Pro today. We've already done all of the preparation so that once the campaign is funded it won't take long to begin shipping orders.

As a reward and thank you for funding our campaign, we are offering a limited number of drives below the final retail price! So hurry and claim yours today!

The Impact

GuardDrive Pro was initially designed for professional videographers. At Meros we have extensive experience with videography and have experienced the frustrations of not having a product like the GuardDrive Pro. We love to use cameras and recorders that utilize SSDs because they're convenient, affordable, and relatively fast. However, these devices usually force you to compromise and lost redundant recording to utilize an SSD. As such the GuardDrive Pro has real tangible benefits for many use-cases. 

The funding of this campaign will also have a large impact upon the production and evolution of the GuardDrive Pro. Without your help we won't be able to offer the GuardDrive Pro at the kind of affordable pricing we want. We also won't have the capital to continue developing future versions of the GuardDrive Pro.

Performance

The GuardDrive Pro is designed for creative professionals that need the best from their devices. As such we utilize NAS-grade SSDs that are designed for 24/7 operation and heavy usage. Here are some of the performance numbers that you'll be interested in:

  • Read speeds up to 560 MB/s
  • Write speeds up to 530 MB/s
  • Up to 95K IOPS
  • Up to 1300TBW

If you're a videographer wondering what those number mean practically, here's a screenshot from the Blackmagic Disk Speed Test:

Competition

There is currently no other product on the market that is designed for video and offers this feature-set and performance. There are many SSD and flash storage providers that market to creative professionals and charge very large markups. For instance, one SSD that is specifically designed for Atomos recorders costs $200 per 500GB. It has comparable performance to the GuardDrive Pro but offers no redundancy. We offer twice the amount of internal storage, plus an advanced controller, with the same performance for less than twice the price. 

Risks & Challenges

Fortunately for you, we have taken all of the risks and challenges head on before starting this campaign. The GuardDrive Pro is complete and ready for mass production. The images and videos you see are of the final production version. All we need at this point is your help in securing volume orders with our suppliers so that we can offer the pricing you deserve.

Other Ways You Can Help

We need help spreading the word about the GuardDrive Pro, so please share our campaign with your world! 

We would also appreciate it if you follow us on social media! You can find us on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter!
 

https://facebook.com/meros.co

https://instagram.com/meros.co

https://twitter.com/meros_co

story:
Aktiv – Many Features in One simple device, Ready for action

Action Camera, Security Camera, 4K Camera, Waterproof

Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/aktiv4k/

Who is tired of having to choose between OVER EXPENSIVE  and LOW QUALITY cameras?

We have created the perfect solution for anyone in need of a camera. Smooth quality 4K video with AKTIV.

The most stable action camera. We have worked on this a lot, in order to make AKTIV as stable as possible. New technology has been integrated in AKTIV + physical stabilization.

Share with friends and family instantly!

Action camera:

With its tough exterior AKTIV can easily be taken anywhere with you. Don’t worry about dropping, or hitting it on hard surfaces.

AKTIV has been tested under water and has passed tests of up to 3.5 meters under water.  It can easily be used while doing water sports from swimming to kite boarding and surfing.  Attach it by using the special attachments.

Attach AKTIV to bikes and motorcycles while riding. Capture the best images with the stabilization that AKTIV provides. This makes it easier for you when editing the images you want to use. Most of the time these don’t even need editing.

Security- manage home security in a simple and easy way.

With the new software we are working on, Aktiv will learn your homes patterns, so that it can alert you when something is different. Keep your home safe while you are away.

Get these notifications directly to your smart phone!

Use voice control to make it easy to tell Aktiv what to do and when to do it. Start recording, take pictures, or even share with friends and family via Social Networks.

Attach Aktiv to your car and record your journey while travelling, or use it as a way to keep it safe while away for long periods of time.

Attach to the back of your vehicle and use it to help you park in hard locations.

You can also attach more than one device to see all the difficult angles.

Attach Aktiv to your helmet, or back pack while doing outdoor activities. Share instantly through the Wi-Fi connection available.Choose and cut exactly the segments that you want to share with friends and your network on any platforms.

Aktiv has a protective, shock resistant cover that is water proof, so it can be taken on all types of adventures and won’t ever be left behind.

Basically attach to any surface with the attachments available and use at any time.

Take a look at how the first prototype was made and what will be done after the campaign is over.

On the road to building AKTIV –action camera we have made many friends and collaborated with many people from all over the world.  Thank you all for your help and the insight you gave us throughout the project.

Timeline:

 

 

Whats inside the box?

Wireless charger

Extra on the go power bank

Special attachments (magnet)

Waterproof storage bag

 

Technical Specifications:

 

During the mass production process the final aspect and tech specs might vary from the original prototype.

We are aiming mostly for 2 stretch marks in order to add more features and make Aktiv as good as possible. Here they are below. 

By the way, you can help by sharing the campaign via social media, email, text etc.

 

Perks:

 

Meet the team behind this great project!

 

FAQs:

We will continue adding questions and answers here throughout the campaign. This will make the campaign clearer for any new backers that might have questions about Aktiv. Thank you everyone for your questions! 

You can contact us through the comments section, or through messages.

Q: How will you know how much battery is left?

A: You will be able to access and view through the mobile app, or the small screen if we reach that stretch goal.

Q: Will there be a mobile app for iOS and Android devices?

A: Yes, these are the 2 platforms that we are concentrating on at the moment.

Q: How do you know how much memory is left?

A: You will be able to access and view through the mobile app, or the small screen if we reach that stretch goal.

Q: Will Aktiv come with a memory card?

A: No, Aktiv will not come with a memory card.

Q: How do you change setting of your Aktiv action camera?

A: At the moment you will be able to enter the settings through the mobile app. If the stretch mark is reached, we will add a small screen where these setting can be changed.

Q: Can I connect more than one Aktiv cameras to one device?

A: Yes, we made this possible through the mobile app, so that you can capture more than one angle.

Q: What's the video recording duration for 1080P 60FPS and 32 GB of memory?

A: At 60FPS, 32 GB will record 3 hours of footage. At 30FPS, 32 GB will record 6 hours.

Q: When will perks be delivered? 

A: We estimate the shipping date for the month of May,We will definitely deliver a great product, and hope to do so on time!

story:
Short Summary

Hey, my name is Vojtech. I'm student on technical school. My specialization is IT, but I fell in love with taking photos 2 years ago. I spent my whole summer holidays working to get money for my first dslr. I was taking photos for a year and half. Recently I started recording video too. But now my camera broke and I'm not able to continue in it. 

What We Need & What You Get

More detail:

  • Your money will be used to buy a new camera. I'm mostly thinking about sony alpha A6400 because it's not so expensive but cool for recording and photography
  • My future plan is to start selling my photos, presets and tutorials.
  • You will get free access to everything to rest of your life.

My recent work

You can find the best of what I do here: http://vojtechboura.tumblr.com

story:
Short Summary

Zeso global trading was established by Ayelet & Ziv Levy in 2010 and is being managed by us ever since.

Our firm is an internet based retailer marketing sells all kinds of products such as electronics, gadgets, video games, furniture, food, toys, jewelry etc.  

In the past two years we create a New Brand : "Zeso lens" 

We undertand that everyone today use their cell phone and mobile devices to take picture and capture important momnets and there life 

We did a really big market research and understand that the market need a kit that provide all the products that needed for taken perfect picture in high qulaity 

Here is what our kit offer :

  • Become A Professional Photographer- The kit was specially designed and engineered by ZESO To Help You Take Better Pictures & videos with your mobile device.
  • Professional Camera Lens kit : 0.45X WIDE ANGLE – gives you a magnified picture + 15X MACRO LENS – shoot close up photos at a distance in from your object. Advance CPL Polarizer Filter - causing the light to scatter into what appears as haze. For all cell phones: Iphone plus 6 6plus 5s, Ipad, Galaxy 7 edge plus s7 5 s5 or any other devices. All dresses on a universal clip.
  • CELL PHONE TRIPOD: A high end mini multi-functional tripod designed especially by ZESO. Shoot still and movies. Use portable travel mini tripod and pistol grip stabilizer. Universal cell phone tripod mount adapter. Compact, lightweight and durable. Can be used for as Iphone tripod, camera tripod and all cell phone tripod stands 10cm tall and weighs just 85g.

  • BLUETOOTH WIRELESS REMOTE CONTROL: With free shutter control. Fits as a Iphone remote control an all cell phone remote control. Perfect for taking selfies and steady tripod shots. Simple & easy to set up. Long distance use.

  • It all comes in a specially designed waterproof hard case by ZESO with a shackle, so you can carry it wherever you want.

Cehck out this review for our lens kit :
 

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need your help to funding and improveour lens kit brand: what we need is only 35 usd
    Where is the money going to ?
    1. Most of the money is for manufacturing the product 
    2. Shipping the products to usa 
    3. promote our brand on socail media 
    What you get ?
    youll get a new free lens kit and be able to enjoy from the following ​Features:
     
    1. High-quality plastic clip.Allows quick and easy connection.New design universal clip can attach any 37MM Thread Digital SLR Pro Lens on your mobile.
    2. 0.45X wide angle lens for a high definition wide angle image without distortion.
    3. Built-in 15X super macro lens for extreme close-up shots 
    4. Premium Rimmed Lanthanide Glass: High quality rimmed glass reduces light reflection around lens edge 
    5. Professional High Definition: PHD Lens reduces glass flare & ghosting caused by reflections.
  • If we not reach for our goal, well still manufacter the lens kit in smaller amount and well send all the founders the donate there lens kit 

The Impact of the kit 

The perfect product for- Real estate agents, backpackers, Researchers, Students, photography lovers

Uniuqe gift for any occasion: birthday gifts, kids gift, mom&dad surprise gifts, holiday and every other opportunity to surprise your beloved

You'll be surprie from the change that lenses do !

Risks & Challenges

Like every projets, there is some risks and challenges 
Suppliers, shipmets, quality and more 

We'll do our best o prevent and solving any issue that will come up 

  • Suppliers- we are big products manufacter and wotking with our supplier for almost 3 years- we trust him and know hell do is best for us 
  • Shipments- We have a great forwarder that handle all our shipmets in the most proffesional way
    We have 3 years experience with shipments- both air & sea
  • Quality- Well hire company for inspect our products 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you want help us with out donat, please like us on facebook and help us promote our uniuqe projects :

https://www.facebook.com/zesoglobaltrading/

story:
The Game Changer in Video Camera

Testing early Idolcam prototype with Youtube Sensation, Naomi Wu aka "SexyCyborg" 

Idolcam is the world's first pocket-sized camera to harness the state-of-the-art 3 axis gimbal from drones, inter-changeable lenses from DSLR, beauty lighting from fashion photography, 180 degree flip-able touchscreen from vlogging camera and compactness and ease of use of action cameras!

 Idolcam Pledge includes everything below.

With Idolcam, you are always one click away from stunning video. Say goodbye to setups and break down and haul around a case of camera gears. Idolcam is the perfect embodiment of your favorite video gears in one tiny package!

The integrated 3 axis gimbal on Idolcam effectively compensates for movement and enables anyone to capture stable movie like videos.

You can fit all the lenses that you needed inside a match box, true compact size. Idolcam also features an innovative magnetic lens system for quick lens changes!

 While most cameras lack lighting options, we understand the importance of lighting, filling in those harsh shadows and make you look more flattering.

 With flip-able touchscreen along with an app for preview and allow control to aim of the lens, selfie is no longer limited by the length of your arm.  

Our app will allow users to preview selfies and videos and give them the ability to control the aim of the camera up to 100 ft. away. The App is currently under development.

Never been easier with Idolcam's flip-able screen, 3 axis gimbal and lightweight makes it the perfect camera to work with the selfie stick and empowers anyone to easily capture stunning videos like you have a production team.

Youtube Sensation, Naomi Wu aka "SexyCyborg" testing Idolcam!

The 3 axis gimbal provide very stable footage that will satisfy most users, but for perfectionist users, a 4th axis suspension arm will further reduce the vertical motion that 3 axis gimbal can't compensate and produce true flying motion comparable to drones and steady-cams.

Since most drones can only film forward and downward, mounting Idolcam on drones allow for filming upward for creative shots and inspecting bridges and etc.

Rc car with Idolcam and 4th axis makes a fast action filming machine for low perspective. Imagine you can capture shots going underneath a car and coming out on the other size of the car!

  •  Battery Life - Approx. 135 mins @ 2.5K, 90 mins with gimbal on.
  • For more Spec. Check out FAQ.

STRETCH GOAL #1 - $500K - Manual Exposure Control.

STRETCH GOAL #2 - $1 Million - Manual ISO Control and Digital Zoom.

 Want to see more video samples and how to use Idolcam?  Click button Below!

          We have opened up for World-wide shipping now!

 Want to stay in touch and get the latest updates on IDOLCAM, Please click "Signup" below and visit our IDOLCAM.co website to signup!

We have the concept for Idolcam for couple of years now and last year, we try to raise fund with the Idolcam 3D prototype but it didn't perform well as we want. But we didn't give up rather; we spent the past year investing in developing Idolcam to bring it near production ready state. We are passionate about Idolcam and we will make every effort to make it the best product we possibly can.

Shipping Cost 

The shipping rates are based on estimate quotes through logistic companies; however some countries may cost more than the estimated price.  Since many countries have additional cost of duty, tariffs and custom fees. When the actual shipping cost is higher than our estimate, we will have to adjust the final shipping cost at the time of shipping.

INTERNATIONAL BACKERS, please read before purchase!

**Please note, by placing an order for IDOLCAM, you understand that IDOLCAM will be FCC and EU compliance. IDOLCAM co and associates will not be responsible or, liable for any issues due to electronic compliance requirements in your local area, or country.  IDOLCAM uses a standard USB to Mini USB for charging at 5V, please check to see if this will work in your local area before importing**
