story:
Short Summary

DSLR's a are great video cameras. They have taken the indie film community by storm.
The large sensor cameras deliver great filmic pictures but are riddled with limitations.

The Camera Lock Plate attempts to solve two such limitations.

My name is Daniel and I'm a filmmaker. I fell in love with the large sensor look of the video i was getting from my Canon 550D. I wanted to make something that could make the experience of filming with a DSLR better for everyone and not just me. So I designed the Camera Lock Plate. 

External monitors and recorders are more and more frequently used with DSLR's.
It's a pity the only connection option is the mini HDMI port which is flimsy, easily damaged and very expensive to repair.




Key Features

  • Fits multiple cameras: fits Canon 6/7/60/5DMk2/Mk3 Nikon D7000/7100/600/800
  • Adjustable HDMI Lock:Adjust the clamp to fit your camera
  • Anti-Twist tripod mount: Use it to stop your camera from twisting on a rig
  • Durable design: Aircraft grade aluminium anodized to last
  • Threaded for expansion: Extra 1/4-20 UNC threaded mount points
  • Made in Norway:Supports local growth and quarantees high quality
  • HDMI diversity: Use it with all kinds of mini HDMI cables or adapters
  • Tripod plate diversity: You can use any QR plate with a locking pin and 
    adjustable threaded 3/4" bolt.

Support

I can't do this on my own, I need your pre order to finance the first run.

The manufacturing company wants me to order a minimum of 500 to make it reasonable enough priced per piece. 

What do you get?

By preordering you have the choice of the following deals.

 

Where does your money go?

Straight to my bank account after i reach my funding goal of $74000.
If I don't reach it in the time given there will be NO money. 
Therefore you can be sure that I have put all my time, money and energy into making this the best product possible- in hope of your support.

Why Indiegogo?

The idea behind the lean startup is to prove demand, and build products in a rapid, user-centered design cycle. By reaching out on Indiegogo, I can assess the demand, build a stronger relationship with you the early adopters, and use feedback to make the product as amazing as possible.

Use of Funds

I have built and funded the first prototypes myself. I have lots of positive and negative feedback that has been processed and applied to the technical drawings of the Mark 2. I need your help to take the next step. I'm looking for funds to put the Camera Lock Plate into production. You are getting in early, and getting a premium product ahead of everyone else.

The chart does not show VAT. Which is 25% in addition.

Risks

Like all business ventures this one this is no exception. Complications can and will occur. Unforeseen challenges most often present themselves when transitioning to large scale production. I have worked hard to get time estimates on hardware production and shipment based on the part and order size. The dates presented are estimates and can change.
I am fortunate to be working together with a talented team of people providing assitance and feedback all the time

This is an all or nothing adventure, so join and be part of a greater process. Lets make a great product together. 

The model shown in the pictures is a prototype and subject to change before shipping out to you.

Shipping dates are intentionally later than expected delivery time-frame. You can expect earlier deliveries.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute with funds then you can share this page with all your friends.
Thanks for your time and dedication!

Click to share with the links below:

FB http://bit.ly/shareCLPnow
Twitter http://bit.ly/tweetCLPnow
Webiste: www.cameralockplate.com

Where does your money go?
Straight to my bank account after i reach my funding goal of $74000.If I don't reach it in the time given there will be NO money. Therefore you can be sure that I have put all my time, money and energy into making this the best product possible- in hope of your support.


Why Indiegogo?
The idea behind the lean startup is to prove demand, and build products in a rapid, user-centered design cycle. By reaching out on Indiegogo, I can assess the demand, build a stronger relationship with you the early adopters, and use feedback to make the product as amazing as possible.
Use of Funds
I have built and funded the first prototypes myself. I have lots of positive and negative feedback that has been processed and applied to the technical drawings of the Mark 2. I need your help to take the next step. I'm looking for funds to put the Camera Lock Plate into production. You are getting in early, and getting a premium product ahead of everyone else.
The chart does not show VAT. Which is 25% in addition.
Risks
Like all business ventures this one this is no exception. Complications can and will occur. Unforeseen challenges most often present themselves when transitioning to large scale production. I have worked hard to get time estimates on hardware production and shipment based on the part and order size. The dates presented are estimates and can change.I am fortunate to be working together with a talented team of people providing assitance and feedback all the time
This is an all or nothing adventure, so join and be part of a greater process. Lets make a great product together. 
The model shown in the pictures is a prototype and subject to change before shipping out to you.
Shipping dates are intentionally later than expected delivery time-frame. You can expect earlier deliveries.
Other Ways You Can Help


If you can't contribute with funds then you can share this page with all your friends.Thanks for your time and dedication!
Click to share with the links below:FB http://bit.ly/shareCLPnowTwitter http://bit.ly/tweetCLPnowWebiste: www.cameralockplate.com

story:
Aktiv – Many Features in One simple device, Ready for action

Action Camera, Security Camera, 4K Camera, Waterproof

Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/aktiv4k/

Who is tired of having to choose between OVER EXPENSIVE  and LOW QUALITY cameras?

We have created the perfect solution for anyone in need of a camera. Smooth quality 4K video with AKTIV.

The most stable action camera. We have worked on this a lot, in order to make AKTIV as stable as possible. New technology has been integrated in AKTIV + physical stabilization.

Share with friends and family instantly!

Action camera:

With its tough exterior AKTIV can easily be taken anywhere with you. Don’t worry about dropping, or hitting it on hard surfaces.

AKTIV has been tested under water and has passed tests of up to 3.5 meters under water.  It can easily be used while doing water sports from swimming to kite boarding and surfing.  Attach it by using the special attachments.

Attach AKTIV to bikes and motorcycles while riding. Capture the best images with the stabilization that AKTIV provides. This makes it easier for you when editing the images you want to use. Most of the time these don’t even need editing.

Security- manage home security in a simple and easy way.

With the new software we are working on, Aktiv will learn your homes patterns, so that it can alert you when something is different. Keep your home safe while you are away.

Get these notifications directly to your smart phone!

Use voice control to make it easy to tell Aktiv what to do and when to do it. Start recording, take pictures, or even share with friends and family via Social Networks.

Attach Aktiv to your car and record your journey while travelling, or use it as a way to keep it safe while away for long periods of time.

Attach to the back of your vehicle and use it to help you park in hard locations.

You can also attach more than one device to see all the difficult angles.

Attach Aktiv to your helmet, or back pack while doing outdoor activities. Share instantly through the Wi-Fi connection available.Choose and cut exactly the segments that you want to share with friends and your network on any platforms.

Aktiv has a protective, shock resistant cover that is water proof, so it can be taken on all types of adventures and won’t ever be left behind.

Basically attach to any surface with the attachments available and use at any time.

Take a look at how the first prototype was made and what will be done after the campaign is over.

On the road to building AKTIV –action camera we have made many friends and collaborated with many people from all over the world.  Thank you all for your help and the insight you gave us throughout the project.

Timeline:

 

 

Whats inside the box?

Wireless charger

Extra on the go power bank

Special attachments (magnet)

Waterproof storage bag

 

Technical Specifications:

 

During the mass production process the final aspect and tech specs might vary from the original prototype.

We are aiming mostly for 2 stretch marks in order to add more features and make Aktiv as good as possible. Here they are below. 

By the way, you can help by sharing the campaign via social media, email, text etc.

 

Perks:

 

Meet the team behind this great project!

 

FAQs:

We will continue adding questions and answers here throughout the campaign. This will make the campaign clearer for any new backers that might have questions about Aktiv. Thank you everyone for your questions! 

You can contact us through the comments section, or through messages.

Q: How will you know how much battery is left?

A: You will be able to access and view through the mobile app, or the small screen if we reach that stretch goal.

Q: Will there be a mobile app for iOS and Android devices?

A: Yes, these are the 2 platforms that we are concentrating on at the moment.

Q: How do you know how much memory is left?

A: You will be able to access and view through the mobile app, or the small screen if we reach that stretch goal.

Q: Will Aktiv come with a memory card?

A: No, Aktiv will not come with a memory card.

Q: How do you change setting of your Aktiv action camera?

A: At the moment you will be able to enter the settings through the mobile app. If the stretch mark is reached, we will add a small screen where these setting can be changed.

Q: Can I connect more than one Aktiv cameras to one device?

A: Yes, we made this possible through the mobile app, so that you can capture more than one angle.

Q: What's the video recording duration for 1080P 60FPS and 32 GB of memory?

A: At 60FPS, 32 GB will record 3 hours of footage. At 30FPS, 32 GB will record 6 hours.

Q: When will perks be delivered? 

A: We estimate the shipping date for the month of May,We will definitely deliver a great product, and hope to do so on time!

story:
Our Story

Our company develops and designs non-standard technical solutions. One day we saw some photos in 3D format on sale. There were famous sights of the world on them, but they can be bought only in some big cities.

So we thought: “How great it would be to see yourself and your friends on such 3D photo, within a few minutes”.

So we started to realize this idea.

At present we have created a mobile and fully autonomous photo module that looks like a travelling suitcase.

Just within 3-4 minutes you will get a photo in 3D with the unforgettable moment of your life. The photo could be placed everywhere you want and will remind you of this moment many times (not once).

 

It’s possible to make (take) photos in the evenings as well, and it’s very important that you can see everything clearly on them. It’s all because of the specially designed (engineered) illumination.

It’s worth seeing!    

Our development company employs 3 people. We develop (create) photomodule, photographs and optical lenses. Support our project financially so we can mass produce 3D photomodules and photographs with an optical system.

Our company is open for cooperation and partnership.

Inside each gift photo-card you will see a photo in 3D format, namely:

1) in the photo-card "girl" - a 3D photo with a girl in underwear;

2) in the photo-card "airplane" - a 3D photo with the pilot's cabin;

3) in the photo-card "car" - 3D photo with the salon of the car;

4) in the photo-card "fruit" - a 3D photo with fresh fruits and berries;

5) in the photo-card "tea" - a 3D photo with a kettle where tea is pouring into a mug.

story:
The Hubblo PX6 is a bleeding edge all-in-one ultra portable VR broadcasting system that allows you to painlessly set-up and live stream to an audience in less than 30 seconds.

“Artists, performers, event hosts, and anyone who wants to expand their audience beyond a physical location can simply do it with the push of a button.”

CEO Eric Tsang

After reaching the finals of Last Gadget Standing at CES 2017, live-streaming the Samsung booth at Mobile World Congress 2017 and being written about over 300 times, Hubblo’s bleeding edge prosumer camera is finally ready for project backers.

 

Real-Time Stitching, 4K Live Streaming

Whereas most VR cameras require you to do the image stitching yourself, Hubblo does all the hard work in camera, saving hours of tedious post-processing. It gathers data from all six cameras simultaneously; correcting and stitching images in real-time to create a stunning 360° spherical, 3D-immersive video stream. The video can be broadcasted or stored in 4K 30fps quality, and viewed with any cellphone VR headset using the Hubblo iOS and Android apps.

Using biomimicry to simulate immersive 3D vision, as well as in-hardware (not software) processing, the PX6 offers VR prosumers and enthusiasts a long awaited one-click solution that’s about the same height as an iPhone 6.

The triangular design delivers 360° spherical, panoramic vision with three pairs of 200° fish-eye lenses. Dedicated sensors on each lens provide the high quality image-capture free from gaps at the top or bottom of the image creating true-to-life depth perception for a fully-immersive 3D experience.


For professionals who need to show multiple scenes simultaneously,  connect multiple PX6 cameras to a live-streaming server and you have a very powerful, affordable VR broadcasting platform that’s suitable for huge events with massive audience interactions.

The Hubblo VR camera is portable and lightweight, handheld or tripod mountable. The height of the camera is less than an iPhone 6! You don’t need any additional software, just high speed Internet access and cell phone apps that can be downloaded for iOS or Android. Setup is easy as can be; just connect to your network and live stream at the click of a button. 

Hubblo, isn’t only looks, speed and futuristic tech, it’s also a safe bet. The PX6 is being created by a 20+ member team - led by CEO Eric Tsang - a former Silicon Valley engineer who worked for the likes of OPTi, bFrame Logic and Broadcom. After 10 years in the US, Eric came back to Shanghai and went on to found two startups including Montage Technology Group that achieved IPO and a 70+ million dollar valuation.

From left to right, top to bottom: Eric (CEO), Dan (Global Marketing), Sunny (App designer), Stephen (Hardware engineer), Max (Social media), Peter (Hardware engineer), Craig (General Manager), Janus (Hardware engineer), Myka (Social media), Supercat (App designer), Jack (Software engineer), Tina (Graphic designer), Lucky (App designer), Somepig (App designer), Vincent (Software engineer), Warnus (Software engineer), Jane (Accounting), Steve (Hardware engineer), Yuntao (Software engineer), Bobby (Graphic designer)

Lexy Savvides demoes Hubblo VR live streaming for CNET

CES 2017 & Last Gadget Standing Finalist

Hubblo soft launched at CES 2017 in Las Vegas, where thousands of guests and industry experts demoed the camera live streaming. It stood up to the test, live streaming for 9+ hours at a time without fail and receiving rave reviews. Also we were one of just ten Last Gadget Standing finalists! 

Hubblo PX6 Specifications

 

  • 3D 360° video: 4K, 30fps
  • 2D 360° video: 2K, 30fps
  • 30 Mbps (bitrate) MP4

  • Optimum bandwidth 3D 360° live stream: 3840*2160 (16:9)
  • Low bandwidth 3D 360° live stream: 2160*2160 (1:1 ratio)
  • 2D 360° live stream: 2160*1080 (2:1)
  • H.264 codec, RTSP/RTMP (protocol), 15Mbps (optimum bandwidth)
  • Share: Facebook, YouTube, Twitter, WhatsApp, Messenger, WeChat

  • 3D 360° photo: 3840*2160 (16:9), 2160*2160 (1:1)
  • 2D 360° photo: 2160*1080 (2:1)
  • JPG

  • Lenses: 6 x 200° fish-eye, F2.6 Aperture

  • Sensors: 6 x 3.15MP

  • Connectivity: WiFi 802.11n/ac, Bluetooth, MicroUSB

  • Storage: 32Gb internal, 128Gb MicroSD, Smartphone (64Gb = 4.5hr, 4K, 30fps)

  • Audio: Built-in stereo microphone, Wireless Bluetooth microphone

  • Power: 12V DC adapter, 4000mAH removable battery (up to 1-hour standard use)

  • Dimensions: 103mm x 103mm x 124mm

  • Weight:  >800g

  • Material: Aluminum Alloy

  • Apps: Hubblo VR Player, Hubblo VR Camera Control, Hubblo VR Live (iOS & Android)

Prototype Sample Videos

 
Shanghai Pearl Tower: Download video from Google Drive
 

Shanghai Joy-ride: Download video from Google Drive

 

Bubbles in Barcelona: Download video from Google Drive

 

Download sample photos from Google Drive

​

Availability

The Hubblo VR camera is at the stage of creating manufacturing samples. Expect mass production this summer and delivery by July 2017.

Exclusive, Live VR Events

Between April and July you can tune-in on the Hubblo VR Live app to watch exclusive live streaming events, broadcasted by Hubblo, 360° and 3D. Be one of the first to demo the Hubblo VR Live app in Beta mode by backing us just one buck!  

FAQ

 

Q: Are 6 lenses enough to capture a 360° panorama?

A: Some cameras use just 1 or 2 lenses, others use 12 or more! Less lenses means lower quality, but more lenses can mean mountains of data. Hubblo PX6 is designed to be both portable and high quality. Watch our sample videos to see for yourself!

 

Q: Why is real-time stitching technology such a big deal?

A: With real-time stitching you not only save bags of money on software, but also a lot of time. Manually post-processing a short video could take hours and involve a highly complex workflow. On top of all that, real-time stitching makes live streaming as simple as point and shoot. Until Hubblo came along real-time stitching and 3D 360 4K live streaming was only possible for professionals. Now anyone can do it with the push of a button!

 

Q: Is the stitching template-based or optical flow?

A: Optical flow requires 10-fold computation, which is very big and very hungry! If you’re not making a Hollywood movie then all that power is very inefficient, so the PX6 uses template-based stitching instead. It means you can achieve optimal quality for today’s technology, along with an affordable price tag.

 

Q: Does the PX6 perform well in low light?

A: You can control exposure using the Hubblo Camera Control smartphone app, available for iOS and Android.

 

Q: How is the battery life and potential for overheating?

A: With a 4000mAH battery we estimate you could live stream for around 1 hour. The smartphone app has a battery status indicator so you’ll know how much juice you’ve got left. If you need to recharge, it will take around 3 hours to charge from scratch. You can also use a 10,000mAH external power pack to increase its longevity. Heat dissipation depends on the environment. If you’re heading to the Sahara desert then bring a few ice packs along with you… The PX6 is constructed from aluminum-alloy with air intakes at the top and bottom, as well as a fan for increased ventilation.

 

Q: What accessories will I need?

A: The Hubblo PX6 is a standalone camera so you don’t really need any accessories beyond an external battery pack or power adapter and a smartphone. The stitching is optimized so the camera can be mounted on a monopod or tripod (via a standard 1/4 inch tripod mount) with no blind spot below. Additionally, if you need to capture ambisonic audio or clear speech we recommend you use external microphones which can be connected to the camera via a 3.5mm mic jack on the camera.

 

Q: How much video can I record at once?

A: The camera itself has 32GB internal memory, plus a Micro-SD card slot supporting up to 128GB*. At 4K 30fps, we estimate you could record for around 4.5 hours with just 64GB. The smartphone app will show you how much space you have left. If you’re live streaming, however, the capacity for cloud storage is practically limitless.

* SD card not included. PX6 supports micro SD cards upto SDHC and SDXC.

 

Q: Does Hubblo offer a warranty?

A: We offer a one-year warranty for hardware faults. Terms and conditions apply.

 

Q: Will you offer worldwide delivery?

A: We will definitely deliver to the USA, Europe and most of Asia. If you can’t find your country listed on Indiegogo then please contact us to confirm.

 

Q: When will the Hubblo PX6 be ready for delivery?

A: Production is scheduled for June and delivery in July.

 

Q: Is there an HDR mode?

A: The PX6 doesn’t support HDR.

 

Q: What is the wifi range?

A: The effective range is 10 - 20 meters.

 

Q: Will the API be made available?

A: Yes.

Performance Without Compromise

Eric Tsang, a hardware pioneer who worked at OPTi, Broadcom, and bFrame Logic is a self-proclaimed “hardware geek” with a special interest in video related technology. He started Hubblo out of frustration with the trade-offs in existing 3D recording technology. “We wanted to deliver an all-in-one package: 4K live streaming and great stitching; 360-degrees and full 3D vision; affordability and great design. None of the winners of this year’s CES Innovation Awards in virtual reality categories, for example, have all of these features in a single package.”

His last startup project, Montage Technology Group reached IPO in 2014 valuing over $70 million. He headed the main product line, TV set top boxes that accounted for around 90% of the company’s profits at the time of IPO.

The Hubblo team has developed patent-pending hardware algorithms that deliver stunning video correction and stitching using FPGA (Field-Programmable Gate Array) as the developing framework, and optimizing the outcome with RTL (Register Transfer Level) hardware programming logic. “We are making products for 2 to 3 years in the future, not copying something that already exists,” Tsang said.  “Our core innovation has to do with video streaming quality and immersiveness; this tech is at least one year ahead of the market.”

About Hubblo Technology

Hubblo Technology is a leading developer of pro-consumer grade VR technology for artists, performers, and anyone that wants to share a live, 3D-immersive experience with remote audiences. The company’s flagship product, the Hubblo PX6 offers an unprecedented combination of features including 360° recording, 4K resolution, real-time stitching, and live streaming for just $999*. Hubblo Technology was founded by video technology pioneer Eric Tsang and has offices in China and Silicon Valley. For more information visit www.hubblovr.com

* For the special Indiegogo $999 price, purchase our "Power to the people!" perk.

 

Hubblo at Venture Beat and Tom's Hardware.

Download sample photos from Google Drive
​AvailabilityThe Hubblo VR camera is at the stage of creating manufacturing samples. Expect mass production this summer and delivery by July 2017.Exclusive, Live VR EventsBetween April and July you can tune-in on the Hubblo VR Live app to watch exclusive live streaming events, broadcasted by Hubblo, 360° and 3D. Be one of the first to demo the Hubblo VR Live app in Beta mode by backing us just one buck!  
FAQ
 
Q: Are 6 lenses enough to capture a 360° panorama?A: Some cameras use just 1 or 2 lenses, others use 12 or more! Less lenses means lower quality, but more lenses can mean mountains of data. Hubblo PX6 is designed to be both portable and high quality. Watch our sample videos to see for yourself! Q: Why is real-time stitching technology such a big deal?A: With real-time stitching you not only save bags of money on software, but also a lot of time. Manually post-processing a short video could take hours and involve a highly complex workflow. On top of all that, real-time stitching makes live streaming as simple as point and shoot. Until Hubblo came along real-time stitching and 3D 360 4K live streaming was only possible for professionals. Now anyone can do it with the push of a button! Q: Is the stitching template-based or optical flow?A: Optical flow requires 10-fold computation, which is very big and very hungry! If you’re not making a Hollywood movie then all that power is very inefficient, so the PX6 uses template-based stitching instead. It means you can achieve optimal quality for today’s technology, along with an affordable price tag. Q: Does the PX6 perform well in low light?A: You can control exposure using the Hubblo Camera Control smartphone app, available for iOS and Android. Q: How is the battery life and potential for overheating?A: With a 4000mAH battery we estimate you could live stream for around 1 hour. The smartphone app has a battery status indicator so you’ll know how much juice you’ve got left. If you need to recharge, it will take around 3 hours to charge from scratch. You can also use a 10,000mAH external power pack to increase its longevity. Heat dissipation depends on the environment. If you’re heading to the Sahara desert then bring a few ice packs along with you… The PX6 is constructed from aluminum-alloy with air intakes at the top and bottom, as well as a fan for increased ventilation. Q: What accessories will I need?A: The Hubblo PX6 is a standalone camera so you don’t really need any accessories beyond an external battery pack or power adapter and a smartphone. The stitching is optimized so the camera can be mounted on a monopod or tripod (via a standard 1/4 inch tripod mount) with no blind spot below. Additionally, if you need to capture ambisonic audio or clear speech we recommend you use external microphones which can be connected to the camera via a 3.5mm mic jack on the camera. Q: How much video can I record at once?A: The camera itself has 32GB internal memory, plus a Micro-SD card slot supporting up to 128GB*. At 4K 30fps, we estimate you could record for around 4.5 hours with just 64GB. The smartphone app will show you how much space you have left. If you’re live streaming, however, the capacity for cloud storage is practically limitless.* SD card not included. PX6 supports micro SD cards upto SDHC and SDXC. Q: Does Hubblo offer a warranty?A: We offer a one-year warranty for hardware faults. Terms and conditions apply. Q: Will you offer worldwide delivery?A: We will definitely deliver to the USA, Europe and most of Asia. If you can’t find your country listed on Indiegogo then please contact us to confirm. Q: When will the Hubblo PX6 be ready for delivery?A: Production is scheduled for June and delivery in July. Q: Is there an HDR mode?A: The PX6 doesn’t support HDR. Q: What is the wifi range?A: The effective range is 10 - 20 meters. Q: Will the API be made available?A: Yes.Performance Without CompromiseEric Tsang, a hardware pioneer who worked at OPTi, Broadcom, and bFrame Logic is a self-proclaimed “hardware geek” with a special interest in video related technology. He started Hubblo out of frustration with the trade-offs in existing 3D recording technology. “We wanted to deliver an all-in-one package: 4K live streaming and great stitching; 360-degrees and full 3D vision; affordability and great design. None of the winners of this year’s CES Innovation Awards in virtual reality categories, for example, have all of these features in a single package.”His last startup project, Montage Technology Group reached IPO in 2014 valuing over $70 million. He headed the main product line, TV set top boxes that accounted for around 90% of the company’s profits at the time of IPO.The Hubblo team has developed patent-pending hardware algorithms that deliver stunning video correction and stitching using FPGA (Field-Programmable Gate Array) as the developing framework, and optimizing the outcome with RTL (Register Transfer Level) hardware programming logic. “We are making products for 2 to 3 years in the future, not copying something that already exists,” Tsang said.  “Our core innovation has to do with video streaming quality and immersiveness; this tech is at least one year ahead of the market.”About Hubblo TechnologyHubblo Technology is a leading developer of pro-consumer grade VR technology for artists, performers, and anyone that wants to share a live, 3D-immersive experience with remote audiences. The company’s flagship product, the Hubblo PX6 offers an unprecedented combination of features including 360° recording, 4K resolution, real-time stitching, and live streaming for just $999*. Hubblo Technology was founded by video technology pioneer Eric Tsang and has offices in China and Silicon Valley. For more information visit www.hubblovr.com* For the special Indiegogo $999 price, purchase our "Power to the people!" perk. Hubblo at Venture Beat and Tom's Hardware.

story:
My name is Scott Simontacchi. If you know me, I have probably taken your picture because I love photography and filmmaking. Two weeks ago my trusty camera of 6 years decided to kick the bucket, so it's time for me to move on.

I have been a professional photographer in the Nashville community for approximately 6 years. I have shot for many record labels and artists. I have been fortunate enough to make my living through my art. The expense of replacing my camera has been an overwhelming thought for me. Any help at all would be greatly appreciated! I feel very confident that the packages listed are well worth the price. I will commit to fulfilling and exceeding the expectations of those who contribute.

I hope you enjoy the short silent film I made to help promote the project! 

If I reach my goal I would like to purchase a canon 5d Mark III and 1 L-series lens.

 

Please feel free to check out my website www.sksimage.com

 

 

best,

 

Scott Simontacchi

best,
 
Scott Simontacchi

story:
The Scoop

Your contribution will change humanity:  

  • My goal is to help others and this drone will do just that!
  • Currently our media company helps out in the community and we love to make movies!
  • By your donations, you will make small children smile and bring production value globally, YES GLOBALLY!

You can change HUMANITY! 

What We Need & What You Get

Phantom 4 Pro Plus or Inspire Series Drone

  • $2000 will go towards the purchase of the Phantom 4 Pro Plus or Inspire Drone from DJI
  • With your contribution I will personally take an aerial photo and send it to you for you to do with it what you wish :) I'll make it cool of course (copyright free)
  • Once we reach our goal we'll be working on multiple movie products and I will be doing commercial work // Also doing work in the community!!!

The Impact

This will not be solely for our gain. 

  • As an U.S Air Force Veteran and someone who has traveled to Afghanistan and other countries we will make a difference with this drone. 
  • 15+ Years Aviation Experience that will contribute to a greater cause and make movies!
  • We are asking to get others involved because we want you to be apart of this journey!

Risks & Challenges

While $2,000 seems like pocket change for some, for us it's not. 

  • The Drone is going to assist in commercial work and in the community.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand if you don't have money so here are some ways you can help!:

  • check out our Facebook page! Leave us a review! (good one please :)  ) 
  • Share with your friends! --- Jerry is asking for money to buy a drone LOL! 

Thank you for all your help!! And I look forward to seeing your contribution no matter how big or small!!

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it’s important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it’s going. Be transparent and specific—people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don’t reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that’s all there is to it.

story:
Hello! Good to see you here. We are a team of professionals from Finland. We wanted to create modern photo and video light for our own use as there wasn't suitable product available on the market. The prototype turned out to be so good that we wanted to turn it to a real product. Now we need your help to get the production up and running and lights flashing!

We have designed totally new high quality flash and constant light source for photography and video recording. It is fully featured and ready to use out of the box. It features micro-controller and it can be updated and you can make changes to the firmware as you want, it's open source.


The world's first programmable flash for photography and videography.


You can use it as a flash or as a constant light source. It’s also possible to combine these two to get modelling light and flash.

It is really fast and easy to create different lighting setups with the VALO flash. Use it as main light, hair light, fill light or background light.

Take one VALO with you for a photo walk or crate large studio lighting setups, you can always add on.

  • Flash and video light in one
  • Modular design to build huge light panels or just use as single light source.
  • Adjustable color temperature 2700K...5700K via mobile app
  • Power control via mobile app
  • Compatible with Android and iPhone/iPad
  • Zero flash recycling time
  • Wireless radio frequency triggering
  • Easy to use and get started. Endless possibilities via programming.
  • Compatible with all cameras with hot shoe or flash port.
  • Custom functions: Flash, Modelling Light, Flash + Modelling Light, Strobe
  • Snap connect flash to another. No wires!
  • Standard 3/8" thread on bottom for easy mounting
  • Internal battery. Charging via USB connector
  • Sync via hot shoe, sync cable, light sensitive slave or go wireless 
  • Black, non reflective housing
  • Powerful and energy efficient LEDs
  • Made of high quality materials


The flash units connect to each other by neodymium magnets. Electrical connection is made by contacts on each side. There is no need to connect any wires or adapters. This makes VALO the fastest and easiest to use LED flash on the market.


You don't have to have flat light source anymore. With VALO you can have 1/4 circle, half circle or even full circle of light and get creative! You can even make custom shapes, for example letters.


Technical specifications are subject to change. The features and values here are considered as minimum requirement for the design.


To get the most out of your VALO we suggest using four or more units interconnected. This ensures powerful and even light from larger area to complement the subject.

There is 1 inch graphic display and control buttons on back of the unit. The high power LED’s are on the front. Contacts for interconnecting the units are on each side.



After initial planning the concept was clear and we were ready to push the project forward. The fun part for engineers.

Schematic and PCB design

Mechanical design

Programming


The fully functional VALO prototype has shown its power!

The R&D lab.

Testing the VALO prototype

Let there be light!

Display and control buttons (under development)
Some other LED lights can give you green, flat and dull results because of low colour rendering index or CRI. VALO flash features high CRI LEDs to give you the best results.

Jari Laaksolahti (Founder & Designer)

Jari  has bachelors degree in electronics and ten years of work experience in electronics design. The electrical devices has been in his interest since 5 years old. At that age he wanted to break apart every toy and see whats inside.

His interest for photography rise a bit later when he turned 20. "At first I shoot on film and later I had a change to get one of the first digital cameras. The picture quality was poor, but you could see the image immediately which was great." Later on he have self studied photography and attended to several courses. He says: "I consider myself as self learned semi-professional photographer."

Elina Ahonen (Communications specialist)

Elina is specialised in international relations and interpreting. She also has experience in sales and marketing. 

Jarno Paavola (Digital Superhero)

Jarno is professional in everything digital. He has strong experience in graphics and video production. He is also specialised in Web design.

Special thanks for support to:

Tero, Kimmo, Mikko, Jukka, Kirsi, Sauli and Topshot Oy




The development will go on. This is just a beginning!
There will be several accessories available for the VALO flash. There will be a passive unit available which works as a slave unit. The passive unit will not have a display and buttons on it therefore it will be priced lower. There will also be different kinds of brackets for creative lighting. 
Spare batteries and high capacity chargers will be available as well.
You are welcome to download the source code and develop your own custom features and share it with the community.

Any ideas on how to further develop the VALO are highly appreciated.

Be the first to get the VALO flash and get creative! 
Help us to do what engineers do best - engineering!  
With your help we can make this real!
For inspiration check out Jaris pic-per-day project at:
www.facebook.com/Project365Photo
and professional photography site:
http://decent.pictures.fi/
For additional info and "behind the scenes" check out VALO blog at:
http://avoinyhtio.blogspot.fi/

All the photographers and film makers that have tested the prototype are very excited about it as it is an all in one solution.

  • Get your perks!
  • Hit the share button and spread the word!
  • Recommend VALO to your friends!
Let's make VALO reality for the photography and videography community!

I´m not choosing flexible funding for one reason. I want you to trust me that this money will be spent on the lens, and nothing else. I´m not going to lie about being "ashamed" to ask for money.

I´m not.

If you donate to my cause i´d gladly show you what i will make with the lens.

story:
Your personal aerial photographer and HD video recorder.

 

https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/929724207855943680

 

We aimed at designing a simple, user-friendly and affordable drone for everyone and everywhere.

 

https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/929724410482663424

 

The Fun’s stable and lightweight design allows you to put it flat on your palm.

This space efficiency makes it very easy to take on the go.

With HD camera and the user-friendly smartphone app, you can take an aerial shoot easier than ever.

 

https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/929724730159939584

https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/929724871386456064

 

Fun drone features high-performance camera that delivers HD UHD 30fps video and 8-megapixel images.

Not to mention it offers multiple shooting modes: Sweep Panorama mode, Continuous capture mode, Delay capture mode.

The Fun will become your personal Self-Flying photographer!

 

https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/929725344151625728

 

Using visual detection technology, the Fun drone can track your face or body and accompany you on every step of your journey.

It can auto follow you and taking videos, just turn on the auto-tracking and put your smartphone into the pocket to enjoy a ‘hand-free’ flying experience.

 

 

Fun features one optical flow sensor and ultrasonic sensor, together with SLAM 3D technology, it can hover and clear shot every time.

 

https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/929725899749990400

 

With electronic stabilizer, which is built to withstand turbulence and reduce the rolling shutter effect, Fun can give you blur-free footage and images.

The initial design focused on the drone stabilization alone; we have further optimised the original design with the electronic stabilizer, making Fun one of a kind on the market.

*Actual shot from Fun Drone

 

https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/929726203044364289

https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/929726426969808896

 

Fun drone can return to its home point automatically with sufficient GPS signal.

If the battery gets too low, the connection is lost, or you hit the Return to Home (RTH) button, Fun flies back to the present home point.

 

Outdoor precise localization: Features dual-band GPS, Palm knows exactly where it is, even you don’t.

https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/929726779220037632

 

Fun features a 4-inch tri-blade propellers powered by the 1906- brushless motor.

Powerful propulsion offers steady flight even with strong wind up to 11 mph (18 kph).

It comes with three different flight modes (Low, Medium, High sensitivity mode) to meet individual needs.

With such an advanced flight control system, excitement and immersive experience are guaranteed!

Uncompromised flight time: With a fully-charged battery, Fun gives you a flight time up to 12 minutes, which is unbeatable in the drone category.

 

Easy launching & landing, even on the palm of your hand: Unlike other drones, Fun Air Camera features enclosure protector.

You could safely grab and release it with your hand, perfect for both indoor and outdoor use.

Protective Design makes it safe for all-ages and flying indoors: Safe plastic enclosures protect your fingers and allow hassle-free indoor flight.

 

Easy carry:  Weighing only 43g, Contains the battery only 300g.

Fun can be flat on your hand, a easy to load your package in the size of the phone; let you share your happiness anytime and anywhere.

Your photos and videos immediately sync to your iPhone/Android storage.

Fun app features automatic editing templates and an array of filters.

You can quickly edit videos and share them straight to social media.

 

http://https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/929727295534665728

 

 

Fun features a 1,250mAh high capacity battery, and the charging dock can be connected to the main power through a DC adapter, USB-C port or type C cable charger.

This means the battery can easily be charged with a wall/car charger or with a power bank.

The free iOS and Android app are easy to set up and even easier to use.

It only takes you 30 seconds to learn how to fly Fun.

Just Connect and Fly

With Three simple steps, Palm is incredibly easy to use

                                                 See what you get in the Fun Drone Pack:

 

https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/929727741431185409

 

 

We are the leading R & D and manufacturer of unmanned aerial vehicle control systems and unmanned aerial vehicle solutions.

Through continuous innovation, committed to the UAV industry, industry users and professional aerial applications to provide the most powerful, best experience revolutionary intelligent flight control products and Solutions

Dedicated to unmanned aerial vehicle high-tech intelligent manufacturing plant, in 2016 through the SGS institutions ISO9001:2015 quality management system certification.
  

We will process shipments in the order that we receive them.

Those who pre-order first through this campaign will receive their Fun drone from the very first production batches after they are fully tested and ready for mass production.

If you have any question regarding to the shipping,

Please contact feichichuangxin@hotmail.com.

Orders placed now will begin shipping in December 2017
*Actual ship dates may vary. we will keep you notified of your product ship date.

We are offering the exclusive early birds discount on Indiegogo. And we are able to ship worldwide. And free shipping for most of the regions of the world. Please see perk details for the shipping cost that applies to you
story_txt: Your personal aerial photographer and HD video recorder. https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/929724207855943680 We aimed at designing a simple, user-friendly and affordable drone for everyone and everywhere. https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/929724410482663424 The Fun’s stable and lightweight design allows you to put it flat on your palm.This space efficiency makes it very easy to take on the go.With HD camera and the user-friendly smartphone app, you can take an aerial shoot easier than ever. https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/929724730159939584https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/929724871386456064 Fun drone features high-performance camera that delivers HD UHD 30fps video and 8-megapixel images.Not to mention it offers multiple shooting modes: Sweep Panorama mode, Continuous capture mode, Delay capture mode.The Fun will become your personal Self-Flying photographer! https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/929725344151625728 Using visual detection technology, the Fun drone can track your face or body and accompany you on every step of your journey.It can auto follow you and taking videos, just turn on the auto-tracking and put your smartphone into the pocket to enjoy a ‘hand-free’ flying experience.  Fun features one optical flow sensor and ultrasonic sensor, together with SLAM 3D technology, it can hover and clear shot every time. https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/929725899749990400 With electronic stabilizer, which is built to withstand turbulence and reduce the rolling shutter effect, Fun can give you blur-free footage and images.The initial design focused on the drone stabilization alone; we have further optimised the original design with the electronic stabilizer, making Fun one of a kind on the market.*Actual shot from Fun Drone https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/929726203044364289https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/929726426969808896 Fun drone can return to its home point automatically with sufficient GPS signal.If the battery gets too low, the connection is lost, or you hit the Return to Home (RTH) button, Fun flies back to the present home point. Outdoor precise localization: Features dual-band GPS, Palm knows exactly where it is, even you don’t.https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/929726779220037632 Fun features a 4-inch tri-blade propellers powered by the 1906- brushless motor.Powerful propulsion offers steady flight even with strong wind up to 11 mph (18 kph).It comes with three different flight modes (Low, Medium, High sensitivity mode) to meet individual needs.With such an advanced flight control system, excitement and immersive experience are guaranteed!Uncompromised flight time: With a fully-charged battery, Fun gives you a flight time up to 12 minutes, which is unbeatable in the drone category. Easy launching & landing, even on the palm of your hand: Unlike other drones, Fun Air Camera features enclosure protector.You could safely grab and release it with your hand, perfect for both indoor and outdoor use.Protective Design makes it safe for all-ages and flying indoors: Safe plastic enclosures protect your fingers and allow hassle-free indoor flight. Easy carry:  Weighing only 43g, Contains the battery only 300g.Fun can be flat on your hand, a easy to load your package in the size of the phone; let you share your happiness anytime and anywhere.Your photos and videos immediately sync to your iPhone/Android storage.Fun app features automatic editing templates and an array of filters.You can quickly edit videos and share them straight to social media. http://https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/929727295534665728  Fun features a 1,250mAh high capacity battery, and the charging dock can be connected to the main power through a DC adapter, USB-C port or type C cable charger.This means the battery can easily be charged with a wall/car charger or with a power bank.The free iOS and Android app are easy to set up and even easier to use.It only takes you 30 seconds to learn how to fly Fun.Just Connect and FlyWith Three simple steps, Palm is incredibly easy to use                                                 See what you get in the Fun Drone Pack: https://twitter.com/twitter/statuses/929727741431185409  We are the leading R & D and manufacturer of unmanned aerial vehicle control systems and unmanned aerial vehicle solutions.Through continuous innovation, committed to the UAV industry, industry users and professional aerial applications to provide the most powerful, best experience revolutionary intelligent flight control products and SolutionsDedicated to unmanned aerial vehicle high-tech intelligent manufacturing plant, in 2016 through the SGS institutions ISO9001:2015 quality management system certification.  We will process shipments in the order that we receive them.Those who pre-order first through this campaign will receive their Fun drone from the very first production batches after they are fully tested and ready for mass production.If you have any question regarding to the shipping,Please contact feichichuangxin@hotmail.com.Orders placed now will begin shipping in December 2017*Actual ship dates may vary. we will keep you notified of your product ship date.We are offering the exclusive early birds discount on Indiegogo. And we are able to ship worldwide. And free shipping for most of the regions of the world. Please see perk details for the shipping cost that applies to you

story:
What would the world look like if you experienced time a hundred times as fast?


Buildings would spring into existence. You would see trees bend towards the light. People would move too quickly to be seen. The sun would streak through the sky like a bullet. Sounds impossible?

The $16 Light Wait Camera lets you see that.


By focusing light onto a piece of Photographic Paper for long periods of time [from weeks to years] the Light Wait Camera [LWC] captures trails left by the sun. Traditional landmarks gain an ephemeral feel, as the movements of people and vehicles are too fast to be captured on a Solargraph. 

A Pinhole Camera uses a really small hole as its "lens" - no complicated optics required. The tiny hole enables a sharp picture to be formed on the film. The LWC is essentially a solargraphy-optimized analogue pinhole camera. But with the super long exposures involved, there's no messy chemicals, no darkroom equipment, no safelights to worry about. Your film comes out of the camera fully exposed and developed. To digitise your shots, all you need is a scanner or even a mobile phone's camera. 

In other words, it's a ready-to-shoot package that lets you take your own Solargraphs at a fraction of the time, cost and effort required to build your own pinhole camera. Like the GoPro of pinhole photography, the LWC can be left outdoors for years and still thrive!

While anyone can build a pinhole camera with sufficient time, effort and money, being able to buy a pre-made camera and simply expose the photo would remove significant barriers to entry. This will allow everyone to take solargraphs as easily as they would snap a picture with their cellphones. [The only difference being the amount of time captured by the camera.]

With this Project, we hope to ignite a revival of Solargraphy.


About Solargraphy

Time Lapse Videography has completely changed the way we see the world. The passage of days, weeks and months is compressed thousands of times, and the best hyperlapse videos are works of utter genius.

Solargraphy is the Photographic equivalent of the time lapse video. Picture a semitransparent ghost image of a new building - a picture taken over 4 years as the building is slowly constructed. Or bright white lines that fill the sky, shifting trails left by the passage of the sun over many weeks. 


In many ways, it is the exact antithesis to the increasing demand today for instant results. The Solargrapher plants his camera, and then he waits. And waits. And waits. But the result is something that you can never see with the naked eye. 

The beauty of the Solargraph is undeniable. It is thus a complete tragedy that it is nowhere near as ubiquitous as the time lapse video. Google for solargraphs of your city, and you will be hard-pressed to find any.

The Light Wait project will change that.

By bringing simple, affordable, tough, and great-quality Solargraphy Cameras to you, the Light Wait project aims to ignite a revival of Solargraphy. 

Instead of hunting down parts, scrounging around for old film canisters, trying to drill a perfect pinhole, all you’d need to do focus on the creative process. Every Light Wait Camera comes pre-loaded with film, and all you have to do is to pick the best place to plant the Light Wait Camera.

As an added bonus, the sheer amount of light that the camera is exposed to results in an “instant” image - there’s no need to send your camera to the lab. In fact, you don’t even need a darkroom to process your shots, you simply remove the film from the camera - the sheer amount light "automatically" exposes and develops the film!

But the Light Wait Camera is only the means to and end. The true purpose of the Project is to make Solargraphy a part of every photographer’s vocabulary. It is to enable everyone to appreciate the ephemeral beauty of the places they live in. And YOU can be part of that.



How the Light Wait Camera [LWC] Works

It’s really simple. All you need is a scanner, a stable place to plant your camera, and time. 

1 - FIND a good spot

This should be a firm, stable surface. Solargraphs only work if they’re taken of outdoor scenes, so plan accordingly. It helps to aim your camera north or south, so that the Sun Trails will travel ACROSS your shot!

2 - PLANT your camera

Aim your LWC’s pinhole. Remove the backing from the included 3M Command Adhesive, and mount it to your camera. Then plant your camera on the spot you picked. Remove the little piece of black tape covering the pinhole.

3 - WAIT.

No, don’t wait there. Taking a solargraphic Selfie is probable not a good idea, either, unless you are prepared to sit unmoving in the same spot for a week. This step will take a fortnight at least. One-week photos do work, but the image will be very feint. So give it time, a month or two is best! 

4 - RECOVER your camera

While holding on to the camera, pull the little tab on the 3M Command Adhesive to remove it.

5 - SCAN your pictures

The resulting short will be orange-on-white: this is an inverted image! Scan in the picture or take a photo of it using a digital camera or smartphone. Invert the resulting image using your favourite photo editor!

6 - SHARE the love!

Put it up as your cover photo, print an immense floor-to-ceiling version of your masterpiece - it’s entirely up to you! Just make sure that the picture is not forgotten on your hard disk: share the Solargraphic Love!



Our Firmly-planted Prototype happily doing its thing. Note oblivious passersby


Here's what the "Raw" film looks like! Note the black specks caused by a mistake in the prototype - we were using a lower quality black paint back then. An improved paint has since been selected.

The Final Shot of Singapore Management University. The School of Accountancy on the left, the Library on the right, and the seemingly empty road between them. The lines in the right of the picture are made by 48 days' worth of Sun!

What We Need

Fully functioning cameras have taken all the solargraphs you see on this page! But we do face several limitations:

Currently, we have been cutting our film "by feel" while completely blind in the dark. Also, the round film canisters used as our camera bodies don't respond too kindly to conventional drill bits.

Also, analogue is Expensive. Even though we don't have to spend on costly darkroom chemicals, we would need to purchase a good film cutter and a red safelight in order to cut precise slips of photo paper. We will also require a drill press to work better with our pesky rounded film canisters. 

All these will allow us to drastically ramp up production, allowing us to bring affordable Solargraphy to everyone!

Of course, the last bit of funding will go towards increasing the online presence of the Light Wait project! Remember - this is about creating a Solargraphic Revolution, so it doesn’t matter what camera is used, as long as solargraphs are being taken!



Rewards and Perks

Our 7 funding levels are as follows:

US$1: Member - Thank you very much for your support!

We will list all your names on our social media and online platforms, and update you regularly. Please consider taking a solargraph soon!


US$7: Builder - Make your own!

We will send you two pieces of pre-cut photo paper, as well as build instructions for making your own Light Wait DIY Camera. Please check if black film canisters are available in your area, as most film manufacturers now use transparent ones!


US$16: Solargrapher - Welcome to the Revolution!

All aboard! Get your very own Light Wait camera, as well as one set of consumables! This includes:

Pre-cut premium ILFORD MULTIGRADE IV paper

3M COMMAND adhesive for strong adhesion to most surfaces and easy removal


US$20: Believer - Wow! Much Film. Such Camera. Wow!

Thank you for helping to bring Solargraphy to the fore! Get your very own Light Wait camera, as well as three sets of consumables! These include:

Pre-cut premium ILFORD MULTIGRADE IV paper

3M COMMAND adhesive for strong adhesion to most surfaces and easy removal


US$54: Leader - Solargraphs everywhere!

Take the lead in the Solargraphic Revolution! Also, take three pictures at the same time! Get THREE Light Wait cameras, as well as nine sets of consumables! These include:

Pre-cut premium ILFORD MULTIGRADE IV paper

3M COMMAND adhesive for strong adhesion to most surfaces and easy removal


US$150: Pioneer - Ten times the fun!

You are a person who makes things happen. Make everyone see your world in a different light with TEN Light Wait cameras, as well as thirty sets of consumables! These include:

Pre-cut premium ILFORD MULTIGRADE IV paper

3M COMMAND adhesive for strong adhesion to most surfaces and easy removal


US$1000: Visionary

You are the Neil Armstrong of the Solargraphic world. Go where no man has gone before with 100 Light Wait Cameras! Stick them to your house. Stick them on your friends. Stick them all over your office and give out the remainder as gifts - it’s up to you! This also comes with 300 sets of consumables! These include:

Pre-cut premium ILFORD MULTIGRADE IV paper

3M COMMAND adhesive for strong adhesion to most surfaces and easy removal


The Impact

My first solargraph is the Logo image of the Project, and that picture was taken with the ancient predecessor of the Light Wait Camera way back in 2008. As a proud owner of a still-functioning Canon EOS 30D, I have been passionate about Photography since I was 13. I was first hooked onto Photography when experimenting with 4-second long exposures on my ancient Kyocera point-and-shoot camera. Pinhole Photography was introduced to me when I was the president at the Raffles Junior College Photographic Society, and I’ve been fascinated since by the beauty and simple elegance of the Pinhole Camera. 

The Light Wait Project is proudly Made in Singapore, and incubated in Singapore Management University.


Fun Fact - We've actually began shipping the first 15 Light Wait Cameras to our first few supporters! Thank you for believing in us! =D

Risks & Challenges

We have fully functioning prototypes. Key challenges would include: 

The supply of film canisters - film manufacturers are shifting to translucent canisters. That said, we’ve just received a batch of 50 black film canisters from our supplier, who is also prepared to supply far more if necessary. In a worst case scenario of the world running out of black film canisters [!], alternate PVC Camera Bodies have been designed.

Scaling up Manufacturing - So far, we’ve managed to build close to 20 cameras with a 3-man team. A significant demand would require us to optimise the manufacturing process.


Technical Details 

In essence, the Light Wait Camera is a pinhole camera that lets you skip the developing and darkroom process due to its extreme exposure time. It saves you the trouble of having to purchase a huge batch of photographic paper only to cut a small piece out it in a pitch-black darkroom, or the trouble of light-proofing a soda-can pinhole camera. 

More importantly, while building your own conventional pinhole camera is crazy fun, not all of them can withstand the rigours of being left outdoors in the sun for years. Also, imagine the emotional attachment you will have to the first pinhole camera you build - it’s not something you’d want to stick to the wall of a building.

Right now, the working prototypes have been tested and proven for optimal image quality. Take the build of the camera for example. While using a drink can to build a pinhole camera will produce satisfactory results during conventional exposure times, the length of a solargraphy exposure makes the internal reflections off aluminium unacceptable. As a result, Light Wait Cameras are built out of black film canisters ONLY. Even our Aperture Plates have been darkened with matte black spraypaint to reduce internal reflections. 

Or consider our aperture plates. Every pinhole has been made with a 28 gauge needle, which is in turn replaced every 50 holes made. The ridiculously thin but incredibly strong stainless steel sheets used contribute to the sharpness of the resulting image.  Before we install them onto our cameras, each and every aperture is then light-tested for optimal roundness. A key goal behind our funding would be the ordering of customised, even-thinner needles for longer exposures and greater sharpness, and the purchase of a drill press to ensure consistent perforation of our film canisters.


Other Ways You Can Help

Be part of the revolution in Spirit! Search for Pinhole Camera tutorials, build your own camera, take your solargraphs, and tag it with #thelightwait and #Solargraphy! 


Background Star Photo Credits: ESA/Hubble

Command is a trademark of 3M. © 3M 2012.

GoPro is a trademark of GoPro, Inc. © 2014 GoPro, Inc.

story:
MCZ - Carbon Fibre Prop. for DJI Mavic Pro.



We are a team of creatives who are eager to produce innovative, beautiful, functional & high-performance products.



 The core intention of "MCZ" is to persistently refine the DJI Mavic Pro Propeller appearance, functionality and performance through structural design, material technology and product knowledge.

MCZ~ MAVICPRO / Real Carbon Propeller

Our MCZ Carbon Fibre props were lovingly crafted, we try not to sacrifice real craftsmanship at the altar of expediency. They are built with care and passion, and presented with pride that befits a marvelously well-made item.

We focused on the propeller parts and thought about how to improve the look, performance & safety.

  • Appearance
    Although DJI already did a great job with the design, you may still want to modify your Mavic Pro with your own style. A team member, who is a car enthusiast brought the car accessory concept to the forefront of the MCZ project. We treat carbon fibre props like a  tire and our spinner as a rim.That is the reason why we have put so much care and     passion into our spinner. Right now we provide unique and stylishly finished rims for your Mavic Pro.
     

  • Performance
    Carbon Fibre material maintains the same weight but is much stronger. Our MCZ Carbon props improve vertical lift, horizontal speed, reduce noise and provide the extra flight time.

  • Improve flight Safety
    Carbon Fibre makes our prop much stronger. When you collide with vegetation using plastic props you may have a crash even if it is with smaller plants.
    But the MCZ series are much stronger, when your Mavic Pro collides with smaller vegetation, you should have no problem.
    These props allow you to reduce the braking distant, because MCZ carbon prop produce less inertia. Therefore the controls are more responsive and it is much easier to put on the brakes in an emergency situation. 

 What technology is inside our MCZ ? 

For a Drone propeller product, that has to spin up to 9K RPM, PRECISION is the key;
every imperfection produces vibrations, that leads to noise and reduces the life of motor bearings. Therefore increasing the operational load of the electronic system which generates instability.

Our Spinner may outwardly look uneven, but we deliberately designed the Spinner to be 100% fully symmetrical around its spinning axis; our acceptable margin for error is under 0,02mm, so that we can ensure that there will be no vibration, even at higher RPM ranges.

Carbon Fibre Prop Balancing
Every set of MCZ carbon fibre props go through a rigorous  post production balancing process to ensure our propellers are 100% balanced.

Carbon Fibre Propeller relative research
There has been a lot of documentation supporting the claims that, Carbon fibre propellers perform up to 25% better than traditional plastic, wooden or even CFRP props.

This leads to a more efficient flight, snappier response and quieter operation in all conditions, giving those extra minutes of air time that can make the difference when the battery gauge is approaching the lower threshold.

Do you want your Mavic Pro more stylish or Unique?

Do you want Extra flight time?
Run time test MCZ-01 : 27Mins.48Sec vs Original 24Mins 55 


https://www.facebook.com/LuxzLab/videos/1876695...

Do you want your Mavic Pro to have stronger props?

Do you want your Mavic Pro to be more sporty?
Claim test and Max speed 70.6km

Do you want your Mavic Pro to be quieter?
 MCZ-00 Noise test video 

Right now : Lets make your Mavic Pro more professional, stylish & sporty!

We are a team of creatives who are eager to produce innovative, beautiful, functional & high-performance products.

Since 2015 the AUTOPLUS team has been creating stylishly designed, ingenious and charismatic products. The core intention of "AUTOPLUS" is to persistently refine our product appearance, functionality and performance through structural design, material technology and product knowledge.

Who are we?

Our team is a group of versatile specialists.
Our product designers have experience working with well known, famous brands of watch and electronic products, such as: NIKE, REEBOK, NB, BENELLI......etc.

We have product management experience on the WILLIAMS FORMULA 1 PIT BIKE project. Of course, we also have a structural & mechanical engineer, production manager, graphic designer, photographer, artist, professional drone player & an online marketer.  


AUTOPLUS Design and form concepts for product refinements.
Design sensibility is a cornerstone of AUTOPLUS. To us, the appearance cannot be sacrificed for better functionality. The simple lines and organic shapes are designed to be used in everyday life and for any occasion. 

Taking a minimalist, 'less is more' approach, our designer created an AUTOPLUS product that is useful, beautiful and unique. 

Why we need you?

We have designed, built, and tested the MCZ carbon fibre propeller pre-production product. We have selected a well-respected production facility that we have previously worked with successfully. 

However, one of our biggest concerns was making MCZ affordable to as many people as possible, while still insisting on a rich feature set. In order to proceed, we need to maintain  the order quantity necessary to keep the price reasonable for everyone. 

That is why you are our most important asset! By working together, we can all benefit. 

You are unique, and so is AUTOPLUS.

Risks and challenges

The most challenges of Carbon Fibre props is precision. At the design stage and post production process, so that we can ensure our MCZ will be no vibration, even at higher RPM ranges.

And the production lead time. Because the Carbon Fibre product is long lead time item.
Every single day with very limit production capacity.
Apart of the mass production issue, we have to go through a rigorous  post production balancing process to ensure our propellers are 100% balanced.
If too many Mavic Fans love pre-order our Carbon fibre Props may cause shipping delay.
We will according to the “First In, First Out” we are trying to process orders chronologically

What you receive in return

By investing in our project, your pre-orders will help fund the first production run in a quantity that keeps the price low for everyone. In return you get (besides our gratitude and sincere thanks!) our innovative Carbon Fibre props at a highly discounted price.
Because this is a new design, so at this point, you cannot find it on eBay, Yahoo, Amazon…etc.

We have created several different perks to offer MCZ at prices up to 50% off of retail, as well as some special perks.


[Inspiration]

We are an international team of builders, designers, teacher and dreamers. Our backgrounds are in design, watch making, Sports and consumer electronic as well as vehicle tuning accessories. 

Our goal is to use technology to encourage and enable healthy lifestyles but we consider great design and uncompromising style essential. That’s why we built AUTOPLUS like no other.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like our project but you can't make a monetary contribution, please consider sharing it with your friends and family using the share buttons under the video. This will help us greatly to spread the word.


GOOGLE MEDIA KITS

30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the MCZ community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who can upgrade their Mavic Pro!

A NOTE TO INTERNATIONAL BACKERS:

Please note: backers will be responsible for any and all customs, import duties, and/or local taxes you may incur in your country of residence.  We recommend you ask your local tax authorities what you will incur based on the value of your pledge.  Please understand, we have no control over what your own country will charge you in VAT and import duties.  As a final note, we cannot misrepresent the customs information.  We appreciate your understanding of this matter.

FAQs

  1.  Many people say Carbon fiber props are less stable, is that true?
    if they are low-end carbon props WITHOUT any balancing process.Unbalanced props cause vibration. With our MCZ props there is no need to worry about this, Carbon fibre props provide more direct control. Imagine driving a modified car, if you have less control, you will feel not stable.
     
  2.  If you crash with carbon fibre props will you damage your motors?
    It depends on how you crash your drone. The height, speed and angle of the crash can determine the outcome. If the collision occurs at more than10km per hour, 20m height, or impacts the arms then our research points to no discernible difference.But on the other hand, if you hit tree leaves with the original props it may fall from the sky. (perhaps into water). However, if your Mavic has MCZ props,it will cut through the leaves just like a mower, VERY easily. This can be very advantageous if you like to fly near forests and wooded areas.
      
  3. Many people ask if carbon Fiber props are more dangerous?
    I also want to ask a question, is a 0.25mm bullet less dangerous than 0.38mm? Is a Tesla 75D less danger than 90D? If you give your drone with our MCZ props to somebody without experience. I can say yes.
    The danger come from the person controlling it, not the props.
     
  4.  MCZ, is it suitable for beginner drone operators? We recommend MCZ props to experienced Mavic Pro operators.That is the reason why we made a cutting test video as we want customers to be aware of the potential dangers. You wouldn't recommend a modified car that has been tuned to a beginner driver.The same goes for MCZ props on a Mavic Pro. The sensitivity of the controls increases with faster movement vertically and horizontally.      

Warning

If you are a beginner just learning to fly, plastic props are more than good enough, as you are likely to crash and break many props before mastering it.

Disclaimer (Posted on Oct 20th, 2017)

Delivery of rewards/perks is subject to best efforts and not guaranteed. This is to set reasonable expectations for our contributors/donors. This disclaimer is required for accepting PayPal contributions.
story_txt:
MCZ - Carbon Fibre Prop. for DJI Mavic Pro.

We are a team of creatives who are eager to produce innovative, beautiful, functional & high-performance products.




 The core intention of "MCZ" is to persistently refine the DJI Mavic Pro Propeller appearance, functionality and performance through structural design, material technology and product knowledge.
MCZ~ MAVICPRO / Real Carbon Propeller
Our MCZ Carbon Fibre props were lovingly crafted, we try not to sacrifice real craftsmanship at the altar of expediency. They are built with care and passion, and presented with pride that befits a marvelously well-made item.We focused on the propeller parts and thought about how to improve the look, performance & safety.



AppearanceAlthough DJI already did a great job with the design, you may still want to modify your Mavic Pro with your own style. A team member, who is a car enthusiast brought the car accessory concept to the forefront of the MCZ project. We treat carbon fibre props like a  tire and our spinner as a rim.That is the reason why we have put so much care and     passion into our spinner. Right now we provide unique and stylishly finished rims for your Mavic Pro. 
PerformanceCarbon Fibre material maintains the same weight but is much stronger. Our MCZ Carbon props improve vertical lift, horizontal speed, reduce noise and provide the extra flight time.
Improve flight SafetyCarbon Fibre makes our prop much stronger. When you collide with vegetation using plastic props you may have a crash even if it is with smaller plants.But the MCZ series are much stronger, when your Mavic Pro collides with smaller vegetation, you should have no problem.These props allow you to reduce the braking distant, because MCZ carbon prop produce less inertia. Therefore the controls are more responsive and it is much easier to put on the brakes in an emergency situation. 


 What technology is inside our MCZ ? 
For a Drone propeller product, that has to spin up to 9K RPM, PRECISION is the key;every imperfection produces vibrations, that leads to noise and reduces the life of motor bearings. Therefore increasing the operational load of the electronic system which generates instability.Our Spinner may outwardly look uneven, but we deliberately designed the Spinner to be 100% fully symmetrical around its spinning axis; our acceptable margin for error is under 0,02mm, so that we can ensure that there will be no vibration, even at higher RPM ranges.
