story:
The WANT3D system makes it possible to record your own 3D videos, all you need is two smartphones!

 

 

 

What is it and why do I want it?

The ability to play 3D movies is a common feature in most of today’s TV’s, however the commercially available 3D cameras are both bulky and expensive. WANT3D presents Scandinavian design with a cheap and easy way for anyone to make their own 3D videos.

Making 3D videos is no magic, in fact it is both easy and fun, and also it is a great way of learning the basics of 2D as well as 3D filming and editing.

 

 

What do I get?

 

 

How to use it?

Here follows a quick guide on how to create your first 3D video, if you have any questions please check out the in-depth video tutorial (coming soon!) or the FAQ. Otherwise you are most welcome to send us an email!

Step 1 - Mounting your phone

Adjust the camera mount to fit your smartphone by sliding the brackets. Make sure that they tighten around the phone and fasten the screws, this’ll keep your phone in place making the video more steady.

If you have pledged for the WANT3D professional edition, also attach the mount to the minitripod, this will greatly reduce the steadiness of the video hence improving performance. We recommend that the WANT3D system is used with some kind of tripod or other stabilizing equipment for optimal results.

Step 2 - Recording a video

Navigate to your smartphones’ camera applications, switch them to video mode and start the recordning roughly simultaniously on both devices. The sync will be fine tuned later on in the computer. To further simplify the sync try to add some start signal, for example clap your hands in front of the cameras.

Note that the distances between the cameras should be of the order 5-7 centimeters (2-3 inches for those of you who fancy such units), this means that one phone will need to be flipped. Also the cameras should be adjusted into the same height using the long screws supplied  with your WANT3D system.

Step 3 - Getting your videos into your computer

Connect your smartphones to your computer and navigate to your smartphones’ camera map, usually called DCIM, locate the video and copy it onto your hard drive. Note that you might have turn on USB-debugging or such in your smartphone in order to view it as a portable disc in your computer, for more information on this matter consult Google with the inquiry “connect phone to computer”, “browse files on phone over USB” or such.

Make sure to label your video files after which is from the smartphone to the right, and which is from the right!

Step 4 - Converting the files

Find a video converter that allows you to convert the files from your phone (usually .mp4 or .mov) into .avi files with the MPEG-2 codex. An easy way to do this is to download the “Video to Video” converter (direct link: http://www.videotovideo.org/download/videotovideo_setup.exe). Install and open the program, choose “Add video” and navigate to your right and left videos. Mark “MPEG” II in the box that appears and in the table to the right that appears scroll to “Video Size”, choose the same video size as that which your smartphones output (usually full HD: 1920 x 1080), if you are unsure you can check under details under properties if you left click on your files. Also change “Video Bitrate” to something between 4000 and 8000.

 

 

 

Step 5 - Making the 3D video

Download the program Stereo Video Maker (direct link: http://stereo.jpn.org/eng/stvmkr/files/stvmkre130.zip), and unpack it. Open the program and choose “Open Left/Right Movies”, navigate to your movies and add first the left movie and then the right. Note that the video from camera that you flipped need to be inverted, to do this simply check the“Invert” box for this video when adding the videos.

In Stereo Video Maker you will want to make two corrections to your video: sync and 3D focus. To synchronize the videos play them by clicking the screen once, stop right after you see your start signal from Step 2 by clicking again, and fine tune the timing by using the arrows underlined red and blue at the bottom of the window in such a way that the two videos shows start signal simultaneously.

 

 

Now navigate to “Easy Adjustment” under "Adjust", and use the bars to adjust the focus of the video, double click the image to zoom. You will want to focus at something at the back of the image, e.g. a lamp post, power outlet, tree, or such. To do this, slide the bars so that the cyan and red images completely overlap at this point.

 

 

Now save your 3D video by choosing “Save as Stereo Video” under “File”. When asked if you want to compress the image choose Microsoft Video and choose quality 75.

Step 6 - Playing your 3D video

The quickest way of viewing your video in 3D is to download the media player Stereoscopic Player, direct link: http://www.3dtv.at/Downloads/StereoscopicPlayer207_en.exe. Open the 3D video you created in Step 5 and in the dialog box choose “Side by Side, Left Image First”. Now go to View → Viewing method and choose “Side by Side, Left Image First” and under View → Aspect Ratio choose “Half Width”. Now connect your computer to your 3DTV and play the video.

Finally, if you want to share the video with others simply upload it to youtube adding the tag “yt3d:enable=true”, this way the video will be displayed in 3D.

 

Check out our 3D demonstration video on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hQ8SOPIVeQc

 

 

What devices does it work with?

The WANT3D camera system works with most major smartphone brands, you don’t even have to use two phones of the same brand och size! However, if you use different phone models it is strongly recommended to have some skills in video editing since one of the videos may have to be cropped.

We have tested the WANT3D with Iphone 4 / 4S / 5, Samsung Galaxy S3 / S4, Nokia Lumia 920 and HTC one X. Other brands or models should work as well provided that they meet the maximum measurement requirements shown below:

Maximum phone width: 140 mm (5.5”)

Maximum thickness: 10 mm (0.4”)

 

Why we need the cash

We have already made great progress in designing the WANT3D camera system. The prototype is finished and a couple of concept videos has been produced. We started this project as enthusiasts out of curiosity just to see if it would be possible to build a 3D camera. If you support this project we will be able to fulfill our dream of creating a new application area for smartphones.

Pledge now and support us in three ways:

I. Cover our investment in this project

II. Cover the refinement of the prototype

III. Cover the production costs of the final WANT3D system

What we will do if we raise more money

> 5000 USD: Develop a tablet version

> 8000 USD: Develop a WANT3D system supporting SLR / DSLR’s and digital compact cameras.

 

Manufacturing

The entire WANT3D system is manufactured on 3D-printers with most parts printed in the environmentally friendly and biodegradable plastic PLA. The handle and tripod adapter is printed in rigid ABS.

 

When will I get it?

Delivery is estimated during November 2013. Please bear in mind that shipping outside the EU may take several weeks.

 

Who are we?

We’re two young enthusiasts who try to establish ourselves in the world of technology and science. We have a lot of experience in our backpack but we haven’t quite had our breakthrough yet. Here’s a short resume of earlier projects that we have created:

The first project we’re we first collaborated was an improvement of the standard issue Tesla coil invented by the Serbian physicists, engineer and general prodigy Nikola Tesla, making it solid state.

Having done this rather technical project we decided to settle for something of more mechanical nature and embarked on the journey of building a jet powered go kart. This is still an ongoing project.

Recently we started a summer science camp for teenagers engaged in science and technology where they get to spend two weeks working with high end equipment stimulate their interest in these areas.

But most of all, we’re two good friends doing what we think is fun!

Besides engaging ourselves in various projects we’re both students of science and technology, David is writing his master’s thesis in theoretical physics and Robert is studying to become an electrical engineer.

 

Thank You

We’d like to thank:

The community at Thingiverse for inspiration and design tips specifically regarding the lithophane, http://www.thingiverse.com/thing:74322.

Lothar Piehl for design guidance.

Indiegogo for presenting us with this opportunity to realize our project,

And of course, for those of you who read this far, thank you for considering our project!

 

FAQ

What do I need to get started?

You need four things: Two smartphones,  Stereo Video Maker (http://stereo.jpn.org/eng/stvmkr/), Video to Video converter (http://www.videotovideo.org/download/) and finaly of course the WANT3D system. For a walkthrough on how to make your first 3D video see “How Do I Use It?”

Is the WANT3D system compatible with any pair of smart phones?

Any pair of smart phones that fit in the mount, see "What devices does it work with?"

Can I combine one Android phone and one iPhone?

Yes, of course.

Can I record full HD (1920x1080)?

Yes, as long as both of your phones supports it.

Is there any max length for the video?

Nope, the only limitation is the amount of space on your hard drive and smart phones.

What we will do if we raise more money
> 5000 USD: Develop a tablet version
> 8000 USD: Develop a WANT3D system supporting SLR / DSLR’s and digital compact cameras.
 
Manufacturing
The entire WANT3D system is manufactured on 3D-printers with most parts printed in the environmentally friendly and biodegradable plastic PLA. The handle and tripod adapter is printed in rigid ABS.

 
When will I get it?
Delivery is estimated during November 2013. Please bear in mind that shipping outside the EU may take several weeks.
 
Who are we?
We’re two young enthusiasts who try to establish ourselves in the world of technology and science. We have a lot of experience in our backpack but we haven’t quite had our breakthrough yet. Here’s a short resume of earlier projects that we have created:
The first project we’re we first collaborated was an improvement of the standard issue Tesla coil invented by the Serbian physicists, engineer and general prodigy Nikola Tesla, making it solid state.
Having done this rather technical project we decided to settle for something of more mechanical nature and embarked on the journey of building a jet powered go kart. This is still an ongoing project.
Recently we started a summer science camp for teenagers engaged in science and technology where they get to spend two weeks working with high end equipment stimulate their interest in these areas.
But most of all, we’re two good friends doing what we think is fun!
Besides engaging ourselves in various projects we’re both students of science and technology, David is writing his master’s thesis in theoretical physics and Robert is studying to become an electrical engineer.

 
Thank You
We’d like to thank:
The community at Thingiverse for inspiration and design tips specifically regarding the lithophane, http://www.thingiverse.com/thing:74322.
Lothar Piehl for design guidance.
Indiegogo for presenting us with this opportunity to realize our project,
And of course, for those of you who read this far, thank you for considering our project!
 
FAQ
What do I need to get started?
You need four things: Two smartphones,  Stereo Video Maker (http://stereo.jpn.org/eng/stvmkr/), Video to Video converter (http://www.videotovideo.org/download/) and finaly of course the WANT3D system. For a walkthrough on how to make your first 3D video see “How Do I Use It?”
Is the WANT3D system compatible with any pair of smart phones?
Any pair of smart phones that fit in the mount, see "What devices does it work with?"
Can I combine one Android phone and one iPhone?
Yes, of course.
Can I record full HD (1920x1080)?
Yes, as long as both of your phones supports it.
Is there any max length for the video?
Nope, the only limitation is the amount of space on your hard drive and smart phones.

story: Hi guys. I've been looking for my first camera to use for taking pictures of my life.  I really want more than a phone camera or a point and shoot so that I can control the shutter speed and focus and control the light by myself. A professional photographer recommended this specific camera to me,  I found out it is a great camera for beginners and it comes with various lenses and accesories.  The perks I will give yo guys include a well written thank-you note, and I am willing to send you (depending on the level of your pledge) something from my closet; that  is books, toys, board games, art supplies, sporting goods, and other fun things.  It would be great for you to pledge money for me.  Feel free to ask any questions.  Thanks! =D

story:
Aktiv – Many Features in One simple device,

Action Camera, Security Camera, 4K Camera, Waterproof

 

Who is tired of having to choose between OVER EXPENSIVE  and LOW QUALITY cameras?

We have created the perfect solution for anyone in need of a camera. Smooth quality 4K video with AKTIV.

Share with friends and family instantly!

Action camera:

- HIKING

 

-UNDER WATER ACTIVITIES 

-BIKE RIDING AND MOTOR SPORTS

Security- manage home security in a simple and easy way.

With the new software we are working on, Aktiv will learn your homes patterns, so that it can alert you when something is different. Keep your home safe while you are away.

Get these notifications directly to your smart phone!

Attach Aktiv to your car and record your journey while travelling, or use it as a way to keep it safe while away for long periods of time.

Attach to the back of your vehicle and use it to help you park in hard locations.

You can also attach more than one device to see all the difficult angles.

Attach Aktiv to your helmet, or back pack while doing outdoor activities. Share instantly through the Wi-Fi connection available.

 

Aktiv has a protective, shock resistant cover that is water proof, so it can be taken on all types of adventures and won’t ever be left behind.

Basically attach to any surface with the attachments available and use at any time.

Take a look at how the first prototype was made and what will be done after the campaign is over.

Timeline:

 

 

Whats inside the box?

  1. Wireless charger
  2. Extra on the go power bank
  3. Special attachments (magnet)
  4. Waterproof storage bag

 

Technical Specifications:

 

 

During the mass production process the final aspect and tech specs might vary from the original prototype.

We are aiming mostly for 2 stretch marks in order to add more features and make Aktiv as good as possible. Here they are below. 

By the way, you can help by sharing the campaign via social media, email, text etc.

 

Perks:

 

 

 

 

Meet the team behind this great project!

 

FAQs:

We will continue adding questions and answers here throughout the campaign. This will make the campaign clearer for any new backers that might have questions about Aktiv. Thank you everyone for your questions! 

You can contact us through the comments section, or through messages.

Q: How will you know how much battery is left?

A: You will be able to access and view through the mobile app, or the small screen if we reach that stretch goal.

Q: Will there be a mobile app for iOS and Android devices?

A: Yes, these are the 2 platforms that we are concentrating on at the moment.

Q: How do you know how much memory is left?

A: You will be able to access and view through the mobile app, or the small screen if we reach that stretch goal.

Q: Will Aktiv come with a memory card?

A: No, Aktiv will not come with a memory card.

Q: How do you change setting of your Aktiv action camera?

A: At the moment you will be able to enter the settings through the mobile app. If the stretch mark is reached, we will add a small screen where these setting can be changed.

Q: Can I connect more than one Aktiv cameras to one device?

A: Yes, we made this possible through the mobile app, so that you can capture more than one angle.

Q: What's the video recording duration for 1080P 60FPS and 32 GB of memory?

A: At 60FPS, 32 GB will record 3 hours of footage. At 30FPS, 32 GB will record 6 hours.

Q: When will perks be delivered? 

A: We estimate the shipping date for the month of May,We will definitely deliver a great product, and hope to do so on time!

Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.

story:
Introducing Blumoth

 

Blumoth is a new gadget which connects your digital camera to your smartphone via Bluetooth, opening up a world of opportunities. We have built an intuitive smartphone app which allows you to take control on your camera and share photos over the Internet in just a few taps. 

 

With Blumoth you can use your smartphone or tablet to: 

 

  • View and share the pictures saved on your camera 
  • View the camera’s live view screen and take pictures remotely 
  • Adjust shooting settings and set the camera trigger to take automatic shooting sequences 

 

It is the perfect way to share high quality photography on the Internet, wherever you are, whenever you want – without the need for a laptop or WiFi connection. Blumoth has been designed for people like us, who love being outdoor, taking great photos and sharing them with the world. The Blumoth app makes it simple to take advantage of digital camera’s functionality from your phone’s screen. 

We have already developed an operational prototype of Blumoth, including an Android app, and we’re already testing it on different camera models. Now we need your help to complete the project and get Blumoth into production. In the future we’re also planning to make it available for iPhone.

How Blumoth Works

Wireless Connectivity 

Using Blumoth is easy – simply plug the device into your camera, turn on the Bluetooth and pair it with your smartphone.You will then be able to use your phone to access the camera.

Liveview and Camera Control

With Liveview feature you can view your camera’s live screen on your phone. This means you can see through the camera’s viewfinder even when you are feet away from it so you can see what you shoot. Additionally, you can adjust shooting settings and shoot photos remotely. 

Download and Share Photos 

When your camera is connected to Blumoth you can use your smartphone to view all of the photos that are saved on your camera. When entering the Device Gallery screen, these photos will first come up as thumbnails. You can then select the photos you want to save to your phone, download them and then share them any way you like - on social networks, by email or any other way. Local Gallery will keep and provide access to all downloaded photos on the phone.

“Timelapse” and other pre-programmed tasks 

One of the key features of Blumoth is programmed shooting. The device allows you to make timelapses, HDR, bracketing or even create a custom script that changes the camera’s parameters and shoots photos over a period of time. 

Ease of Use 

The Blumoth app is very intuitive and easy to use. A simple user interface has been designed to allow photographers to take control of their cameras in seconds. The Blumoth device itself is so small and lightweight that you will soon see it as an extension of your camera. It is powered by a long standing rechargeable battery, so you will always have the power you need. 

Simplifying Your Photography Experience 

We all carry our smartphones with us all the time, so we always have an Internet connection in our pockets. Blumoth allows you to harness that online power and extend your camera’s functionalities further than you could have imagined. With Blumoth you can leave your laptop at home and forget about investing in an expensive automatic triggering hardware.

Current changes

Recently we have started working on a new and improved housing design that will be more functional and even better looking. Therefore the final product may have a slightly different, but definitely better, design. We will post the new images as soon as they are available. We are also planning to continue working on the Blumoth mobile application and add new cool features to it: multiple cameras control, geo tagging, auto backup, and more. Every one of our supporters who perks for a Blumoth device will receive all future updates of the application for free!

Technical specs

  • Battery: integrated, rechargable, 1850mAh
  • Charging method: standard USB
  • Connectivity: Bluetooth, USB
  • Device periphery: one button operation (device), LED
  • Mobile device OS supported: Android
  • Weight: coming soon
  • Dimensions: 80x45x12 (current design)

Rewards

 

Project history

The idea of Blumoth was born to a group of adventurers who are specialists from different fields. We spent a lot of our spare time to make it happen and it took several loops to understand which hardware  will do it best.

We can’t wait to make Blumoth available to everyone but right now we need you guys to help us make our dream true!

Founders bio

Alex and Kat live in Tel Aviv, Israel, working in High Tech field. 
Alex has B.Sc.degree in Mathematics and Computer Sciences from Tel Aviv University. He is CTO and co-founder of a company named Trivium Solutions, a software warehouse specializing in Embedded Software development (www.3vium.com). 
Kat has B.A. degree in Business Administration (specializing in IT Management). She is a product manager in a leading company in Internet entertainment field. 

In BluMoth project, Kat is responsible for product definition, Alex is handling software development, and electronics.

We are belong to a local climbing community, love adventures, travelling around the world and documenting our travels which became a strong background for our idea.

Production timeline

After a successful funding thanks to you guys we will continue and finalize product development by completing the following steps:

1. Hardware

The main effort will be to move from the prototype we developed to mass production device. In order to complete this task, we will need to:

  • Finalize electronics development ( est. one month)
  • Perform final adaptations of mechanical design to the electronics part (est. two week)
  • Production of a test batch of devices, extensive testing (est. two months)

Overall, we estimate the effort of completing the hardware part by 3.5-4 months.

2. Software

In parallel, we will finalize mobile application development. This will include mainly extensive testing against different camera models, and necessary user interface adaptations for various screen resolutions and Android OS flavors. (est. 4 months)

3. Production 

The final step that is needed to bring BluMoth to life will be to start a mass production. Our prototype is developed in a collaboration with a warehouse which will produce the final design. (est. 1.5 months).

Overall, within 5-6 months after a successful funding, we plan to start shipping BluMoth to our precious backers!

Risks and challenges

We have already developed a fully functional prototype of Blumoth device, and a smartphone app. We will need to complete the effort by designing the final product, putting it into production and passing various certifications.

Please note that availability of various features of Blumoth depends of your camera model.
If your camera supports USB PTP connection mode, which most of digital cameras do, you will be able to get access to photos and share them. You can check this by connecting your camera by USB to a PC or laptop. If it will be shown as a camera, then it is good to go. Some cameras support multiple modes of USB connection, so you might want to check your camera menu and switch it to PTP mode first.

Most DSLR cameras support control features through USB port. Depending on your camera model, you'll be able to use Live view, shoot photos, change ISO, Shutter speed, and Aperture. We are now in process of accessing and testing different camera models of different manufactures. Please see the list of supported features for cameras already tested:

Canon: 450D (full support), 500D (full support), 550D (full support), 5D (photo share only), 5D Mark II (full support), 7D (full support), 1D IV (full support) 
Nikon: D70 (control and share photos, no live view), D7000 (full support) 
Sony: Nex5 (photo share only)

If your camera is not in the list, it doesn't mean it is not supported! Most chances are we just didn't test it yet! Please don't hesitate to contact us and provide your camera model, and we will make every effort to test it as soon as possible.

We are committed to keep working on future releases of the application and to add support for additional camera models in future! As a supporter of Blumoth project, you will be granted with free updates of the software for a life time!

story:
Our Story

At Blink™ we love cameras , we love fun, we love smiling, we love small dogs with stupid outfits on , basically we love a lot of things. What we dont like, is how boring camera lens caps are ! 

We need your help to bring Blink™ lens caps to a camera bag near you.


Our Product

Lets introduce you to our first 6 designs , to make your cameras even more beautfiul. 



What We Need

What we really need is Money and Smiles. 

Money. 

We need 55,000 Dollars. We hope that hasn't made you falloff your seat. 
Not only do we want to bring you a product to make you and your camera smile 
but we also care very much about our brands impact on the planet and to make
sure we care for it the same way it cares for us.

Smiles

We want people across the world to love our product as much as we love it.
If you whip out a camera , about to snap a loved ones picture and you have one of our caps 
on it  , we want to make them smile.

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word world wide , "like" us on facebook , tweet us on twitter ,
get your Granma to knit you a sweater with us on it. Just promote
promote promote ... and together we can make this happen.



 
What you get for your Dollar.

 1 Dollar

You get            + a "big thank you, email".

 5 Dollars

You get           + an "animated 30k Flash Banner  and Gif banner" to let the world know you support Blink™
                       + a "big thank you, email".


 10 Dollars 


You get           + a 10 page PDF showing 10 designs that never made to the final 6 caps.
                       + an "animated 30k Flash Banner  and Gif banner" to let the world know you support Blink™
                       + a "big thank you, email"
 
 25 Dollar



                       + You get to choose one of the Blink™ 58mm lens caps and have it sent to your home
                       + a 10 page PDF showing 10 designs that never made to the final 6 caps.
                       + an "animated 30k Flash Banner  and Gif banner" to let the world know you support Blink™
                       + a "big thank you, email"

 50 Dollars


                       + you get a "I made Blink™ happen Tshirt" in your requested size 
                          this Tshirt is only aviable though this perk and will never been aviabile any where else
                       + You get to choose one of the Blink™ 58mm lens caps and have it sent to your home
                       + a 10 page PDF showing 10 designs that never made to the final 6 caps.
                       + an "animated 30k Flash Banner  and Gif banner" to let the world know you support Blink™
                       + a "big thank you, email"

More Perks in the perk windows to the right.


Who is Blink™?


Blink™ is a family run company who is based out of Wales ( Wales is a country that is part of The United Kingdom and not to be confused with anything to do with those large grey sea mammals ).

Hopefully you see that we have already had spent a lot of time and effort to get Blink™ to where 

it is today . We now need a little last bit of help to give it one final push.


Money Stuff


Our break down of where your money is being invested


Moulding and production of lens cap in a six design colour way.

Making sure our caps are made from an environmentally-friendly plastic that is biodegradable and low in toxicity.

Making sure that the plastic production process is through natural and renewable resources.

Production of packaging that is also environmentally-friendly.

Setting up of a reliable worldwide distrabution network

The weaving of a fully wonderful ecommerce website

Production of rich media adverts and serving costs , as well as key positioned media placements

The creation of new design through out the year.


When will i get my Perk

All Perks should ship in early match next year. Don't worry we will make sure we keep

every one well updated.


Camera Lens Sizes

To start with all the camera lens that we will be producing for perks purposes, will fit camera 

lens of 58mm . We will offer a range of more common lens sizes as soon as all the perks have been met.


Your Feedback is Important 


Blink™ is for everyone , so any feedback, any ideas you want to through at us ... 

We would love to hear from you



Future Blink

Today is only start .We have a lot of plans for the future of Blink™ and we want you all along for the ride.

Together lets make our cameras smile!



THANK YOU FOR YOUR TIME



NOW "LIKE", "TWEET" "SHARE" THIS EVERYWHERE.

At Blink™ we love cameras , we love fun, we love smiling, we love small dogs with stupid outfits on , basically we love a lot of things. What we dont like, is how boring camera lens caps are ! 
We need your help to bring Blink™ lens caps to a camera bag near you.

Our Product
Lets introduce you to our first 6 designs , to make your cameras even more beautfiul. 


What We Need
What we really need is Money and Smiles. 


Money. 

We need 55,000 Dollars. We hope that hasn't made you falloff your seat. 
Not only do we want to bring you a product to make you and your camera smile 
but we also care very much about our brands impact on the planet and to make
sure we care for it the same way it cares for us.

Smiles

We want people across the world to love our product as much as we love it.
If you whip out a camera , about to snap a loved ones picture and you have one of our caps 
on it  , we want to make them smile.

Other Ways You Can Help
Spread the word world wide , "like" us on facebook , tweet us on twitter ,
get your Granma to knit you a sweater with us on it. Just promote
promote promote ... and together we can make this happen.





 
What you get for your Dollar.

 1 Dollar


You get            + a "big thank you, email".

 5 Dollars

You get           + an "animated 30k Flash Banner  and Gif banner" to let the world know you support Blink™

                       + a "big thank you, email".


 10 Dollars 




You get           + a 10 page PDF showing 10 designs that never made to the final 6 caps.

                       + an "animated 30k Flash Banner  and Gif banner" to let the world know you support Blink™

                       + a "big thank you, email"

 
 25 Dollar






                       + You get to choose one of the Blink™ 58mm lens caps and have it sent to your home


                       + a 10 page PDF showing 10 designs that never made to the final 6 caps.

                       + an "animated 30k Flash Banner  and Gif banner" to let the world know you support Blink™

                       + a "big thank you, email"


 50 Dollars








                       + you get a "I made Blink™ happen Tshirt" in your requested size 
                          this Tshirt is only aviable though this perk and will never been aviabile any where else
                       + You get to choose one of the Blink™ 58mm lens caps and have it sent to your home


                       + a 10 page PDF showing 10 designs that never made to the final 6 caps.

                       + an "animated 30k Flash Banner  and Gif banner" to let the world know you support Blink™

                       + a "big thank you, email"

More Perks in the perk windows to the right.







Who is Blink™?

Blink™ is a family run company who is based out of Wales ( Wales is a country that is part of The United Kingdom and not to be confused with anything to do with those large grey sea mammals ).
Hopefully you see that we have already had spent a lot of time and effort to get Blink™ to where 
it is today . We now need a little last bit of help to give it one final push.

Money Stuff

Our break down of where your money is being invested

Moulding and production of lens cap in a six design colour way.
Making sure our caps are made from an environmentally-friendly plastic that is biodegradable and low in toxicity.
Making sure that the plastic production process is through natural and renewable resources.
Production of packaging that is also environmentally-friendly.
Setting up of a reliable worldwide distrabution network
The weaving of a fully wonderful ecommerce website
Production of rich media adverts and serving costs , as well as key positioned media placements
The creation of new design through out the year.

When will i get my Perk
All Perks should ship in early match next year. Don't worry we will make sure we keep
every one well updated.


Camera Lens Sizes
To start with all the camera lens that we will be producing for perks purposes, will fit camera 
lens of 58mm . We will offer a range of more common lens sizes as soon as all the perks have been met.


Your Feedback is Important 

Blink™ is for everyone , so any feedback, any ideas you want to through at us ... 
We would love to hear from you


Future Blink
Today is only start .We have a lot of plans for the future of Blink™ and we want you all along for the ride.
Together lets make our cameras smile!


THANK YOU FOR YOUR TIME


NOW "LIKE", "TWEET" "SHARE" THIS EVERYWHERE.

story:
Overview

Hello, I’m Sergiy and have a pleasure to present the Hands Free Selfie Rig to you. We are a team of friends who like sports. My personal preference is downhill skiing and biking. It can be a challenge to take a video of yourself doing sports. Holding an ordinary selfie stick takes one hand out of the action which is not acceptable in some sports like skiing, biking and many others. This is why we’ve designed Q-Rig -  the Hands Free Selfie Rig which holds the selfie sticks for you. Specifically, the selfie sticks are mounted on a helmet. Q-Rig is light and doesn’t obstruct head movement.

The unique self-leveling feature stabilizes camera for better video. No more hands “glued” to the selfie stick on your videos. Both of your hands are free for action.

To make design simple, robust, waterproof and affordable there are no electronics and batteries.

Q-Rig is crowd friendly. Selfie sticks are easy to collapse when you are in a chair lift or just done recording. As Q-Rig is lightweight it can be left on the helmet even if not in use.

Q-Rig is highly customizable. Another selfie sticks can be installed and it’s easy to replace parts if they were broken in action.

3D printing technology allowed us to go through a series of different designs and test all of them. What you see is a fully functional prototype.

Q-Rig benefits

To summarize the advantages (our goals during the design phase) of Q-Rig:

  • Hands free;
  • Lightweight, shouldn’t obstruct head movement;
  • Self-stabilized (patent pending);
  • Flexible/modular, allow use of wide range of existing equipment like selfie sticks;
  • Waterproof;
  • Easy to use and transport (foldable);
  • Easy to take apart (for cleaning);
  • Flexible packaging: the whole set-up or just the pivot mount (Q-Rig core);
  • Made in USA;
  • Affordable;

Q-Rig was tested with GoPro cameras, but widely available adapters allow use of any action camera including 3600 ones.

Set-ups

There are two ways to set-up Q-Rig: self-stabilized and high point of view.

Self-stabilized set-up

With this set-up selfie sticks are pointing slightly down and Q-rig center of gravity is lower than the mounting point. This results in self-leveling, supports additional image stabilization and doesn't restrict head movements.

Second camera or a water tight case filled with water can be used as a counterweight. There is no limit to your creativity. It's possible to use a sound system as a counterweight or you can get rid of the camera altogether, mount two sound systems and enjoy a stereo sound :-)

High point of view set-up

In some cases it is important to make video from a higher point of view. I such case Q-Rig core is mounted "upside down" and selfie sticks are pointing slightly up. Due to the higher center of gravity the self-leveling feature is off, but point of view is higher.

To ensure the secure coupling between Q-Rig core and GoPro mounting buckle the thumb screw #1 should be tighten up with GoPro wrench.

Thumb screw #2 can be tightened to dampen or prevent movement of the upper part of the Q-Rig (the selfie stick holder.)

Packaging

There are 6 packages.

#1 Golden Core

The package includes:

  • Q-Rig Core with "Golden" clamps;
  • GoPro wrench (to tight GoPro screws);

Add your selfie sticks, counterweight, camera and you are ready to go.

#2 Black Diamond Core

The package includes:

  • Q-Rig Core with Black clamps;
  • GoPro wrench (to tight GoPro screws);

Add your selfie sticks, counterweight, camera and you are ready to go.

#3 Golden Hero Complete

The package includes:

  • Q-Rig Core with "Golden" clamps;
  • Watertight Hero case as a counterweight;
  • GoPro wrench (to tight GoPro screws);
  • 2x selfie sticks with GoPro mounts;

Add your camera and you are ready to go.

#4 Golden Session Complete

The package includes:

  • Q-Rig Core with "Golden" clamps;
  • Watertight Session case as a counterweight;
  • GoPro wrench (to tight GoPro screws);
  • 2x selfie sticks with GoPro mounts;

Add your camera and you are ready to go.

#5 Black Diamond Hero Complete

The package includes:

  • Q-Rig Core with Black clamps;
  • Watertight Hero case as a counterweight;
  • GoPro wrench (to tight GoPro screws);
  • 2x selfie sticks with GoPro mounts;

Add your camera and you are ready to go.

#6 Black Diamond Session Complete

The package includes:

  • Q-Rig Core with Black clamps;
  • Watertight Session case as a counterweight;
  • GoPro wrench (to tight GoPro screws);
  • 2x selfie sticks with GoPro mounts;

Add your camera and you are ready to go.

Let's do it!

We are passionate about supporting US manufacturers, so the plan is to produce Q-Rig core right here in US.

Crowdfunding will allow starting the mass production and bring our product to the market at a very affordable price. This is where we need your help!

Supply chain is ready. The missing parts are molds for the injection molding which will be used to manufacture Q-Rig core. Injection molding company will use the same 3D models of the parts that were used in 3D printing process, so starting production is the matter of signing the contract.

We believe that you deserve to have and share video of your most exciting moments. This is why we created the Q-Rig - a hands-free selfie rig that is lightweight, easy to use, and affordable. Get the word out and let Q-Rig become a reality!

Comparison between Panasonic GH4 and INSTA_RING

 

INSTA_RING is a high quality 12 mega pixel photo camera closed in a body of a ring. Once you make picture with INSTA_RING you can immediately transfer it directly to your smartphone (iOS or Android) and post it on your social media. It has 128GB flash storage memory and it's always ready for action.

 

 

A tiny space houses some of the most sophisticated technology. Wireless charging. Water and dust resistance and so you can dive up to 50 meters- even in salt water. Sapphire glass on the camera and aerospace grade aluminum on minimalistic and elegant body design defines INSTA_RING as a premium.


 

With INSTA_RING you can be always ready to make every picture-perfect moment yours. 


Just press the shutter! 


Super light, super handy, incredibly fast - you do not have to constantly reach for the camera or smartphone because from now on you have the camera on your hand.
 

 

The wide-angle camera to make highes quality pictures and movies with automatic face detection. Camera have optical image stabilization and fast lense for photos and videos. Your photos come out bright and clear even when there's very little light.


Video records with built- in microphone. Optical stabilization reduces handshake and motion blur. Your movies will looks steady and sharp.

 

 


 

Thanks to this you don't have to hold your hand super perfectly streight horizontal or vertical in order to make a perfect shoot.

 

Massive storage 128GB Built-in flash memory will give you all space you need for all your pictures, movies and files.

 

Freedom from wires Wireless Bluetooth 5.0- has got same low energy packet as v4.2 but it is 4-times longer range, 2-times higher speed, plus 8-times larger advertisement packet length for data.

 

Security If you have pictures and files that need to be kept truly private, you can set up a pin password to unlock your instaring from the app on your phone. Once there, they can only be accessed by you.

 

Beep when lost If you accidentally lose your INSTA_RING, for example in high grass, this function will definitely be helpful. All you need to do is activate the loudspeaker in INSTA_RING via your phone app.

 

App for iOS and Android We have just started working on the application.

List of functions of the INSTA_RING application: 
- setting up security PIN to lock / unlock INSTA_RING storage memory 
- the ability to take photos/ videos from a distance by pressing a button on the phone app 
- possibility to have INSTA_RING camera view on your phone screen 
- the ability to change the resolution of photos/ videos 
- the ability to change the way data is saved - to INSTA_RING memory or straight to the phone via bluetooth 
- beep when lost function


 

 

You can use your INSTA_RING when you swim, ride and play. From now every picture-perfect moment is yours forever. Even in salt water so you can swim in the ocean.
 

 

 

 

 

The most comfortable charging. Docking station for charging can by use as a power bank to charge your INSTA_RING on the go. Built in magnes lock INSTA_RING on place when you keep it in your pocket or handbag. INSTA_RING is fully charge in less then 30 minutes and can operate up to 5 hours.
 

Thanks to the adapter, you can set up INSTA_RING for any type of GoPro mount. A strong magnet holds it in place.

 

 
 
 
 
 
 

 

Each INSTA_RING set will contain one insert. You will be able to reduce diameter of your INSTA_RING for 2mm, 3mm or 4mm- you decide in survey after campaign.

 We have done a lot of prototyping for past two years based on ardiuino to beta versions which we gave to our friends to test them out on their 2018 summer holiday. We have done our homework when it comes to design and choosing the best components of INSTA_RING. We are really proud of our final outcome
 
 
 

 

 

 
 
 

 

I was fed up to carry the smartphone in my hand in order to catch the prefect moment on my trips. I challenged my friends to make my wish come tru. Luckly some of them joined my team. We had lots of fun, arguments and even more fun. And here we are with INSTA_RING.


 

 

Return policy We offer a 30 day no risk return policy. If you are not 100% satisfied with the quality of the product within 30 Days of receiving your order, simply send it back and we will refund you, no questions asked.

Warranty 1 Year Door to Door Warranty
 

Risks and challenges
There are always challenges and unforeseen obstacles that arise when trying to bring a product to life. There are so many moving parts that must be managed. We have developed systems and processes to mitigate the risks and obstacles that will arise. We will work hard to ensure that we deliver what we promise and to go the extra mile whenever it is possible. Thanks for believing in us!

story:
Hi everyone! 

So, on December 13th My camera bag with all of my camera equipment was stolen from me. I am devastated. It took my two years to accumulated all that equipment; from selling houses to booking photo-shoots to save the money. The violation of stealing my hard work is very heart breaking. Photography is the love of my life, and it took me a long time to find that relationship. 

I need your help to get back to what I love to do! When you donate there will be a gift of thank you for helping me get back to working. My goal Is 3,700 dollars to get back all the equipment. The time frame is 45 days to reach that goal!!!! 

BUT IF WE DON'T REACH THAT GOAL BY THEN EVERYONE WILL GET THEIR MONEY BACK!! SO LETS PUSH THIS!

When you donate $ 20 I will make a collage of photo of your choice ex; family photos, photos of a loved one, what ever you choose 

here's and example 

Next when you donate $25 you'll get a digital copy of one of my photos!!! you can choose from here----->https://www.facebook.com/triplecphoto?ref=hl

NEXT! donation of $35 is a t-shirt with my photography logo on it Example:

NEXT is if you donate $50 I will print out a photo of your choice and sign it for you again choose form here-----> https://www.facebook.com/triplecphoto?ref=hl

NEXT  if you donate $100 and you live in Northern California you'll get photoshoot with ME!

and LASTLY of you donate a huge amount of $300 I will print a 20x30 canvas of any picture of my again you can choose here-----> https://www.facebook.com/triplecphoto?ref=hl


Thank you so stopping by and if you donate you have no idea how much it means to me you help!

story:
WHAT'S THE DEAL?

We're now offering a 10% commission on every pledge you bring in. The baseline for this program starts at $100. Once you've referred $ worth of pledges via your IGG unique URL, you'll automatically be eligible for participation and set to receive your payout at the end of the campaign.

For example: Say you bring in $1,000 in referrals that's $100 in your pocket and all you had to do was get people to click your link and pre-order their vanylight(s)!

Spread the word about us with your friends all over the internet and you'll earn refunds quickly! You can even track your own progress by visiting your Indiegogo "My Profile" page and clicking on "Referrals."


HOW DOES IT WORK?

1. Log into your indiegogo account
    This is important because otherwise, their unique ID won’t be attached to any
    resulting contributions or visits.

2. SHARE it with your network!
     Whether you use FB, Twitter, emails or copy paste the link your unique ID is
     always attached. Like this we (and you by going to "My Profile" page and clicking
     on "Referrals.") 


_____________________________________________________________________________











How it all began 

It all started with a job interview that I conducted last year. Not only myself but also my interviewee looked like a "zombie" since the only available light was the computer screen, emitting this cold, blue light. I was wondering "does this have to be?" and began to do some research for a simple light solution, but there was nothing satisfactory. 

At that moment I remembered my time when I was working as a freelance camera man for advertising, fashion & documentary movies. A ring light would be a neat solution since a ring light is THE perfect light source when it comes to beauty shots. It creates a perfect, shadowless light on the models face and brings out the eyes perfectly.

But would this principle work on a small camera lens which you find in mobile devices? Ring lights and ring flashes are quite big in diameter. I started by mounting a ring of LEDs on a board and tried it out on my laptop. The result was incredible! 

In order to explore the full potential we booked a model, professional hair, styling and make up. Here is an example of a shot that I took with simply a vany ringlight and my iphone. This picture is NOT re-touched AT ALL:





I instantly started to put a team together who could help me to build a proper prototype: an industrial designer, a 3D animator, an engineer and myself. We started by putting together a proper LED ring on an electronic board. Once we had the design we printed a first prototype (which is available btw) and merged it with the LED ring. Job done! (yeah well it wasn't THAT easy....)


WHAT WE NEED - ALL OR NOTHING

The engineering is done and we are ready to start production. For some parts of the light there are minimum quantities. This is why I chose the "all or nothing" model for this campaign - we HAVE to get to the 35k in order to be able to produce a first batch. The funds will be needed for the following:

Tools// In order to produce the housing some custom made spray mold tools will have to be manufactured. 

Battery// The battery is key. When it comes to LiPo batteries you only want to work with the best. It has to meet high quality standards and of course one charge should last as long a possible! The vany will have a custom made LiPo battery.

Minimum quantities// for some parts of the light there are minimum quantities. This is why we chose the "all or nothing" model for this campaign - we HAVE to get to the 35k in order to be able to produce a first batch.


WHAT YOU GET


You will get THE BEST light source ever made for a mobile device. You will love it, you will play with it, you will be able to show yourself in the best light AND you have never look so good in a video chat! This will be very helpful when conducting an online job interview  for example, or while video chatting with your new date....;-)

It's basically a professional light source - your portraits and your selfies will reach a whole new level. The face is perfectly lit, the hair shines and your eyes look stunning. In fact, you will be able to take high end visuals of yourself and others.






And there are some unique perks:

Get the one and only very first prototype, it's a collector's item! It's made of a 3D Print. It has no battery yet s you can only run it with an USB cable, BUT you are holding a piece of history in your hands! 

Handmade Pre-Series: it's the one we used in the campaign video. In order to see how the light could be built in higher quantities we went all the way and built a kind of a pre-series. It's somewhere between the first prototype and the finished product. It's fully functioning, re-chargeable and ready to go. You can use it just like the final product, but it's covered with a silky fabric. In the final version it won't be done like that.   (5 Units, each USD 300.--)

Get a fine leather strap with your  v a n y , handmade in Italy. (20 units USD 50.--)

Risks & Challenges

We will have to figure out how to scale up the production line in order to able to build not just a few pieces, but a high volume. But we've got this far, so we will figure out that step as well. We are lucky to be able to work with a very experience Swiss tech company!

Other Ways You Can Help

SHARE THE IDEA! Send it to your friends & family, share it on FB, instagram it, put it on your pinterest page, tweet about it etc. There is a lot of noise out there, so any support will be MOST WELCOME!!

You can easily start by clicking the share tools on this page.

THANK YOU!!!!!

Alex

The engineering is done and we are ready to start production. For some parts of the light there are minimum quantities. This is why I chose the "all or nothing" model for this campaign - we HAVE to get to the 35k in order to be able to produce a first batch. The funds will be needed for the following:

Tools// In order to produce the housing some custom made spray mold tools will have to be manufactured. 

Battery// The battery is key. When it comes to LiPo batteries you only want to work with the best. It has to meet high quality standards and of course one charge should last as long a possible! The vany will have a custom made LiPo battery.
Minimum quantities// for some parts of the light there are minimum quantities. This is why we chose the "all or nothing" model for this campaign - we HAVE to get to the 35k in order to be able to produce a first batch.

WHAT YOU GET





You will get THE BEST light source ever made for a mobile device. You will love it, you will play with it, you will be able to show yourself in the best light AND you have never look so good in a video chat! This will be very helpful when conducting an online job interview  for example, or while video chatting with your new date....;-)
It's basically a professional light source - your portraits and your selfies will reach a whole new level. The face is perfectly lit, the hair shines and your eyes look stunning. In fact, you will be able to take high end visuals of yourself and others.
















And there are some unique perks:
Get the one and only very first prototype, it's a collector's item! It's made of a 3D Print. It has no battery yet s you can only run it with an USB cable, BUT you are holding a piece of history in your hands! 
Handmade Pre-Series: it's the one we used in the campaign video. In order to see how the light could be built in higher quantities we went all the way and built a kind of a pre-series. It's somewhere between the first prototype and the finished product. It's fully functioning, re-chargeable and ready to go. You can use it just like the final product, but it's covered with a silky fabric. In the final version it won't be done like that.   (5 Units, each USD 300.--)
Get a fine leather strap with your  v a n y , handmade in Italy. (20 units USD 50.--)

    Risks & Challenges We will have to figure out how to scale up the production line in order to able to build not just a few pieces, but a high volume. But we've got this far, so we will figure out that step as well. We are lucky to be able to work with a very experience Swiss tech company!   Other Ways You Can Help SHARE THE IDEA! Send it to your friends & family, share it on FB, instagram it, put it on your pinterest page, tweet about it etc. There is a lot of noise out there, so any support will be MOST WELCOME!!
You can easily start by clicking the share tools on this page.
THANK YOU!!!!!
Alex

story:
AS SEEN ON

PetaPixel - https://petapixel.com/2017/09/27/kiki-designer-...

Fstoppers - https://fstoppers.com/gear/hand-woven-designer-...

The Hindu - http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-feature...

New Indian Express - http://www.edexlive.com/live-story/2017/sep/13/...

 

What are KIKI Straps?

KIKI camera straps are here to redefine the way you use your camera. Made with a beautiful soft cotton fabric, these straps are extremely comfortable to use and ease pressure on the neck & shoulder. Launching with 12 different colours & designs, the camera strap has officially evolved from being a purely functional device to a fashion accessory - you can match it with your wardrobe, adapting your camera strap with your changing tastes.

UNIQUE EXPANDABLE FEATURE

The width of every KIKI camera strap can be adjusted to suit your preference. You can make it a wider strap for your shoulder or a narrower strap for your neck. The width ranges from a convenient 2 inches to a generous 12 inches.

 

 

SUSTAINABLE MATERIALS

We spent a lot of time in research to find a material that would look good, be comfortable and take the weight of a dSLR & lens. After experimenting with different materials, we realised that the traditional Indian handwoven cotton fabric is a great solution since it is extremely strong, super soft of the skin and looks stunning. The corners of our strap is vegetable tanned leather that is super sturdy. 

 

RIGOROUSLY TESTED in VARIOUS CONDITIONS

KIKI straps are designed to withstand the various ordeals that a camera may go through. I was clear that I would only sell a strap that I would personally be proud to use in my professional life. After using a KIKI strap for more than 4 months as my primary camera strap, it has travelled with me to various countries. The strap proved effective at  keeping my NECK WARM in the COLD winds of PARIS and equally effective at ABSORBING SWEAT in the HOT INDIAN weather.

 

PRODUCT HIGHLIGHTS

 

TESTIMONIALS

 

12 DESIGNS AT LAUNCH (WITH MORE ON THE WAY!)

I like blue. You liked red. I like stripes. You like polka dots. Each one of us have different tastes and preferences.  At KIKI, we understand that. This is why we decided to have 12 DIFFERENT DESIGNS ready to go at LAUNCH.  We will be adding more designs when we start the manufacturing process and you will get the opportunity to explore our entire DESIGN LIBRARY and pick your favourite designs.

 

STORY OF KIKI

The camera straps that come included with the camera honestly look very generic and the synthetic material used in them starts to irritate the skin after prolonged usage. As a professional photographer, I have tried different camera straps but never felt fully satisfied with the options available. Some looked very boring and some were quite complicated to use. I wanted something that is comfortable as well as fashionable. 

The philosophy of KIKI is to rethink the way we use traditional Indian fabrics. These stunning materials & designs are all made by skilled artisans and I am truly excited at being able to incorporate them in the wardrobe of photographers worldwide. 

 

HANDWOVEN at POCHAMPALLY

The  100% NATURAL COTTON FABRIC is sourced from Pochampally, a town in Telangana, India where families have been weaving for centuries. This time honoured tradition produces excellent quality fabric which has proven to be the perfect fit for our camera straps.

 

BLOCK PRINTED by HAND at KOLAM STUDIO

 

Our mirrorless camera straps are made with handblock printed fabric, designed by Kolam Studios based in Hyderabad, India. An artisan does the traditional printing process by hand with carved wooden blocks to achieve the look.

 

OUR REUSABLE COTTON POUCH

Paper packaging is passé. We all know that paper/card boxes are discarded immediately after opening. So for our KIKI straps, we decided to go for a sustainable solution. All KIKI straps come in a eco-friendly drawstring cotton pouch. It becomes a handy place to store all the endless little things that us photographers always have lying around like spare batteries, extra memory cards, lens caps and so on.

 

THE PERKS

TIMELINE

COMPATIBLE with ALL digital SLR and mirrorless cameras

KIKI Camera Straps come equipped with the universal 10mm ends which are compatible with every major camera that is manufactured. They have been tested on cameras of all brands and sizes of cameras, from compact ones like Fuji X100T & Sony A7R2 to the larger sized ones like Nikon D5 & Canon 1Dx Mk II.

 

FAQs

When will I get my strap?

  • EARLY BIRD orders will be dispatched by end of OCT 2017
  • ALL OTHER orders will dispatched by mid DEC 2017
  • The straps are expected to be delivered within 7-10 working days of dispatch to all global addresses.

Can I pay with Indian debit cards and credit cards?

  • Yes. Stripe, our payment partner, accepts debit and credit cards from all countries.

Can I use it with my camera?

  • KIKI Camera Straps can be used with all digital SLR cameras and mirrorless cameras. This includes cameras from all manufacturers i.e Canon, Nikon, Sony, Fuji, Panasonic, etc. We recommend using the handwoven strap for dSLRs and block printed straps for mirrorless cameras.

What if my camera strap gets dirty?

  • KIKI Camera Straps can be washed by hand with a normal soap or detergent. Please ensure that you only wash the main fabric area and avoid soaking the leather corners in water/soap. Please do not wash them in a washing machine as the leather corners are not designed to be washed.

 

WHY CROWDFUNDING

The complete camera strap is put together by a manufacturer who specialises in creating niche leather goods by hand. We require a large minimum in order to work with them and are looking to YOU to support us in this endeavour. 

 

Risks & Challenges

The only risk we face is not getting fully funded. We have done adequate research and connected with all the suppliers needed for the respective materials to ensure that we are ready to go into production the moment the campaign is completed. Quality assurances have been agreed upon with manufacturers to ensure that we are able to deliver the product, as promised, in the estimated timeline.

TIMELINE

They have been tested on cameras of all brands and sizes of cameras, from compact ones like Fuji X100T & Sony A7R2 to the larger sized ones like Nikon D5 & Canon 1Dx Mk II.
 
FAQs
When will I get my strap?

EARLY BIRD orders will be dispatched by end of OCT 2017
ALL OTHER orders will dispatched by mid DEC 2017
The straps are expected to be delivered within 7-10 working days of dispatch to all global addresses.

Can I pay with Indian debit cards and credit cards?
Yes. Stripe, our payment partner, accepts debit and credit cards from all countries.
Can I use it with my camera?
KIKI Camera Straps can be used with all digital SLR cameras and mirrorless cameras. This includes cameras from all manufacturers i.e Canon, Nikon, Sony, Fuji, Panasonic, etc. We recommend using the handwoven strap for dSLRs and block printed straps for mirrorless cameras.

story:
台灣朋友可往下拉, 看後半部的中文解說.  2nd part has the same English content in Chinese.

 

ProView G3 is a wearable gimbal for GoPro camera. It provides 3-axis stabilization when the camera is locked to the gimbal, delivering professional cinematic video for any kind of activity.

 

 

FOR SPORTS

ProView G3 is specially designed for sports applications. With standard ¼ “ holes at the bottom and in the rear, it can be mounted anywhere a GoPro can be mounted.

REMOVE SHAKINESS

ProView G3 enables everyone to shoot like a pro with ease!

 

KEY FEATURES

 

3-Axis Stabilization

State-of-art brushless motor 3-axis stabilization technology as used by the filming industry 

 

Covers Major Action Cameras

GoPro Hero 6 / 5 / 4 / 3 / YI CAM / SJCAM / AEE / Garmin VIRB Ultra 30

 

Operating Time 4.5 Hour


Removable Rechargeable Battery

Replaceable rechargeable battery. Charge through USB port directly.

 

3 Stabilization Modes

Pan Follow: tilt and roll axis locked, pan axis follow
All Follow: roll axis locked, pan and tilt axis follow
All Lock: all 3-axis locked

 

 

 

6 Mounting Orientations

Provides maximum usage flexibility

 

 

 

Two 1/4 " Holes

Enables flexible mounting from bottom side for typical use, or from rear side with long extension pole for special occasions.
 

Auto Rotation Mode

User settable to rotate from position A to position B in configurable interval. Useful for timelapse photography.

 

FEATURE COMPARISON

 

SPECIFICATIONS

 

STRETCH GOAL

If we exceed 3X funding goal when the crowdfunding ends (surpassing $100,000) we'll upgrade ProView G3 to have pan axis able to rotate 360 degrees ! 

360 + 360, Two Axis Move Without Limits, Providing Even Greater Usage Flexibility !

 

HANDLE ACCESSORY

Turn the Wearable Gimbal into a Handheld Gimbal

A single button for ON/OFF control and mode selection.

A joystick for camera shooting angle adjustment.

Replaceable rechargeable battery. Charge through USB port directly.

 

CABLE CAM ACCESSORY

Glide camera over crowds at live events & sporting venues, point to point filming in difficult terrains. Create videos  not possible before!

Works for smartphone too!

 

Small and Light Weight

Take this ultra portable cable cam design anywhere and capture smooth motion footage. 

 

Easy Setup

Take just minutes to setup and send camera gliding on the rope.

 

Powerful

Can be used in some occasions requiring dolly, drone, or crane.

 

Autonomous and Intelligent

Can be set to "ping-pong" moving back and forth continuously between two programmable points or at a fixed distance. It decelerates to a smooth stop at the end point and reverse direction.

 

New Perspective

Providing a new way to operate the camera. Glide it through challenging narrow space or a few centimeters off the ground to capture new exciting perspectives. Glide it close to the action or over crowds where drones are difficult to use or not allowed. Ideal for capturing great moments in all kinds of events.

 

Extended Motion Time Lapse

Can go much further than other motion time lapse camera products, making your footage standout from the rest.  
 

Removable Rechargeable Battery

Replaceable rechargeable battery. Charge through USB port directly.

 

App Controlled

App controlled left/right direction, movement speed, A/B end points, movement distance.

Feature Comparison

 

Specifications

Yes, we're adding a small Bluetooth/2.4GHzRadio data-link to extend Bluetooth's 10m range to 100m range. This makes adding new capability/feature very easy to do by using App interface. 

 

Stretch Goal

If we exceed 3X funding goal when the crowdfunding ends (surpassing $100,000) we'll upgrade Cabal Cam to have 200m control range ! 

 

PROTOTYPING

We went through several generation of prototypes, now ready for mass production. Your support is needed to help bring it to the world! 

 

Production version made with proper tooling will look much better than these 3D printed prototypes !

 

PERKS

 

ProView G3 Early Bird ($99)

For the backers that pledge early. It includes ProView G3 Kit.

 

Best Deal Full Set Early Bird ($224)

For the backers that pledge early. It includes ProView G3 Kit + Handle Option + Cable Cam Option.

 

ProView G3 Kit ($129)

Includes ProView G3 wearable 3-axis gimbal, 2 rechargeable batteries, and an USB cable.

 

Handle Option ($39)

Includes the handle accessory, 1 rechargeable battery, and an USB cable.

 

Cable Cam Option ($149)

 Includes the Cable Cam  accessory, 25m rope, 2 end stop clip, 2 rechargeable batteries, USB cable.

 

Best Deal Full Set ($249)

Includes ProView G3 Kit + Handle Option + Cable Cam Option. 

 

TIMELINE

 

RISK and CHALLENGES
We at NAVIN have previously brought crowdfunded ProView S3 smartphone stabilizer to the hands of our backers and successfully launched to the market. We have working prototype of ProView G3, so there should be little chance for surprises later on. That being said, no manufacturing could be guaranteed without hiccups or delay beforehand. It could due to other sudden large order shortening originally planned capacity, or delay in receiving ordered materials, and so on. We have sufficient experience to reduce such risk to minimum. If there is a delay that will shift our shipping timeline, we will update you. We'll bend over backwards to get ProView G3 to you.
 

 

Thanks you!

The NAVIN Team

 

Media kit available here: http://bit.ly/2CnpyCs

 

Email Contact: info@navin.com.tw

 

=================================================================

Below is in above contents in Chinese. 

 

ProView G3 穿載式雲台為 GoPro 動相機提供三軸穩定, 讓您在極限運動中拍出的影片能有專業攝影般的流暢.

穿載應用

如同 GoPro 相機是以穿戴應用為主, ProView G3 設計也一樣是以穿戴應用為考量. 其底部與後方的 1/4 英吋螺孔讓您可以把它栓在您平常栓 GoPro 相機處來提供三軸穩定效果.

 

消除影像搖晃

ProView G3 讓您輕鬆拍出專業般的流暢穩定畫質.

 

主要特色

 

三軸穩定

採電影界拍片所用最先進的帶角度感測器的無刷電機三軸穩定技術.

 

支援大多款式運動相機

GoPro Hero 6 / 5 / 4 / 3 / YI CAM / SJCAM / AEE / Garmin VIRB Ultra 30

 

4.5小時操作時間

 

可更換的充電電池

充電電池續電力弱時可自行更換. 由 USB 接口充電.

 

三種穩定模式

航向跟隨模式: 俯仰軸與橫滾軸鎖定,航向軸跟隨.

全跟隨模式: 橫滾軸鎖定, 俯仰軸與航向軸跟隨.

全鎖定模式: 俯仰軸, 橫滾軸, 航向軸皆鎖定.

六種安裝方式

能因應各種應用.

兩個 1/4 英吋螺孔

可彈性應用底部的 1/4 英吋螺孔因應大多數穿載應用, 或用後方的 1/4 英吋螺孔掛於長桿上做特殊拍攝應用.

 

自動旋轉模式

可設定讓鏡頭經歷 A 時間由 B 方向轉至 C 方向.

 

性能比較

 

規格

 

延伸目標

若集資能超過目標三倍 (十萬美元) 我們就將 ProView G3 航向軸與俯仰軸升級為能做 360 度無限位轉動, 增加更多拍攝的可能性!

 

手把選配件

讓穿載式雲台也能做手持式雲台應用

單按鍵做開關與功能選擇

搖桿用來控制鏡頭轉向

充電電池續電力弱時可自行更換. 由 USB 接口充電.

 

Cable Cam 選配件

Cable Cam 讓 GoPro 相機能穿越狹隘空間、貼近拍攝物、或在室內環境人潮聚集無人機不適場合吊掛安靜滑動拍錄.

手機也能掛上!

 

小巧輕便

針對 GoPro 應用設計, 體積小重量輕方便攜帶

 

容易安裝

僅需幾分鐘即能將繩子綁好、完成運作設定、讓您的 GoPro 懸空滑行.

 

聰慧自動

可設定在繩上 A 點與 B 點兩點之間反覆以定速來回, 到末端 A 點或 B 點時會自動減速、停止、再反向運行.

 

新的視野拍法

能讓鏡頭穿越狹隘空間、貼近拍攝物、或貼近地面滑動拍錄. 在各種室內人潮聚集無人機不適的場合也能吊掛安靜滑動拍錄精彩的場面. 為 GoPro 相機提供前所未有的新玩法!

 

超長距離移動縮時攝影

比其它移動滑軌裝置能提供更長距離的縮時攝影拍攝, 讓您的作品更為突出顯目.

 

可更換的充電電池

充電電池續電力弱時可自行更換. 由 USB 接口充電.

 

App 控制

可由手機 App 做向左或向右跑方向設定、移動速度與距離設定, 繩上 A, B 兩 點位置設定, 單次單向滑動或自動來回往返運作.

 

規格

我們將有個藍芽轉 2.4G 傳輸的小盒子把藍芽 10 公尺距離延長為 100 公尺. 這讓未來透過 App 介面擴充功能非常容易.

 

雛型驗證

我們經過數次的雛型開發, 目前達可以準備進到量產階段. 需要您的支持, 我們才有機會將它量產實現, 與大家分享這產品.

開模後量產品會比目前用 3D 印列的雛型機漂亮!

 

贊助回饋

 

ProView G3 早鳥版 ($99 美元)

給最早的支柱者, 含 ProView G3 Kit 一套.

 

超值套組早鳥版 ($224 美元)

給最早的支柱者, 含 ProView G3 Kit 一套 + 手把配件一套 + Cable Cam 配件一套

 

ProView G3 Kit ($129 美元)

含 ProView G3 穿載雲台, 兩顆充電電池與 USB 充電線.

 

手把配件 ($39美元)

含手把, 一顆充電電池與 USB 充電線.

 

Cable Cam 配件 ($149美元)

含 Cable Cam 主機, 25公尺繩子, 兩個限位器, 兩顆充電電池與 USB 充電線.

 

超值套組 ($249 美元)

含 ProView G3 Kit一套 + 手把配件一套 + Cable Cam 配件一套.

 

時程表

 

風險

我們先前成功地把眾籌的 ProView S3 帶給每位支助者且在市場上推出. 我們有能運作的雛型機, 之後出意外的機率將低很多. 儘管如此, 之後量產仍難百分之百確定不會有延誤情況發生, 因為量產工廠若臨時接了大單排擠其他單子, 或某物料交期稍有延誤都會造成出貨的延遲…等等. 我們有足夠量產經驗能將延遲風險減至最低. 若有狀況發生, 我們將會及早通知, 並竭盡所能盡早將 ProView G3 與 Cable Cam 交到各位手上.

 

感謝!

NAVIN 團隊

 

媒體包 : http://bit.ly/2CnpyCs

郵箱: info@navin.com.tw

 

FAQ

Q1: 為什麼不用無人機拍就好, 還用 Cable Cam?

A1: 從這個非常專業昂貴的 Cable Cam 宣傳片即能清楚了解哪些應用場合無人機不適用: http://bit.ly/2AGbJtT . 移動縮時攝影也是 Cable Cam 的強項: http://bit.ly/2m2gPfK . ProView G3 + Cable Cam 以較頻易近人價位讓有 GoPro 相機的朋友也能入門玩 Cable Cam 的拍攝.
story_txt:
台灣朋友可往下拉, 看後半部的中文解說.  2nd part has the same English content in Chinese. ProView G3 is a wearable gimbal for GoPro camera. It provides 3-axis stabilization when the camera is locked to the gimbal, delivering professional cinematic video for any kind of activity.  
FOR SPORTS
ProView G3 is specially designed for sports applications. With standard ¼ “ holes at the bottom and in the rear, it can be mounted anywhere a GoPro can be mounted.


REMOVE SHAKINESSProView G3 enables everyone to shoot like a pro with ease! KEY FEATURES 3-Axis StabilizationState-of-art brushless motor 3-axis stabilization technology as used by the filming industry  
Covers Major Action CamerasGoPro Hero 6 / 5 / 4 / 3 / YI CAM / SJCAM / AEE / Garmin VIRB Ultra 30 
Operating Time 4.5 Hour

Removable Rechargeable Battery
Replaceable rechargeable battery. Charge through USB port directly. 3 Stabilization ModesPan Follow: tilt and roll axis locked, pan axis followAll Follow: roll axis locked, pan and tilt axis followAll Lock: all 3-axis locked   6 Mounting OrientationsProvides maximum usage flexibility   Two 1/4 " HolesEnables flexible mounting from bottom side for typical use, or from rear side with long extension pole for special occasions. Auto Rotation ModeUser settable to rotate from position A to position B in configurable interval. Useful for timelapse photography. FEATURE COMPARISON SPECIFICATIONS STRETCH GOALIf we exceed 3X funding goal when the crowdfunding ends (surpassing $100,000) we'll upgrade ProView G3 to have pan axis able to rotate 360 degrees ! 360 + 360, Two Axis Move Without Limits, Providing Even Greater Usage Flexibility ! HANDLE ACCESSORYTurn the Wearable Gimbal into a Handheld GimbalA single button for ON/OFF control and mode selection.A joystick for camera shooting angle adjustment.Replaceable rechargeable battery. Charge through USB port directly. CABLE CAM ACCESSORYGlide camera over crowds at live events & sporting venues, point to point filming in difficult terrains. Create videos  not possible before!Works for smartphone too! Small and Light WeightTake this ultra portable cable cam design anywhere and capture smooth motion footage.  Easy SetupTake just minutes to setup and send camera gliding on the rope. PowerfulCan be used in some occasions requiring dolly, drone, or crane. Autonomous and IntelligentCan be set to "ping-pong" moving back and forth continuously between two programmable points or at a fixed distance. It decelerates to a smooth stop at the end point and reverse direction. New PerspectiveProviding a new way to operate the camera. Glide it through challenging narrow space or a few centimeters off the ground to capture new exciting perspectives. Glide it close to the action or over crowds where drones are difficult to use or not allowed. Ideal for capturing great moments in all kinds of events. Extended Motion Time LapseCan go much further than other motion time lapse camera products, making your footage standout from the rest.   Removable Rechargeable BatteryReplaceable rechargeable battery. Charge through USB port directly. App ControlledApp controlled left/right direction, movement speed, A/B end points, movement distance.Feature Comparison SpecificationsYes, we're adding a small Bluetooth/2.4GHzRadio data-link to extend Bluetooth's 10m range to 100m range. This makes adding new capability/feature very easy to do by using App interface.  Stretch GoalIf we exceed 3X funding goal when the crowdfunding ends (surpassing $100,000) we'll upgrade Cabal Cam to have 200m control range !  PROTOTYPINGWe went through several generation of prototypes, now ready for mass production. Your support is needed to help bring it to the world! 





 

Production version made with proper tooling will look much better than these 3D printed prototypes !
 
PERKS
 
ProView G3 Early Bird ($99)
For the backers that pledge early. It includes ProView G3 Kit.
 
Best Deal Full Set Early Bird ($224)
For the backers that pledge early. It includes ProView G3 Kit + Handle Option + Cable Cam Option.
 
ProView G3 Kit ($129)
Includes ProView G3 wearable 3-axis gimbal, 2 rechargeable batteries, and an USB cable.
 
Handle Option ($39)
Includes the handle accessory, 1 rechargeable battery, and an USB cable.
 
Cable Cam Option ($149)
 Includes the Cable Cam  accessory, 25m rope, 2 end stop clip, 2 rechargeable batteries, USB cable.
 
Best Deal Full Set ($249)
Includes ProView G3 Kit + Handle Option + Cable Cam Option. 

 
TIMELINE RISK and CHALLENGESWe at NAVIN have previously brought crowdfunded ProView S3 smartphone stabilizer to the hands of our backers and successfully launched to the market. We have working prototype of ProView G3, so there should be little chance for surprises later on. That being said, no manufacturing could be guaranteed without hiccups or delay beforehand. It could due to other sudden large order shortening originally planned capacity, or delay in receiving ordered materials, and so on. We have sufficient experience to reduce such risk to minimum. If there is a delay that will shift our shipping timeline, we will update you. We'll bend over backwards to get ProView G3 to you.  Thanks you!The NAVIN Team Media kit available here: http://bit.ly/2CnpyCs Email Contact: info@navin.com.tw =================================================================Below is in above contents in Chinese.  ProView G3 穿載式雲台為 GoPro 動相機提供三軸穩定, 讓您在極限運動中拍出的影片能有專業攝影般的流暢.穿載應用如同 GoPro 相機是以穿戴應用為主, ProView G3 設計也一樣是以穿戴應用為考量. 其底部與後方的 1/4 英吋螺孔讓您可以把它栓在您平常栓 GoPro 相機處來提供三軸穩定效果. 消除影像搖晃ProView G3 讓您輕鬆拍出專業般的流暢穩定畫質.

 
主要特色 三軸穩定採電影界拍片所用最先進的帶角度感測器的無刷電機三軸穩定技術. 支援大多款式運動相機GoPro Hero 6 / 5 / 4 / 3 / YI CAM / SJCAM / AEE / Garmin VIRB Ultra 30 4.5小時操作時間 可更換的充電電池充電電池續電力弱時可自行更換. 由 USB 接口充電. 三種穩定模式航向跟隨模式: 俯仰軸與橫滾軸鎖定,航向軸跟隨.全跟隨模式: 橫滾軸鎖定, 俯仰軸與航向軸跟隨.全鎖定模式: 俯仰軸, 橫滾軸, 航向軸皆鎖定.六種安裝方式能因應各種應用.兩個 1/4 英吋螺孔可彈性應用底部的 1/4 英吋螺孔因應大多數穿載應用, 或用後方的 1/4 英吋螺孔掛於長桿上做特殊拍攝應用. 自動旋轉模式可設定讓鏡頭經歷 A 時間由 B 方向轉至 C 方向. 性能比較 規格 延伸目標若集資能超過目標三倍 (十萬美元) 我們就將 ProView G3 航向軸與俯仰軸升級為能做 360 度無限位轉動, 增加更多拍攝的可能性! 手把選配件讓穿載式雲台也能做手持式雲台應用單按鍵做開關與功能選擇搖桿用來控制鏡頭轉向充電電池續電力弱時可自行更換. 由 USB 接口充電. Cable Cam 選配件Cable Cam 讓 GoPro 相機能穿越狹隘空間、貼近拍攝物、或在室內環境人潮聚集無人機不適場合吊掛安靜滑動拍錄.手機也能掛上! 小巧輕便針對 GoPro 應用設計, 體積小重量輕方便攜帶 容易安裝僅需幾分鐘即能將繩子綁好、完成運作設定、讓您的 GoPro 懸空滑行. 聰慧自動可設定在繩上 A 點與 B 點兩點之間反覆以定速來回, 到末端 A 點或 B 點時會自動減速、停止、再反向運行. 新的視野拍法能讓鏡頭穿越狹隘空間、貼近拍攝物、或貼近地面滑動拍錄. 在各種室內人潮聚集無人機不適的場合也能吊掛安靜滑動拍錄精彩的場面. 為 GoPro 相機提供前所未有的新玩法! 超長距離移動縮時攝影比其它移動滑軌裝置能提供更長距離的縮時攝影拍攝, 讓您的作品更為突出顯目. 可更換的充電電池充電電池續電力弱時可自行更換. 由 USB 接口充電. App 控制可由手機 App 做向左或向右跑方向設定、移動速度與距離設定, 繩上 A, B 兩 點位置設定, 單次單向滑動或自動來回往返運作. 規格我們將有個藍芽轉 2.4G 傳輸的小盒子把藍芽 10 公尺距離延長為 100 公尺. 這讓未來透過 App 介面擴充功能非常容易. 雛型驗證我們經過數次的雛型開發, 目前達可以準備進到量產階段. 需要您的支持, 我們才有機會將它量產實現, 與大家分享這產品.

開模後量產品會比目前用 3D 印列的雛型機漂亮!
 
贊助回饋
 
ProView G3 早鳥版 ($99 美元)
給最早的支柱者, 含 ProView G3 Kit 一套.
 
超值套組早鳥版 ($224 美元)
給最早的支柱者, 含 ProView G3 Kit 一套 + 手把配件一套 + Cable Cam 配件一套
 
ProView G3 Kit ($129 美元)
含 ProView G3 穿載雲台, 兩顆充電電池與 USB 充電線.
 
手把配件 ($39美元)
含手把, 一顆充電電池與 USB 充電線.
 
Cable Cam 配件 ($149美元)
含 Cable Cam 主機, 25公尺繩子, 兩個限位器, 兩顆充電電池與 USB 充電線.
 
超值套組 ($249 美元)
含 ProView G3 Kit一套 + 手把配件一套 + Cable Cam 配件一套.
 時程表 風險我們先前成功地把眾籌的 ProView S3 帶給每位支助者且在市場上推出. 我們有能運作的雛型機, 之後出意外的機率將低很多. 儘管如此, 之後量產仍難百分之百確定不會有延誤情況發生, 因為量產工廠若臨時接了大單排擠其他單子, 或某物料交期稍有延誤都會造成出貨的延遲…等等. 我們有足夠量產經驗能將延遲風險減至最低. 若有狀況發生, 我們將會及早通知, 並竭盡所能盡早將 ProView G3 與 Cable Cam 交到各位手上. 感謝!NAVIN 團隊 媒體包 : http://bit.ly/2CnpyCs郵箱: info@navin.com.tw FAQQ1: 為什麼不用無人機拍就好, 還用 Cable Cam?A1: 從這個非常專業昂貴的 Cable Cam 宣傳片即能清楚了解哪些應用場合無人機不適用: http://bit.ly/2AGbJtT . 移動縮時攝影也是 Cable Cam 的強項: http://bit.ly/2m2gPfK . ProView G3 + Cable Cam 以較頻易近人價位讓有 GoPro 相機的朋友也能入門玩 Cable Cam 的拍攝.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.
