story:
Introducing ZwitchBlock 

The idea of ZwitchBlock is to maximize the functions of a phone case while minimizing the effect brought to the appearance of the design. Separated parts attachment is the solution to maintain simple design of a case rather than build-in design. Customer can transform the case by different 'block' to facilitate different usage, such as photo taking and video shooting. After finishing certain mission, the case can return to normal look. We hope this case is for 'Every-day' use.

Basic Tripod Kit

Party/gathering participant- Whenever you want to capture treasure moment in a party, you need 'ZwitchBlock'. It ensures that you do not miss anyone in the picture for holding the camera.

Photographer - It is agreed that most people think Iphone camera quality is amazing. Even professional photographers use Iphone to take pictures and movies. Standard tripod ¼" mount can suit any professional equipment like selfie stick, rail dolly, video stabilizer, handheld gimbals and Time-lapse cradle head.

GoPro Adventure Kit

Traveller and X-game sporter- Many gopro users take selfie videos during trip and X-game. The subject of the video can be shot more accurately with a liveview device. Thus, GoPro connector perfectly matches GoPro with Iphone.

Pet owner- Taking selfie with your sweet pet is not always an easy mission. To capture wonderful moment with fast moving objects, an adjustable live viewer is necessarily for making impossible success. 

How It Works


The case has two connection points for the 'block'. In other words, at the same time you can attach two 'blocks'. To assemble the 'Block', you just have to fasten the screws.

Introducing Zwisselfie

To amateur photographer and smartphone demographic:

The design of the Zwisselfie is referring to Swiss multitool/knife. The size perfectly fits your pocket while it is multi-functional. It is small like a key chain and you can bring it every day.


It comes equipped with an adjustable tripod screw head and a foldable design that serves as a selfie stick, tripod, handheld stabilizer as well as an actioncam grip.

The 4 modes:Selfie stick, Tripod, Handheld stabilizer, Actioncam grip


Besides, it perfectly fits ZwitchBlock because you can hide the part inside Zwisselfie.

The Design


Why $25,000?

Select Your Pledge

*The case is available for Iphone 6 and 6 plus, each backer will be asked after the end of campaign.

story:
INTRODUCING NEO

 

We created a camera that will deliver images in all direction with one click. NEO is equipped with two pairs of 190’ fisheyes lenses that are placed back and forth, which brings up an image of a fish in a standing posture. Each lens collects 180’ horizontal and 130’ vertical view, which allows you to check all 620’ views at the same time.

How NEO Works

 

Each Lens

Real Time Stitching

NEO captures two distinct images and stitches in real time. When you begin recording, NEO automatically stitches all the images it captured. 

 

 

 

 

WHY NEO?

 

 

620' Cylindrical Panorama 

 

 

Problems in real-time image processing in embedded environment

Processing through individual operations on limited resources is difficult to process in real time. This is why other IP cameras are dependent on specific PCs or high-end mobile devices. 

Neo is able to collect each step results into one LUT(coordianate reference table). It will drive into reducing the time by excecuting  simple iterative accelerated operation based on GPU. 

 

Easy to Setup and Easy to USE!

 

In build wifi NEO can be installed without any electric wires!

•Without DVR, NEO can be placed in anywhere to record on its own. Controlled directly from Internet and Smart devices, NEO allows you to monitor in real-time and check the recorded videos.

 

 

Design

 

 

 

Tech Spec

Patents

1. 10-1704362 (Korean Patent) - A real time panoramic image production system based on look-up table

2. 10-1725024 (Korean Patent) - A real time 360' VR video production system based on

look-up table

 

NEOBIGTHING FAMILY

 

Neobigthing strives to be an approachable and friendly company for audiences, and to create positive impact on IP Camera market. Started with 5 members, we invented real-time image stitching technology. Our innovative and breakthrough technology enables audiences to experience and create the future. At NeoBigThing, we collaborate with eagerness and passionate mind to pave a new gateway in IP Camera market. We are ready to bring delights to people all over the world with our products: 620' IP camera.

 

 

NEO Timeline

story:
It really hurts when a perfect moment is poorly captured or a creative vision is badly executed. You know what stings even more? The fact you already bought an expensive stabilizer but it’s too big and bulky to carry around.    

 

 

We believe perfect moments and creative visions should be captured and executed with ease and stability. That’s why we created Pocket - the most lightweight and intuitive single-axis phone stabilizer there is.

 

 

 

 

Pocket surpasses all other single-axis stabilizers when it comes to keeping it steady. Whatever video you want to shoot, Pocket delivers (and then some) with firm, reliable framing. 

 

 

 

Just like your smartphone, Pocket can go with you anywhere. Low-angle shots of tall trees, close-ups of birds, pans across entire vistas, rooftop recordings, random subway moments, road trip stories… with Pocket, nothing is out of reach. 

 

Lifting your stabilizer shouldn’t come with a groan. Or back pain (remember, bend those knees!). Pocket only weighs 145 grams. So, holding it is just like holding an iPhone6S. Throughout the design stage, we studied how people held things and analyzed the dimensions of the human palm. The results: a stabilizer that’s comfortably handheld and completely groan-free.

With Pocket, you have just a one-step setup, a one-touch switch between horizontal and vertical modes, and zero need to connect to an app. Simple as that. 

 

 

 

Pocket only costs $49. That’s half the price or even one-third the price of other stabilizers on the market. Why so low? Simple. Because we think everyone should have one. 

 

 

 

 

This is a footage of the running test of Sirui Pocket Stabilizer.

 

And another footage of the stair test.

 

 

 

With your Pocket order, you can package in our versatile tripod. We’ve won accolades for our tripod(SIRUI-R3213X), by the way (Red Dot Design Award “Best of the Best” 2018).

 

 

The tripod that comes with Pocket not only liberates you as an iPhone or Android auteur, it doubles as a selfie stick and comes with its own remote control. 

 

 

The tripod gives you the freedom to compose, and combines with our next accessory to provide you with optimal shooting effect… 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Comparable to top-of-the-line lenses such as Moment and Zeiss, the SIRUI wide-angle lens meets the highest standards in the industry, and is a must-have for quality videos.

 

 

 

Best of all, the lens and the stabilizer work in concert to remain steady even when the weight of the lens is added, and the lens clip adapter fits on most phones. Why narrow your horizons?

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Guangdong SIRUI Optical Co., Ltd was founded in 2001, and is located in Zhongshan City, Guangdong Province, China. SIRUI is known as a company that is developing, manufacturing and selling the most professional quality photographic and video equipment in the industry.SIRUI has won many awards in the past few years. For example, RedDot Design Award,the German Design Award and Guangdong Patent Gold Award.

 

 

LemoreLab successfully helped creators crowdfund over $10,000,000 from 30,000+ backers.

 

Risks and challenges

We understand and acknowledge that no project comes without risks and challenges. Despite our planning, there are circumstances that may be out of our control. If we are met with these events, we promise to communicate with full transparency to you, our backers, and work to resolve all issues in a timely manner.
story_txt:
It really hurts when a perfect moment is poorly captured or a creative vision is badly executed. You know what stings even more? The fact you already bought an expensive stabilizer but it’s too big and bulky to carry around.    
 


 
We believe perfect moments and creative visions should be captured and executed with ease and stability. That’s why we created Pocket - the most lightweight and intuitive single-axis phone stabilizer there is.
 

 
 




 
Pocket surpasses all other single-axis stabilizers when it comes to keeping it steady. Whatever video you want to shoot, Pocket delivers (and then some) with firm, reliable framing. 
 
 

 
Just like your smartphone, Pocket can go with you anywhere. Low-angle shots of tall trees, close-ups of birds, pans across entire vistas, rooftop recordings, random subway moments, road trip stories… with Pocket, nothing is out of reach. 


 
Lifting your stabilizer shouldn’t come with a groan. Or back pain (remember, bend those knees!). Pocket only weighs 145 grams. So, holding it is just like holding an iPhone6S. Throughout the design stage, we studied how people held things and analyzed the dimensions of the human palm. The results: a stabilizer that’s comfortably handheld and completely groan-free.

With Pocket, you have just a one-step setup, a one-touch switch between horizontal and vertical modes, and zero need to connect to an app. Simple as that. 
 
 


 
Pocket only costs $49. That’s half the price or even one-third the price of other stabilizers on the market. Why so low? Simple. Because we think everyone should have one. 
 




 

 

 
This is a footage of the running test of Sirui Pocket Stabilizer.

 
And another footage of the stair test.

 


 

 
With your Pocket order, you can package in our versatile tripod. We’ve won accolades for our tripod(SIRUI-R3213X), by the way (Red Dot Design Award “Best of the Best” 2018).
 

 
The tripod that comes with Pocket not only liberates you as an iPhone or Android auteur, it doubles as a selfie stick and comes with its own remote control. 
 
 
The tripod gives you the freedom to compose, and combines with our next accessory to provide you with optimal shooting effect… 
 

 

 

 
 

 
Comparable to top-of-the-line lenses such as Moment and Zeiss, the SIRUI wide-angle lens meets the highest standards in the industry, and is a must-have for quality videos.
 

 
 
Best of all, the lens and the stabilizer work in concert to remain steady even when the weight of the lens is added, and the lens clip adapter fits on most phones. Why narrow your horizons?
 

 
 
 

 

 


 
 

 
 

 

 

 

 
Guangdong SIRUI Optical Co., Ltd was founded in 2001, and is located in Zhongshan City, Guangdong Province, China. SIRUI is known as a company that is developing, manufacturing and selling the most professional quality photographic and video equipment in the industry.SIRUI has won many awards in the past few years. For example, RedDot Design Award,the German Design Award and Guangdong Patent Gold Award.
 

 
LemoreLab successfully helped creators crowdfund over $10,000,000 from 30,000+ backers.
 
Risks and challenges
We understand and acknowledge that no project comes without risks and challenges. Despite our planning, there are circumstances that may be out of our control. If we are met with these events, we promise to communicate with full transparency to you, our backers, and work to resolve all issues in a timely manner.

story:
Feel your focus, don’t rest on it

Shooting handheld while pulling your own focus usually means giving up the three-point stability of your rig or putting some of the camera’s weight on your focus hand, limiting your nuance of movement and fatiguing your hand faster. When placed in Verité mode, the patented Verité Handle rests in the crook of your elbow, leaving your hand free to focus without  destabilizing your rig.

Shoot how you want, when you want

When you don’t need to continuously pull focus, twist the Verité Handle into the traditional “handlebars” setup to shoot handheld the way you always have. When it’s time to pull focus again, another quick twist gets you back into Verité mode without missing a shot or putting your camera down.

Keep your shoot moving

Removing your Verité Handle is easy, thanks to our patent-pending Quick-Clamping Bridge. Just twist the lever lock on the bottom of the Verité Handle to release the bridge, without having to remove your matte box or other accessories. The Verité Handle fits neatly in your camera bag for easy traveling and storage.

Materials

To make the Verité Handle accessible as possible to new and bootstrapped filmmakers while also offering a strong and reliable product, I opted to manufacture it out of high-impact plastic using an injection molding process. 

Copolymer is plastic mixed with strengthening materials to create a high-impact hybrid material. This enabled us to balance the need for affordability with the demands of creating a product that you can trust to support up to 5lbs.

I worked with a former Volvo plastic engineer to turn my patented CAD renderings into a mold-ready design. After that, we began a year-long refinement process using 3D-printed plastic prototypes that enabled us to test for strength, functionality, comfort, and overall usability.  

We have sourced our vendors and locked down our budget numbers. Now we just need your backing to fund the initial mold creation and first round of manufacturing, packaging, and delivery.

Where we’re going

The Verité Handle is the first in a line of practically minded camera accessory products built by filmmakers for filmmakers. Your backing for this project not only brings a new handle setup to life, but will carry forward to other products that improve indie filmmaking.

Delivery

Following the close of this crowdfunding campaign, we’ll jump into production and plan to have the Verité Handle in your hands by mid-summer of this year.

About the creator

I’m Brent – an indie filmmaker with a background in engineering and product design. I came up with the Verité Handle in 2009 when I was the DP on a feature film with a shoestring budget. 

We didn’t have the money for secondary focus tools or crew members. I had to pull my own focus, and I didn’t want to give up three-point stability to do so. I DIY-ed an early version of the Verité Handle, and the idea was born.  

When shooting wrapped, I started designing, prototyping, and testing various approaches, and that led to the patented product I’m offering today. The product design has been readied for injection molding to deliver a strong, reliable, focus-ready shoulder rig handle to you.  

Thank you

The Verité Handle has been almost a decade in the making, and I’m excited to invite you along for the rest of the journey. Please don’t hesitate to reach out with any questions you might have. And thank you, from the bottom of my heart, for considering supporting this project and the future of Verité.

story:
At last! CYBERFROG ACTION FIGURES are GO!

7/13 UPDATED ARTICULATION!

We've added a ball joint in CyberFrog's neck, double jointed elbows, and a bicep pivot! All at YOUR request!  Big improvements!

 


We've been on a nice winning streak with ALL CAPS COMICS campaigns lately.  The success of our comics is undisputed, with CYBERFROG: BLOODHONEY, CYBERFROG 2: REKT PLANET and CYBERFROG: WARTS AND ALL breaking crowdfunded comics records. 

If you haven't read them yet, you can purchase them and other ALL CAPS COMICS merch at our eBay store, here: https://www.ebay.com/sch/cyberfrog9/m.html?_nkw...

 

Our customers love our comics, and we love you!  It feels like a good time to take a great big step together!  I've been working on a line of high quality action figures for the last year, and we're ready to go to production.  

Well, we're ready to go to production if I can get your support!

These action figures that I've got cookin' are fantastic.  They're competitive with anything you might find on store shelves right now.  They're 1/12 scale, like Hasbro's MARVEL LEGENDS toys.  They're highly detailed, beautifully painted, and are super articulated!  With your help, I can make this dream a reality! 

Can I pitch them to you, for your consideration?  

Modern CYBERFROG Action Figure!

Our hero, TRIKK RHAN, as he appears in the current CYBERFROG graphic novel series! Ambassador of Pyrdani, PROTECTOR OF EARTH! 

MODERN CYBERFROG Articulation

Our Frog is super posable, for lots of action and great display possibilities! Even his toes are individually articulated!

  • Inter-changeable head (no movement)
  • Shoulder rotate/pivot
  • 2 pcs elbow joint
  • Wrist pivot/hinge joint
  • Torso pivot
  • “T” pivot hip joints
  • Thigh pivot
  • 3 pcs knee joint
  • Calf pivot
  • Ankle pivot/hinge joint
  • Toes pivot

 

MODERN CYBERFROG STRETCH GOALS

If this campaign surpasses our funding goal, we're going to improve your Modern CyberFrog Action figure!

At $400,000, we'll be funded!  Let's make these toys!

 

Once we reach our goal, your Modern CYBERFROG will include:

THREE SETS OF HANDS!


And let's give your Frog an extra swap-out head with a toothy grimace! He's mad!

At $500,000, let's give your Frog a nasty Bee-Stung swap-out head! OUCH! Anyone have a bandaid?

At $550,000, let's give your Frog some FIREPOWER!  And more stretch goal bonuses are on the way!

 

'90s CYBERFROG Action Figure!

Our hero, Trikk Rhan, as he appeared in the 1990's Harris Comics series CYBERFROG, which was recently collected as a hardcover book in the CYBERFROG: WARTS AND ALL IndieGoGo campaign!

 

'90s CYBERFROG ARTICULATION!

This Frog has the same articulation as Modern CyberFrog!

  • Inter-changeable head (no movement)
  • Shoulder rotate/pivot
  • 2 pcs elbow joint
  • Wrist pivot/hinge joint
  • Torso pivot
  • “T” pivot hip joints
  • Thigh pivot
  • 3 pcs knee joint
  • Calf pivot
  • Ankle pivot/hinge joint
  • Toes pivot

'90s CYBERFROG STRETCH GOALS

If this campaign surpasses our funding goal, we're going to improve your 90s CyberFrog Action figure!

At $400,000, we'll be funded!  Let's make these toys!  Your 90's CYBERFROG will include this display stand

A total of 3 sets of HANDS!

 

 

And let's give your Frog an extra swap-out head with a evil grin! Get 'em, CyberFrog!

At $500,000, let's give your Frog a swap out hand, holding a severed Vyzpzz head!

At $550,000, let's give your Frog some FIREPOWER! 

 

HEATHER SWAIN Action Figure!

CyberFrog's pal Heather, survivor of the VYZPZZ INVASION, remembers the world the way it was, and will fight with all of her heart to raise her daughter in a world free from stinging alien parasites!

 

HEATHER SWAIN ARTICULATION!

Your Heather Swain figure is extremely posable, and terrific for creating great fight scenes against the vicious VYZPZZ parasites! But I think you'll agree, she's also one of the most beautiful female action figures ever sculpted!

  • Inter-changeable head ball joint
  • Shoulder rotate/pivot
  • 2 pcs elbow joint
  • Wrist pivot/hinge joint
  • Torso pivot
  • “T” pivot hip joints
  • Thigh pivot
  • 3 pcs knee joint
  • Ankle pivot joint

 

 

HEATHER SWAIN STRETCH GOALS!

If this campaign surpasses our funding goal, we're going to improve your HEATHER SWAIN Action figure!

At $400,000, we'll be funded!  Let's make these toys!

And once funded, let's add a nice HONEYCOMB STAND DISPLAY w/ ARTICULATED ARM for your HEATHER SWAIN!

Plus your HEATHER SWAIN a total of 3 sets of swap-out hands!

And let's give your Heather Swain this awesome war-ponytail swap out head!  Don't mess with this girl!

At $500,000, on the other hand, let's give Heather a nice smile!

At $550,000, let's arm Heather to the teeth!!  Here's a WEAPONS PACK for our girl!

 

VYZPZZ Action Figure!

A terrifying alien plague that infested and destroyed human civilization in 1998, the Vyzpzz (pronounced "Ves-piz") are vicious giant wasps that have conquered and colonized Earth.  Their saliva transforms human blood into nourishing honey for their young, and melts flesh and bone into pulp for their hives.  Their stings paralyze.  Their exoskeletons are hard and thick.  They are highly intelligent and cruel.  

And there are billions of them.  

Vyzpzz Articulation!

Your Vyzpzz action figure is one of the most beautifully articulated toys you'll own!  You'll love creating scenes with them, especially if you pre-order more than one!  Create your own SWARM!

  • Ball joint neck
  • Ball joint thorax
  • Sting pivot abdomen
  • 3 piece pivot leg x 6
  • Wing pivot x 4

 

VYZPZZ STRETCH GOALS!

If this campaign surpasses our funding goal, we're going to improve your VYZPZZ Action figure!

At $400,000, we'll be funded!  Let's make these toys!

 

Also, let's add a nice HONEYCOMB STAND DISPLAY w/ ARTICULATED ARM for your VYZPZZ Alien!

 

VARIANT EDITION ALL CAPS HEATHER SWAIN!

Backers who purchase either "CYBERFROG Wave 1! SET of FOUR" OR  "TWO Complete Sets of 4 Toys" will unlock this exclusive VARIANT HEATHER SWAIN ACTION FIGURE option at Check Out!  You'll be able to ADD ON your VARIANT HEATHER SWAIN for an additional $40!  

She will come complete with all of the accessories and swap outs that this campaign may unlock!

FUTURE STRETCH GOALS?

If this campaign over performs beyond our wildest dreams, past $900,000, we will add new bonuses to all of these toys!  A flame-thrower for Heather?  RumbleBee's Laser Wings for CyberFrog?  DeathFly's Amulet for 90's CyberFrog?  All possibilities!

Also, we'll unlock the possibility of a bonus comic book or trading card packs for each of these figures!  We're ready to make this an even BETTER deal for our backers!

LET'S GET THIS FROG JUMPIN'!

 

Note about shipping and VAT tax to UK and Europe: We absolutely hate this, but we must add a 20% charge of the total purchase to your order, through the shipping costs in order to be compliant and sell from the United States to our European friends.  You'll find that charge at check out.  Taxation is theft.  Sorry.

story:
StarSky Comics presents the MUST HAVE comic book of 2022! Aslan The Awakening

Hello, my friends, and welcome to the Aslan The Awakening IGG campaign! I'm Adjanu Bouzi, a 28-year-old army veteran with a passion for telling great stories. I am having the time of my life creating a new universe centered around self-love, adventure, ninjas, monsters, and fantasy. All of my books will interconnect to form a connected universe that my characters and events will cohabitate. I am passionate about comics and the art form. I hope you are too and will come along for the ride!

Thanks for taking a look and backing true independent comics!

Best,

Bouzi

Art by the talented Jacob Noble 

 

The Story

Heavy is the head that wears the crown...but this one...is worth it. In the faraway land of Margo, a battle for control of the fabled Crown of Power is about to begin...for whoever has it...will rule the land. 

Those who desire to gain the crown for evil will stop at nothing to take hold. Therefore, humanity's only hope lies in the hands of the few chosen among the humans who were given extraordinary powers.

One...is a half-human named Aslan. Who carries in him the powers of destruction. All Aslan wants is to help bring peace to the land and find a place where he can call home. But before he can win the battles for the crown, he must first win the war in his mind. 

So he must learn to work with the others and earn the crown before it's too late. This is a story called...Aslan.

 

Preview of Interior Pages 


 

 

 

STRETCH GOALS

Everybody wins when these stretch goals are unlocked:

$5K- Aslan Sticker! UNLOCKED

$7K- Aslan TRADING CARD! LOCKED 

$10K- Zion & UJDA TRADING CARDS! LOCKED 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Guess what? There are none! I deliver on my promises and keep my backers in the loop and informed at every step of the process. After the campaign ends and the production work begins, I will send updates every Monday of what was accomplished the previous week.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

I know times are tough. If you can't financially support the campaign, please consider sharing the link and talking it up to your network of friends and colleagues. 

Thank you for checking out this campaign and considering to support it.

story:
The BLUE BOMBSHELL!

The Blue Bombshell is in ALL OUT ACTION as she faces off against some of her DEADLIEST ENEMIES!  All while trying to keep her top on!  It's skantily clad adventure as the Blue Bombshell's indestructible rack is always bursting at the seams in this ADULT adventure!  This is a 48 page full color comic with Adult Content and Nudity, so ADULTS ONLY!COVER A

 

COVER B

COVER C ADULT VARIANT (Final Art will NOT be censored.)

STRETCH GOALS!

AT $30K Every backer gets a Hologram Lenticular Trading Card of the BLUE BOMBSHELL!!!

AT $40K Every backer gets a Bonus Comic!!! SWORD MAIDENS is an ADULT NSFW Swords and Sorcery Comic that is completely finished and will be included with whatever Reward Tier you choose!!!

Final Art for Sword Maidens Stretch Goal Comic will NOT be censored!

The Blue Bombshell must face off against her most villainous enemies!  Including the PINK PUSSY CAT, the nefarious FETISH, and the nocturnal vampire BLOODTHIRSTY!

Interior Art

Follow the BLUE BOMBSHELL'S fantastic adventures as she chases her villainous enemies around the world, ending up in one of the strangest places of all... THE RAVAGED LANDS!!!

The Blue Bombshell and her allies in the Superiors are drawn into danger as they face off against threats like SPACE APE, the RAPTOR, and DEATHWING!  All while trying to save the world and keep her costume from busting apart at the seams!!!

It's pulse pounding ACTION and non stop ADVENTURE with the BLUE BOMBSHELL!!! And remember the Blue Bombshell is an ADULTS ONLY book and will contain Nudity and Adult Themes.

 

Final Art will NOT be Censored.  Get ready for some FUN adventure and comedic wardrobe malfunctions as the BLUE BOMBSHELL bursts into Action!!!

BLUE BOMBSHELL ADULT ART BOOK (Final Art will NOT be censored.)

Retro Fun with Vintage 70's Blue Bombshell! Facing off against her arch-foe the TROMBONER!!!  ***(Retro Covers, Pin Ups, Character Designs and Sketches will all be included in the Adult Sketch Book!)***

BLUE BOMBSHELL teams up with SISTER POWER to face the menace of the man called TRIPOD!

story:
FIENDISHCOMIC.COM

FIENDISH  is an independent fantasy comic by Irene Strychalski. Taking inspiration from classical fantasy and ancient history, and merging influences from both Eastern and Western comics, FIENDISH follows a group of young men and women as they seek the truth behind a demon infestation.
  The first chapter, Demons, is an action-filled 50-page introduction to this mystery tale; and this printed volume will include 10 pages of extra content, a preface to the constructed language of Nunarsa, as well as guest pinups from Carlos Nicolas Zamudio and Ivan Pineda.
  And, as the 10K stretch goal has now been reached, that means the final book will be in color!!
  Help me get this exciting new project off the ground- and get the book plus several limited-run items in return!

 

◆◆◆

   As a child, Kazimir was the sole survivor of a mysterious demon attack on his hometown of Dorvo. Years after fleeing the massacre, Kaz thought he had left his nightmares behind- until the same monsters resurface and kill again.
   Along with several companions who also wish revenge upon the beasts, Kaz sets out to revisit his past, uncover the truth behind Dorvo's downfall, and hopefully put an end to the fiendish infestation.

COLOR COVER

 

 

GRAYSCALE COVER

 

INTERIOR ART

 

 

◆◆◆

  Hi, I'm Irene! I'm a comic artist, illustrator, and animation artist who started my career on pencils and inks for Deadpool Family in 2011. Since then, I have drawn backgrounds for animated shows such as FX's Archer, done character and background art for Marvel television animation, and penciled and inked comics such as SILK and Edge of Venomverse.
  My lifelong dream, however, has always been to create my own comic. FIENDISH is the realization of that dream. I have combined my love for seinen manga such as Berserk, Vinland Saga, and Vagabond with my admiration for fantasy European comics like Sigfried into this project.
  I ADORE building worlds, writing mysteries, and drawing monsters. For the past three years, I have built FIENDISH to be a project where I can do exactly that. I can't wait to share this world and the rest of the story with you! I'm sure you're going to love Kazimir, Iskel, and Yeomi's journey as much as I already do, and this is just the beginning!

 

 

◆◆◆

 

 

 

 

◆◆◆

 

 

 

 

◆◆◆

  The first chapter is completely finished- that means penciled, inked, shaded, lettered, and formatted, with cover art and extra content- completely ready to go! Therefore there is no risk of you, my esteemed pledger, not receiving your book. 
  The largest challenge that I currently face is finding a good factory to produce the demon standee, though that is just a matter of careful research.  We must also keep any shipping delays into account. With the ongoing pandemic, shipping will likely take longer than normal, both from the printer to me and from me to you. However, I am factoring plenty of breathing room into the equation, and part of the funds will go towards paying for help packing and shipping items. I am aiming to put most products in your hands by end of August 2021!

 

◆◆◆

  Not everyone has the spare cash to contribute, and I totally understand!
  If this project looks promising to you, you can always help by just sharing this page, sharing the comic website (fiendishcomic.com) , or sharing the FIENDISH Instagram page (@fiendish.comic) . 

  No matter what you decide, thank you for stopping by, and thank you for your interest in FIENDISH!

 

◆

story:
TopJoy Butterfly is a full-featured, ultra-portable color e-book reader with 6 and 7.8-inch screen size options. Equipped with a true color DES screen, TopJoy Butterfly offers 300 PPI for black & white content and unparalleled 150 PPI for color. Powered by the Android 11 operating system, TopJoy Butterfly is a versatile reading pad for different file formats and popular reading apps that make your reading experience effortless. Included with a stylus with an eraser, TopJoy Butterfly 7.8 inch e-reader empowers you to read, sketch, and take notes while enhancing the full-color paper-like reading and writing experience. Portable, lightweight, and compact, it is the BEST GO-TO reading pad for everyday use!

 

 

TopJoy has adopted the latest Display Electronic Slurry (DES) technology for Butterfly. This revolutionary technology provides higher resolution than traditional e-ink displays for better clarity and a MARKET-LEADING 150 PPI color display. The vivid, real colors powered by DES tech results in a more paper-like experience that is great for artists, creative professionals, and everyday readers.

 

Featuring a true color DES screen, TopJoy Butterfly e-reader delivers up to 1404*1872 high resolution and better readability in both monochrome and color, presenting 300 PPI for a sharp and crisp display of black & white content. When using TopJoy, it’s just like holding a hardcover book, comfortable, clear and easy on the eyes yet more compact and convenient.

 

 

Reading is one of the joys of life. How can we embrace reading? Since TopJoy Butterfly is running an Android 11 OS, you will have access to basically all book resources on the internet. With the ultimate in compatibility, TopJoy supports virtually any eBook format including EPUB、FB2、MOBI、RTF、PDF、TXT and other reading apps. You’re now one click away from an imaginative wonderland full of knowledge, adventure and entertainment.

 

TopJoy Butterfly e-reader offers 6” and 7.8“ inch sizes options at just 185g and 315g in weight. It’s ultra-portable, compact and each comes with a protective case. Take your avant-garde pocket-sized e-reader home and use it every day! TopJoy is a jack of all trades and your best GO-TO for reading.

 

The 7.8-inch TopJoy Butterfly e-reader comes with a stylus, which allows you to take notes on PDF, EPUB, TXT, and other ebook files. It also supports Wi-Fi and Bluetooth data transfer to quickly move or share your files. 

 

In the Note feature of TopJoy 7.8" e-reader, you can feel free to make sketches or leave your handwriting with our 4096-level stylus with eraser. Have fun and make your delicate sketches.

 

Sharing always doubles the fun. The Bluetooth and WiFi built into TopJoy Butterfly empower you to share your inspiration with others with simple steps. An interesting sketch by you, maybe a piece of wonderful description, share them with your friends or on Facebook easily and fast. Get knowledge and fun together!

 

Beyond just text, TopJoy Butterfly can bring you to a more entertaining world. No matter is One Piece, Marvel, or comics and graphic novels for children, you can enjoy them with TopJoy Butterfly. The DES screen of TopJoy Butterfly allows you both clear full-color display and eyesight protection.

 

Thanks to the adjustable built-in reading front light and the diffuse reflection technology inside, TopJoy Butterfly greatly reduces eye fatigue and strain. Its glare-free DES screen doesn’t reflect unwanted light toward your eyes. Thanks to the built-in noise-canceling microphone & BOX speaker, it’s perfect for quiet reading sessions before bed or drifting off to sleep while listening to an audiobook, perfect for nighttime stories with your kids. With TopJoy, tiredness ceases, so reading never stops.

 

Powered by a 3.8V 1500mah/3200mah battery (6 inch/7.8 inch), TopJoy is your ever-ready device for life-long reading. It provides up to 35 or 70 days standby time (6 inch/7.8 inch) before you have to recharge it, depending on which model you’re using.

 

For dedicated e-reader users, speed is essential. Embedded with a 1.8GHz 4 Core processor and 2GB RAM & 32GB ROM, TopJoy Butterfly has quick response and offers excellent page turn speed.

 

 

What can we do to start saving our planet? For book lovers, consuming less paper can make a BIG difference. Using an e-reader saves trees used for books, magazines, and paper. TopJoy Butterfly e-reader provides the best paper-like experience and meets all your needs. No matter if you’re a young reader or you’ve earned a life full of experiences, now is the time to make an impact and be part of the worldwide campaign for the future of the planet.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Founded in 2002, TopJoy is a team engaged in the research, design, and manufacturing of consumer electronics. We are committed to providing high-quality, people-oriented products with the belief that “innovation to guide fashion, integrity to build the future”.

As more and more electronic devices fill our day-to-day work and life, we need to take a breather from the blue screen while enjoying the convenience of the Internet. We hope to promote the development of electronic devices in a healthier direction and bring these healthy reading experiences to more people.

story:
Hello, potential IndieGoGo backers!

It is I, Ethan Van Sciver, your friend, Human Sunbeam and purveyor of fine ALL CAPS COMICS product!

The CYBERFROG 2: REKT PLANET campaign was hugely successful, and part of that was because we offered an option for backers to order ALL of the books and product in one handy HONEYCOMB BOX!  We offered a limited number of these, and all 2500 of them sold out!

But many wished aloud that the original campaign had offered a similar Magnetic Storfolio, so that they could collect and display their CYBERFROG: BLOODHONEY comics next to their HONEYCOMB BOX!  It just seemed like a neat idea, so we've gone back and created this absolutely beautiful BLOODHONEY BOX just for you!

BLOODHONEY BOX w/ Magnet Closure
Outer Final Size : 11.181 H x 8.11 W x 2.48 D; Inner Cavity Final Size: 10.7 H x 7.71 W x 2.04 D
Bleeds
95.0 lb Sterling Ultra C1S Label mounted to 3mm Board
4cp + 2 color Foil Stamp / 0
Laminate 1.2 mil matte glueable stampable one side flush, Two color Foil Stamp, Mount and assemble box with 2 magnetic closure
The "CYBERFROG" logo is green foil stamped, and the "Bloodhoney" logo is laser prismatic stamped...really, you will LOVE your BLOODHONEY BOX!

ONE OF EVERYTHING!

You will receive ONE OF EVERY ITEM SIGNED, as well as the SECRET PERK, and every additional stretch goal and new offering!  A very convenient subscription to this campaign!

LET'S STUFF YOUR BOX!

Customize your order at Check Out, and add some new CYBERFROG exclusives to your BLOODHONEY BOX!

ULTIMATE BLOODHONEY!

We've remastered and represented the classic first issue of the CYBERFROG reboot!  

It now features:

-New Lettering by Eric Weathers!

-Heavier Paper Stock!

-Added story, "1998: THE DIARY OF HEATHER SWAIN"!

-Embossed and Sculpted Covers!

-Perfect Bound!

-80 Pages of Art and Story!

You have your choice between SILVER FOIL or our GHOST EDITION!

(Ghost Edition.  Glossy White Embossed and Sculpted)

(Silver Edition.  Silver Foil Embossed and Sculpted)

Matching PVC CYBERFROG and SALAMANDROID limited edition toys in Gold, Silver and White Unpainted will be available for sale on our eBay store after this campaign closes! Here's the link to check out everything available now! https://www.ebay.com/sch/cyberfrog9/m.html?item=124656531208&hash=item1d061bb708%3Ag%3AIj4AAOSwmjdeXwUI&rt=nc&_trksid=p2047675.l2562

BLOODHONEY DRAINED!

VERY excited about this one!  We're offering a completely stripped down version of CYBERFROG BLOODHONEY, with no color or lettering, just the line art interiors!  This is the first time we've offered this, but we listen to our customers, and we're doing it!

The best part?  We've got TWO ACETATE covers by DALE KEOWN to choose from!  Check these out!


CYBERFROG AND HEATHER Acetate Cover!

SALAMANDROID Acetate Cover!   

These comics will feature a foreground image on an acetate cover, and which will open to a cardstock page with the logo and background image!  You will LOVE how beautiful these comics look!

Have you read CYBERFROG?  Here's the pitch:

"The return of CYBERFROG, awakened into a world seized by a swarm of murderous alien hornets.

Ethan Van Sciver reintroduces his cult-classic independent comics hero from the 1990s to a new generation of fans with CYBERFROG: BLOODHONEY, the first part of an ongoing series of graphic novels.

Sent in a sentient vehicle from the planet Pyrdani, CyberFrog and Salamandroid arrive on Earth to defend it from the impending invasion of The VYZPZZ.  But with humanity's pop culture and junk food distractions, are our amphibian friends adequately prepared for a ruthless enemy, and the war to come?  It's a story of survival, friendship and accountability, and it begins here!"

THE REALLY GOOD NEWS:

We've already got the BLOODHONEY BOX and the ULTIMATE CYBERFROG BLOODHONEY editions in stock and ready to ship!  We've also begun production on BLOODHONEY DRAINED books, and we'll have them ready for you so the wait will be non-existent!  As soon as this campaign closes, we're shipping your stuff!

STRETCH GOALS!

WE'VE SMASHED INTO SIX FIGURES OF FUNDING!

 

EVERY BACKER is getting a total of SIX NEW and EXCLUSIVE TRADING CARDS with their order!

We're going to do cards:

P4 LILY OWEN

P5 KJELL SINN


And then four new R series cards featuring 

EARWIG

DEMENTIPEDE

TRAUMADEUS

DYSTOPIA

Congrats!  And thank you for helping this campaign pass $100,000!

Our next STRETCH GOAL is a big one! 

At $120,000, a new book will be added to the campaign, which will be included automatically if you ordered the STUFFED BOX! 1 of EVERYTHING tier!

THE CYBERFROG ART OF JON MALIN. 

We're going to press!  Here's the NEW cover art by JON MALIN, as well as a beautiful variant cover by SHANE DAVIS!  Choose which one you'd like, or Add On the other at check out and get BOTH for a small shipping fee!  

We've upgraded the book to 32 pages!

 

 

 

 

A new high quality ashcan featuring all of the drawings of CYBERFROG done by fan favorite ComicsGate legend JON MALIN! 24 pages with colors by GABE ELTAEB and INKSPOTS!

This item is UNLOCKED!! You can buy one for $10!  But if you've backed the STUFFED BOX tier, RELAX and ENJOY, you've already got it coming to you, already signed!

So let's do it!  LET'S GET THIS FROG JUMPING AGAIN!

Ethan Van Sciver

ALL CAPS COMICS

cult-classic independent comics hero from the 1990s to a new generation of fans with CYBERFROG: BLOODHONEY, the first part of an ongoing series of graphic novels.Sent in a sentient vehicle from the planet Pyrdani, CyberFrog and Salamandroid arrive on Earth to defend it from the impending invasion of The VYZPZZ.  But with humanity's pop culture and junk food distractions, are our amphibian friends adequately prepared for a ruthless enemy, and the war to come?  It's a story of survival, friendship and accountability, and it begins here!"THE REALLY GOOD NEWS:We've already got the BLOODHONEY BOX and the ULTIMATE CYBERFROG BLOODHONEY editions in stock and ready to ship!  We've also begun production on BLOODHONEY DRAINED books, and we'll have them ready for you so the wait will be non-existent!  As soon as this campaign closes, we're shipping your stuff!STRETCH GOALS!WE'VE SMASHED INTO SIX FIGURES OF FUNDING! EVERY BACKER is getting a total of SIX NEW and EXCLUSIVE TRADING CARDS with their order!We're going to do cards:P4 LILY OWENP5 KJELL SINNAnd then four new R series cards featuring EARWIGDEMENTIPEDETRAUMADEUSDYSTOPIACongrats!  And thank you for helping this campaign pass $100,000!Our next STRETCH GOAL is a big one! At $120,000, a new book will be added to the campaign, which will be included automatically if you ordered the STUFFED BOX! 1 of EVERYTHING tier!THE CYBERFROG ART OF JON MALIN. We're going to press!  Here's the NEW cover art by JON MALIN, as well as a beautiful variant cover by SHANE DAVIS!  Choose which one you'd like, or Add On the other at check out and get BOTH for a small shipping fee!  We've upgraded the book to 32 pages!
    A new high quality ashcan featuring all of the drawings of CYBERFROG done by fan favorite ComicsGate legend JON MALIN! 24 pages with colors by GABE ELTAEB and INKSPOTS!This item is UNLOCKED!! You can buy one for $10!  But if you've backed the STUFFED BOX tier, RELAX and ENJOY, you've already got it coming to you, already signed!So let's do it!  LET'S GET THIS FROG JUMPING AGAIN!Ethan Van SciverALL CAPS COMICS

story:
SHI: OMNIBUS EDITION 

EXPANDED TO 500 PAGES AND IS NOW AT THE PRINTER!

Last Chance To Get The Omnibus At The Exclusive Discount Price Of Just $60.00!

Book will only be offered at its regular $100.00 price once the campaign ends.

 

The 11.25" X 7.75 are just the interior page dimensions. With cover, it will be even larger!

Twelve Stretch Goals have been unlocked:

  • Special Dust Jacket Cover
  • Stitched-In 3/8” Satin Bookmark Ribbon
  • Omnibus Trading Card
  • 5" Vinyl Sticker
  • Death Demon Rising Mini-Print
  • All Books Expanded Oversized Format
  • Deborah Tucci “Strike A Pose” Trading Card
  • Death Has A New Face Gold Foil Trading Card
  • Crusade Comics Shield Car Magnet  
  • Gold Foil Cover Enhancement With Spot Gloss
  • Omnibus Expanded From 488 To 500 Pages
  • Andrew J. Roth Shi Commission Trading Card!

 

For the first time ever, the multi-Eisner Award nominee is collected in a Full-Color, Premium-Formatted, Hard Cover Omnibus Edition!

The groundbreaking masterwork of award-winning creator Billy Tucci that literally changed the face of comics and launched the "Bad Girl" revolution returns in this premier formatted, 488-page Hard Cover edition!

The Omnibus collects all 12 issues of Shi: Way of the Warrior, the three-part interlacing Tomoe miniseries, and the 48-page, Shi Vs. Tomoe celebrating the 25th Anniversary of this epic crossover classic that ran from 1994-1996.

This modern-day samurai saga introduces the story of Ana Ishikawa, a young woman born of two cultures and drafted into a shadow war that has existed for over 500 years. In this complete omnibus, we follow Ana as she begins her violent assault on the Yakuza Oyabun Masahiro Arashi. But after several fiery clashes and witnessing the grieving children of those she’s slain in battle; Ana turns away from the sword.

Now the hunter becomes the hunted as Arashi seeks his own revenge against this faceless assailant… and his answer Ana’s Kyoto Sohei (descendants of the medieval warrior-monks) centuries-old enemy, the Narans, led by her best friend, the sociopathic assassin Tomoe.

Heartbreaking twists and exhilarating turns ensue as Ana’s mission unravels into one of blood and madness… and whose culmination’s only salvation is mercy and forgiveness.

 

Originally brought to you by legendary creators Billy Tucci, Peter Gutierrez, Barry Orkin, Michael Bair, Gary Cohn, Dan Mishkin, Jimmy Palmiotti, Amanda Conner, and more, Crusade Comics has spared no expense in delivering you this incredible collection. Every story page has been digitally re-mastered from the original comic book pages and also chock full of extra content.

With a Forward and Afterward by comic book legends, Chris Claremont and Stan Sakai, the Shi: Omnibus Vol. 1, is the perfect time capsule capturing the steady progression of a struggling artist's self-published first work into one of the most influential comic characters of the 1990s whose legacy still shines today.

But wait there’s more!

As a special to our Indiegogo backers, we are offering this Exclusive, Limited-Edition, Gold Foiled, Shi: Way of the Warrior 25th Anniversary Signed & Numbered, 11" X 17" Lithograph!

We’re offering lots of other Shi-related items including original artwork, prints, shirts, commissions, the Shi: Way of the Warrior Score by Christopher Caliendo and special editions, including the ASH CAN EDITION to Ana’s next great adventure, launching this October, Shi: Sakura!

 

SHI: SAKURA ASH CAN EDITION BY TUCCI, PEROS & LIMA

\

 

THE SHI: WAY OF THE WARRIOR GALLERY BOOK VOL. 1

 

THE SHI: OMNIBUS REMARKED PRINT BY BILLY TUCCI

 

OMNIBUS SKETCH EDITION WITH SAMPLE ILLUSTRATION

 

THE SHI: WAY OF THE WARRIOR PRINT SET

SHI: The Original Comic Book Soundtrack

National Society of Film Critics Heritage award-winning composer Christopher Caliendo (CBS - Emmy nomination, SONY Pictures, 20th Century Fox), enriches comic fandom with his soaring and inspiring original Shi: The Way of the Warrior soundtrack! The operatic score reveals Ana’s journey like never before!  Mixing authentic Japanese instruments, street-pop with an 18-minute fully realized orchestral experience, this exclusive sonic experience will be sent to you digitally as an uncompressed .wav file! 

ALL 488-PAGES ARE READY FOR PRESS! 

We just need your HELP to fund it!

This collection is going to be so big that if it were dropped from a window and it hit you in the head it would kill you. Of course, we do not recommend anyone doing that, but rather they enjoy reading this amazing piece of comics history we loved making so much.

So please join our crusade and harken back to the days when comics were fun and thought-provoking. We promise, the Shi: Omnibus Edition Vol.1 will not let you down!

So peace, love... comics! Thank you, Tucci Troopers! We are forever grateful for all your support and we are Shi-Strong!

ALL OMNIBUS EDITIONS WILL BE SHIPPED USPS PRIORITY MAIL FOR THE FASTEST AND MOST CONVENIENT DELIVERY!

story:
BATTLE BRICK ROAD is a 60 page FULL-COLOR graphic novel!

On a desperate search for her missing father, Thea Gale and her trusty protector drone, TOTO, descend into the bizarre world of Oz. Governed by four powerful robotic beings known as the Watchers, Oz is home to a vast assortment of genetic hybrids, roving androids, and a mysterious scarecrow on a quest for vengeance.

Can Thea form a team, find her father, and survive her journey down the battle brick road?

$10,000 UNLOCKED - Bookmark for all backers
$15,000 UNLOCKED - First trading card for all backers! THEA GALE
$25,000 UNLOCKED - Second trading card for all backers! SCARECROW
$35,000 UNLOCKED - Battle Brick Road PATCH!
$40,000- UNLOCKED - Book Quality Upgrade Heavier stock cover and paper!
$50,000 UNLOCKED - 8 Page TOTO Ashcan by Six AM Comics
$75,000 - UNLOCKED - Holographic Sticker for all backers!

$85,000 - UNLOCKED - Spot Gloss Cover Upgrade!
$100,000 - LOCKED - ?????

 



Thea Gale – Though Thea Gale was raised by her uncle and aunt in a world immersed in dust and gray, she has always possessed a knack for finding the color in life. In order to further her tireless obsession with finding her missing father Thea joined the United Defense Coalition where she excelled as a tactical strategist, proficient weapons handler, and unsurpassed computer hacker. Disenchanted by the UDC’s dictatorial methods, Thea left the military to pursue finding her father on her own terms.

TOTO – A loyal companion to the end, Target Objective Tactical Overwatch, or TOTO for short, was created by Thea’s father, Howard Gale. A veritable swiss-army knife, TOTO possesses various tools and weapons to meet almost every threat. Most importantly, TOTO was entrusted to protect Thea and act as a trusty sidekick through thick and thin.

Scarecrow – When an unquenchable obsession for vengeance goes unchecked for long enough a person tends to forget who they really are. Rumors have spread throughout OZ of a masked vigilante known as the Scarecrow. Consumed with destroying Watcher West, the Scarecrow is devastating with a scythe and even more deadly with his rifle.

Writer- Zeb Hatfield
Artist - Eric Weathers
Colorist - Vinicius Townsend
Letterer - Eric Weathers
Editor - Brandon Crowther

story:
The First JAWBREAKERS Solo Adventure!

KNIFE-HAND must rescue the JAWBREAKERS from a Death Trap inside a Floating Castle!

The Story

Knife-Hand is a mute ninja with the ability to generate energy blades from his hands that can cut through ANYTHING. As a boy, he was kidnapped and held for ransom...but his wealthy father refused to pay the kidnappers, so they sold him to a ninja clan. After years of brutal training, he stole the power of the Knife-Hand and went AWOL...searching for his father to get his revenge. But the ninja clan never stopped hunting for him, so he joined the JAWBREAKERS in order to use them as a gang to protect him. His disdain for his teammates is unknown to them. But as much as he hates them...he NEEDS them. So when the rest of the team is kidnapped, it is up to Knife-Hand to rescue them! 

 

The Creative Team

Story by Richard C. Meyer (IRON SIGHTS, PANdemIC, 499)

Art by Kenneth Loh (G.I.JOE)

 

The Book

  • 60+ Pages
  • Color
  • Squarebound Graphic Novel
  •  

 

The Content

The KNIFE-HAND: BLINDSPOT Graphic Novel contains:

  • KNIFE-HAND: BLINDSPOT (22-Page Main Story)
  • GARRISON (26-Page Backup Story)
  • ART GALLERY (Mock-Up Covers & Page Layouts)

 

 

The Inspiration

  • G.I.JOE #21 ("Silent Interlude")
  • METAL GEAR SOLID

 

 

GARRISON

What if G.I.JOE and COBRA teamed up to stop a terror attack by Al-Qaeda?

Story by Richard C. Meyer and Chuck Dixon (IMPOSSIBLE STARS)

Script by Chuck Dixon (BATMAN, G.I.JOE, PUNISHER: WAR ZONE)

Art by Sergio Cariello (BATMAN/WILDCAT, DEATHSTROKE)

 

KNIFE-HAND: BLINDSPOT Layouts

story:
EMPIRE COMICS presents the most anticipated graphic novel of the year...WRAITH OF GOD!

*MASSIVE 72+ PAGE GRAPHIC NOVEL PRICED AT WHAT OTHERS CHARGE FOR 48 pages!*

 

Hello readers and fans of great comics!  My name is Aaron Lopresti and I am a 30-year veteran of the comic book industry.  You may know me from my work on Marvel's PLANET HULK, X-MEN and MS. MARVEL or DC Comics' WONDER WOMAN and JUSTICE LEAGUE.  Now finally I am launching my own label and my own comics and I am inviting you to be a part of this inaugural voyage!  I am committed to bringing you the very best in comic book entertainment and I guarantee you won't be disappointed with WRAITH OF GOD!

-Aaron Lopresti

 

THE STORY:

In the American west of 1883, the WRAITH is a mysterious hero with a dark past who is relentlessly driven to administer the wrath of God on the evil supernatural forces that contaminate the land.   A master of illusion and disguise, the Wraith is aided by a former Salvation Army worker named Esther who frequently finds herself at odds with her mentor .  It's a race against time and death as together they try to stop a pack of werewolves from obtaining a mystical amulet that will make them invincible.  (72+ pages, full color)

 

Cover A by Aaron Lopresti

 

Cover B by Aaron Lopresti
 
Cover C by AARON LOPRESTI 
 
 

STORY PAGES 1-5

Pencils and Inks by Aaron Lopresti Colors by Gabe Eltaeb

 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Stretch Goal Esther Card by Aaron Lopresti
 
Limited Edition Mini-Print by Aaron Lopresti
 
Pre-Sign Up Limited Edition Trading Card by Aaron Lopresti
 
 

STRETCH GOALS

All Backers get these extras when we hit the goal numbers!

 

*$30,000-  UNLOCKED!  Every backer receives an EMPIRE COMICS sticker! 

*$40,000-  UNLOCKED!  Lopresti-verse retro editorial page with character value stamp added to the book!

*$50,000- UNLOCKED!   A special 3-page epilogue will be added to the story that connects Wraith of God with the rest of the Lopresti-verse!

*$60,000- UNLOCKED!  Every backer receives an all new collectible Esther card.

*$70,000 - UNLOCKED!  Every backer receives a limited edition signed mini-print previewing the next Wraith              adventure!

*$80,000 -UNLOCKED!  Every backer receives a set of stickers featuring the major characters from the Lopresti-verse.

*$90,000 - UNLOCKED!  Expanded Lopresti-verse sticker set (6 different stickers) with guest artists!

*$100,000 - UNLOCKED! Special Guest artist title page added to the book!

*$120,000 - Every backer receives an ace of spades Wraith of God playing card.

This book is not possible with out you the patrons who support the project.  You are as vital a component as the creative team.  Together we can ignite a new golden age of comics, with high quality stories and art that got you hooked on reading in the first place!  I guarantee the quality and I guarantee on time delivery- all you have to do is come along for the ride!  

 

ORIGINAL ART AVAILABLE  ON THE ART FOR SALE TIERS

ORIGINAL 9X12 KIT CARTER MARKER AND COLOR PENCIL SKETCH BY Aaron Lopresti

 

ORIGINAL 9X12 GARBAGE MAN MARKER AND COLOR PENCIL SKETCH by Aaron Lopresti

 

ORIGINAL 9X12 KIT CARTER MARKER AND COLOR PENCIL SKETCH by Aaron Lopresti

 

 

ORIGINAL WRAITH OF GOD MARKER SKETCH (11X17)

ORIGINAL ESTHER CARD ART (8.5X11)

ORIGINAL ART WRAITH OF GOD COVER C

Original Wraith of God Limited Edition Trading Card Art (8.5X11)

 

Original Wraith of God Limited Edition Mini Print Art (11X17)

 

Original Wraith of God Cover B art (11X17) (Title Logo and Empire Comics Logo can be added as a paste on if desired)

story:
Thomas Valiant is a Full Color 80 page, square bound, all ages, Graphic Novel with three chapters and one continuous story.

As a former soldier and a spy, Thomas Valiant was never fully trusted by his teammates in the Legion of Justice. So now, as Valiant seeks to create his own team out of misfits, mercenaries, and former villains, the Legion has decided that he and his new team are too much of a liability to leave alive. 

Our $15K Stretch Goal, for a FULL COLOR book, has been met!

Our $18K Stretch Goal, to increase the page count to 80, has been met!

Our $22K Stretch Goal, for all copies to be signed by the author, has been met!

Our $25K Stretch Goal, an Exclusive pinup poster by Nik Axe with every book, has been met!

Cover by Nik Axe - to be finished 

 

Pin-up - Valiant and his Team by Renzo Rodriguez 

 

Pin-up - The Legion of Justice by Renzo Rodriguez 

 

 

Formerly a member of the Legion of Justice, the hero once known as Putty Man has been cast aside by his mentor and branded a traitor by those he fought beside. But, gathering together his own team, he will prove to the world that he’s worthy of the title, Hero. 

 

 

Internal Pages by Renzo Rodriguez

 

 

For those of you who are familiar with my You Tube content, you will know that I love the idea of a traditional hero. And I believe that 1) stories should be told in the well worn methods developed over millennia, and 2) true quality and audience appeal come from this traditional method of storytelling and the presentation of a traditional hero. Therefore, what you see before you is my humble attempt to bring all of that to life. I have been blessed enough to find two artists that are as passionate about this kind of storytelling as I am, and, together, we present to you THOMAS VALIANT – a breakneck action/adventure about underdogs trying to live up to the ideals of being true heroes.

 

The Perks

Perks include:
1) 4 Pin-up posters - 3 by Renzo Rodriguez, 1 by Nik Axe (11" x 17")

2) Script (typos and all) detailing the world and book layout

3) Original art pages (Internal pages) from Renzo Rodriguez

4) Original Cover art from Nik Axe

4) Map of City (Rubicon City) the story takes place in (11" x 17")

5) Character Cards - 12 Pack

 

Pin-up - Phantasm by Nik Axe

 

Pin-up - Disk by Nik Axe (FREE WITH EVERY BOOK)

 

Pin-up - Phantasm by Renzo Rodriguez

 

Map by Patrick Benjamin (to be finished)

 

The Stretch Goals

Full Color Pages at $16 K - UNLOCKED!
Increased page count to a minimum 80 PAGES at $18K - UNLOCKED!
Signed copies of the book (by RJ Shaw) at $22K - SO Close
A free pinup poster by Nik Axe at $25K

 

Progress so far

Before even launching here’s what we have DONE
20 Internal Pages completed
COVER rough draft
4 Pin-Up posters drawn (1 colored so far)

 

Character sketch by Renzo Rodriguez

What you can do to help make this project a success

The #1 priority is to Get the Word Out about THOMAS VALIANT! Even if you are not able to support the project financially, you are essential in getting the word out to others, so please post a link to the project on your social media account(s). And for those who do order the book, remember that the more the project makes, the more stretch goals we meet, and so the more you get with your purchase.

 

 

Back of Front Cover by Renzo Rodriguez

 

FAQ

Q. Is the Graphic Novel Black and White?
A. If we hit our stretch goal of it will be colored

Q. Can I order the Pin-up’s, Map, or Cards separately?
A. All are available as Add-On Perks or upgrades for a standard perk that are available to backers when checking out.

Q. When can I expect my book to ship?
A. Our goal is to have your order shipped out by 12/2021.

 

More about the Artists

Visit Renzo @
https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=562157210
https://www.instagram.com/renzo_rodriguez_1979/
@renzo_rocomic on Twitter

 

Visit Nik Axe @
https://www.facebook.com/NikAxeArt
https://twitter.com/nik_axe
https://www.artstation.com/nik_axe
@nik_axe on Twitter

 

Color artist
2DSpaceMan - Paul Bilick
@PaulBilick
artstation.com/t2dspaceman

story:
DEADSKINS! 5 is a 48-page, perfect bound comic book collecting the fifth issue in the series critics call:

DEADSKINS! was the first graphic novel we ever created, and it was serialized on our website from 2013-2014. Issue 5 is the final issue in the series. 

In addition to the 35-page main story, we're re-presenting a six page short featuring our breakout characters Jack and Sylvia as well as some exclusive behind the scenes material.

We've completely remastered the book, darkening the lines to improve print quality and bring out the beauty of our black, white, and red production. And if you missed our last 2 campaigns, now you can get the whole series in one big pop! 

Variant Cover by Bryan Silverbax

Here's the pitch:

"A Harvard-educated dandy and his blind, drunk companion are all that stand between the Old West and an Undead Apocalypse. This is the true story of Custer's Last Stand... whatever they taught you in school is bullsh!t."

THE GALL-DANG PREVIEW (SPOILER ALERT!)

In the first issue, we met Shane, a Harvard dandy on his way back home to propose to his girlfriend. 

He falls asleep on the train, and when he wakes up, everyone else on board is dead:

When he gets to town, same story. Everyone's dead (or gone), except the town drunk and his, uh, "wife":

Together, they have to solve the mystery of what happened and why they were spared... and find Shane's missing girlfriend, Annie:

When word gets out that there's something special about our unlikely heroes, they're quickly drafted into a war they don't understand:

In our final issue, the sh!t hits the fan:

It's the big showdown between Shane and Custer: 

And the gang's all here for one last ride:

That's right! It all explodes in the moment you've been waiting for--the Battle of Little Bighorn:

So settle in for some weird western action!

If you're still not sold and want to read the first issue for free...

CLICK HERE TO JOIN OUR ONLINE LETTER COLUMN

NOTE ABOUT THE SLANG

DEADSKINS! takes place in the Wild West, and as such, some characters--particularly the villains--express attitudes that seem outdated today. We think our readers are smart enough to know that we aren't condoning these things, but we also know that in 2021, some people don't want to read about it. So: fair warning.

There's also donkey-f*cking.

FRIED Comics is a proud purveyor of offbeat, irreverent pulp fiction since 2013, and a labor of love for Clay Adams and Alexandre O. Philippe.

 

Clay is the co-writer of RED XMAS, which was released in comic shops this December by Scout Comics, and served as co-editor for the NIGHTMARE THEATER anthology on Kickstarter. His feature script, THE ECLIPSE, placed second in the horror category of the FADEIn Awards, and his latest comic, ELECTRIC YOUTH, co-written with Kyle Roberts, was recently featured in the LA Times. He has written and directed for television and holds a BFA in Dramatic Writing from NYU. When Clay first met Alexandre, he thought, "My, what a sophisticated European." Boy, was he wrong!

Film nerd/director Alexandre is the co-writer of RED XMAS from Scout Comics. His most recent documentary is LEAP OF FAITH: WILLIAM FRIEDKIN ON THE EXORCIST, now streaming on Shudder. He holds a Masters Degree in Dramatic Writing from NYU’s Tisch School of the Arts and has written and directed numerous award-winning films and documentaries, including MEMORY: THE ORIGINS OF ALIEN, 78/52: HITCHCOCK'S SHOWER SCENE, AND THE PEOPLE vs. GEORGE LUCAS. When Alexandre first met Clay, he thought, "My, what a stupid American." Boy, was he right!

Leila is a comic book artist and writer living in Portland, Oregon. She draws SLEEPLESS, SHUTTER and writes AFAR at Image Comics. Leila has drawn for titles such as THE WICKED + THE DIVINE, SCARLET WITCH, AMERICAN VAMPIRE, and THE PANTHEON PROJECT. In 2015 and 2016, Leila was nominated for the Russ Manning Promising Newcomer Award for her work on SHUTTER. She only took this job because she thought she'd be paid in fries.

Brett Nienburg is a Denver-based artist who has worked as a concept artist for LEGO and  designed sets for feature films. We're sorry we made him peel so many potatoes. He looks pretty sad about it.

Charles is from Canada, so we imagine he looks like one of those flappy-headed dudes from South Park.* He has lettered books for Aftershock, Image, IDW and Top Shelf (among others) and is a founding member of Frozen Beach Studios. (*As far as we know, Charles has a normal-looking head.)

Ugh. Just... ugh.

The Package

We've gotten our fair share of comics that arrived mangled by the mail carrier.

You pay premium prices on Kickstarter, and you deserve better. That's why we've started using Gemini Comic Mailers:

These babies are sturdy. They require a little more money, a little more time (and a lot more tape!) but it's worth it to make sure your comics arrive in pristine condition.

And if somehow your comic still gets roughed up?

Frieda will replace it free of charge.

WHY CROWDFUNDING?

Because it's the most direct pipeline to you, the readers. The book is 100% complete, our printer is still operating as an essential business, and we are ready to deliver quickly. We just need YOU to make it a reality.

All funds from this campaign will go to:

  • Printing rewards
  • Shipping them to you
  • Anything above our goal goes towards making more comics

THE TIMELINE

  • Book Goes to Printer: ~Nov 15
  • Digital Rewards Released: ~Dec 1
  • Book Printed and shipped to us ~Dec 15
  • "$#it happens" buffer - 1 month (~Jan 15)
  • Pack and ship - (~late Jan)
  • Expected delivery to US backers - 2 Weeks (late Jan)
  • Expected delivery for International Backers - 4 Weeks (early Feb)

THANKS, HON!

We're not asking for a million dollars. We just want to put a cool book in your hand and entertain you for a bit during these crazy times. So find a pledge level you like and pre-order. We'll make more comics.

Image copyright Can Stock Photo / pressmaster

Oh! And finally:

We heard somewhere that crowdfunding campaigns do better when they have pictures of cats on the page. So, here's a picture of Frieda's cat doing what he does best:

Thanks for supporting! And remember...

story:
64-Pages of Hilariously Bizarre Adventures
from Eisner Winning Writer Mike Baron!


Proudly printed in the good ol' U.S.A.!

LEGENDARY COMICS CREATOR MIKE BARON DELIVERS A RIOTOUSLY FUNNY, HEART-FELT, AND ULTIMATELY UPLIFTING STORY WITH HIS LATEST COMIC BOOK PROJECT 'FLORIDA MAN'

 


 

WHO IS FLORIDA MAN?

 

Gary Duba’s having a bad day. There’s a snake in his toilet, a rabid raccoon in the yard, and his gal Krystal’s in jail for getting naked at a Waffle Castle and licking the manager. Gary is just a southern redneck living in a trailer down by the swamp, but he’s got dreams, big dreams. But it seems like every time he tries to get ahead, fate deals him a low blow.

 

Then one day he gets lucky…

 


Along with his best friend, Floyd, Gary sets out to sell his prized Barry Bonds rookie card to raise the five hundred bucks needed for Krystal's bail, but like always, things find a way of getting out of hand. In fact, Duba's got a way of getting caught in all the wrong places.

We're Bringing Back Funny Books, Ya'll!


Pin-up by Joe Comstock

 


Pin-up by Barry McClain Jr. and colors by Ichsan Ansori

 


THE CREATIVE TEAM

Mike Baron is the renowned author of numerous novels and several comic books for both Marvel and DC (The Flash, Punisher, Star Wars), but he is perhaps best known for Nexus, his groundbreaking science fiction indie comic co-created with illustrator Steve Rude. Baron has also been honored with two Eisner Awards and an Inkpot Award for his work on Nexus, which has been published in five languages including French, Italian, Portuguese, and Spanish.

Baron's other creations include The Badger, Spyke, Feud, The Hook, and The Architect. Mike has even written for outlets like Creem, The Boston Globe, Isthmus, AARP Magazine, Oui, Madison, Fusion, Poudre Magazine, Argosy and many others.

 

 

 

Many brilliant artists have contributed their talents to this project -  including Joe Comstock, Pat Broderick, Brett R. Smith, Barry McClain Jr., Elias Martins, Marcelo Salaza and Todd Mulrooney (click their names to see their work)! We even have a few surprises in store for Mike Baron fans!

 

Ichsan Ansori is handling the interior colors. Ansori is an Indonesia native who attended the National Institute of Technology, Art and Design in Indonesia with a masters in digital coloring. 

 

Chris Braly is handling the editing and marketing chores. Chris has been involved with media and video production for the past twenty years and is an accomplished producer. He's taking care of the promotional and editorial duties on this project as a newbie, so be sure to direct all overlooked misspellings to him. He's also the Managing Editor of a geek culture internet journal known as Bleeding Fool.


 


 

THE GAME PLAN

We are striving to create a professional product and get it into the hands of comic book readers and retailers all across the globe!

 

And in an effort to blow away audience expectations, we plan to publish this as a premium square-bound book, using the best paper quality, and use the best possible cover stock to ensure a rigid, solidly crafted physical copy. Plus, we're proudly using a professional comics printer established and printing here in the good ol' U.S.A.

 

THE PERKS

The Florida Man graphic novel is just the beginning! Look for some neat add-on perks when you order your book so you can show off your Florida Man schwag even when you've had your book stolen by your ex! All these products can be found in the Add-On options after you select your perk near the bottom of the page . And some available tiers already include some of these items! You can even pick up an additional copy of the book for 20% off! Just look at the bottom of the 2nd page once you've selected your perk!


Retro Style Metal Lunchbox

 

Grab an exclusive Digital Copy of the Graphic Novel!

 

 

 

Official Florida Man T-Shirt

 

OUR MISSION

We want to entertain you. And we believe in providing solid, professional, funny comic books for everyone who loves comics. If you like humor comics, you're gonna enjoy this one.

We want to make you laugh and inspire you to share that enjoyment with others. If we can make that happen, we've accomplished our mission.

Help us bring back funny books ya'll!!

 

 

STRETCH GOALS!
 

$20,000 STRETCH GOAL *UNLOCKED*

TWO GRAPHIC NOVEL UPGRADES! We will be upgrading Florida Man from 56 pages to 64 pages! We’re also upgrading the interior pages from 70lb to 80lb. making it a notch above the rest! 

 

$30,000 STRETCH GOAL *UNLOCKED*

Florida Man Graphic Novel Upgrade #2 - interior pages will max out at the cherished 100lb paper stock!

 

$40,000 STRETCH GOAL *LOCKED*

Campaign EXCLUSIVE STICKERS for ALL BACKERS and a 2ND EXCLUSIVE POSTCARD!! All backers get an exclusive Florida Man decal, a Florida Man bookmark, and now 2 exclusive postcards! This will be an addition to every backer order, including any backers who ordered the Krystal Beach postcards set!

 

$50,000 STRETCH GOAL *LOCKED*

First round of BONU$E$ to the FLORIDA MAN creative team! Every $50k raised gives another round of bonuses! PLUS ALL BACKERS will get a set of 5 EXCLUSIVE FLORIDA MAN postcards – including the Krystal Beach Coppertone homage postcard!!

 

$60,000 STRETCH GOAL *LOCKED*

Florida Man Graphic Novel Upgrade #3 – Cover Paper Stock will be upgraded from 110lb to the coveted 130lb cover paper stock!

 

$75,000 STRETCH GOAL *LOCKED*

Florida Man Graphic Novel Upgrade #4 - interior pages increase from 64 pages to 80 pages at no additional cost to our readers!!

 

 

HOW YOU CAN HELP

Help us get the word out! Please share this campaign on as many social media platforms as possible. Check out our updates page to see how you can win the referrals contest by just sharing this campaign! Hop over to our Twitter or our Facebook page at Florida Man Comic and share it with your friends! This will help us get Florida Man into as many hands as possible. And even if you can't back the campaign financially today, we hope that you'll share this with others who can help!

 

Thanks, ya'll!

TWO GRAPHIC NOVEL UPGRADES! We will be upgrading Florida Man from 56 pages to 64 pages! We’re also upgrading the interior pages from 70lb to 80lb. making it a notch above the rest! 
 
$30,000 STRETCH GOAL *UNLOCKED*
Florida Man Graphic Novel Upgrade #2 - interior pages will max out at the cherished 100lb paper stock!
 
$40,000 STRETCH GOAL *LOCKED*
Campaign EXCLUSIVE STICKERS for ALL BACKERS and a 2ND EXCLUSIVE POSTCARD!! All backers get an exclusive Florida Man decal, a Florida Man bookmark, and now 2 exclusive postcards! This will be an addition to every backer order, including any backers who ordered the Krystal Beach postcards set!
 
$50,000 STRETCH GOAL *LOCKED*
First round of BONU$E$ to the FLORIDA MAN creative team! Every $50k raised gives another round of bonuses! PLUS ALL BACKERS will get a set of 5 EXCLUSIVE FLORIDA MAN postcards – including the Krystal Beach Coppertone homage postcard!!
 
$60,000 STRETCH GOAL *LOCKED*
Florida Man Graphic Novel Upgrade #3 – Cover Paper Stock will be upgraded from 110lb to the coveted 130lb cover paper stock!
 
$75,000 STRETCH GOAL *LOCKED*
Florida Man Graphic Novel Upgrade #4 - interior pages increase from 64 pages to 80 pages at no additional cost to our readers!!
 


 
HOW YOU CAN HELP
Help us get the word out! Please share this campaign on as many social media platforms as possible. Check out our updates page to see how you can win the referrals contest by just sharing this campaign! Hop over to our Twitter or our Facebook page at Florida Man Comic and share it with your friends! This will help us get Florida Man into as many hands as possible. And even if you can't back the campaign financially today, we hope that you'll share this with others who can help!
 
Thanks, ya'll!

story:
Welcome Indiegogo Backers to Charlie's London!

 

Delve into this unique 64 page graphic novel experience OFFICIALLY licensed by the Chaplin Estate! Learn the back story to one of the greatest rags to riches stories of our time!

 

 

As the world awaits the premiere of Charlie Chaplin's eagerly anticipated motion picture Limelight, the most famous comedian on the planet finds himself at a professional and emotional crossroad.

 

 

It's 1952 and the west is in the grip of social and political fear of Communism and the Red Scare, Hollywood finds itself in an uncomfortable spotlight that will cast a shadow on many names in the industry and many will never recover. Dogged by continuous accusation of Communist sympathies, Chaplin is informed that unless he declares his political leaning in front of HUAC (House of Un-American Activities Committee) he will not be allowed to return to the United States of America. 

 

 

All this and the fear of rejection on his home soil he finds the London streets of his youth are both a source of comfort and a painful reflection of a time once forgotten. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

With every step he remembers and with every step we see it with him! 

 

So, how did the harsh Dickensian streets of London help to shape one of the most iconic cinematic legends the world has ever seen?

 

 

With covers by V Tartamella, D DeLay and K Stephan and internal art by Micky and colours by InkSpots, this book is a must for film collectors and comic fans alike. 

 

 

A Story Within a Story.....

Chaplin's path crossed with many Hollywood greats! Buster Keaton, Marlon Brando and even Sophia Loren all shared the silver screen with our hero. However, one such name many people do not realise graced the music hall stages  with Chaplin was none other than, Stan Laurel of Laurel and Hardy fame!

 

Witness the developing friendship that flourished under the watchful eye of Fred Karno and his Fun Factory deep in the heart of Kennington, South London. Follow them as they perfect their craft upon the stages of Victorian London and the multitude of extravagant Vaudeville shows of their US tour. 

As Chaplin is wooed by the bright lights of America, Stan also finds his calling as an enigmatic but hapless part of a comedic double act. Sadly, the feeling is not mutual. Upon their return to London Charlie longs for the Transatlantic life he left behind as a solo star! These decisions made by both men would pave the way for the movie personas they would later carefully cultivate. 

Charlie and Stan: From Kennington to Keystone  expands the Chaplin story and incorporates another great of the Golden Age of cinema by the fantastic William Crawford Hazle, creator of Ailsa Dark Werewolves and Bampots!

The Covers!

 

 

  • Karl Stephan's, creator of Mary Boys brings the Tramp home and makes London town his playground in this stunning black and white cover.

 

  • Vinnie Tartamella brings the classic Tramp image together with the Victorian streets of his youth in this stunning colour variant. 

 

  • Donal DeLay gives us a beautiful young and vulnerable child Chaplin and his iconic tramp his ever-constant in the London rain. With Colours by Kyle Ritter, this cover is a totally different take on the Tramp we all know and love!

 

 

The Stretch Goals

 

5k: A postcard of Chaplin drawn and signed by me and stickers by SIX AM Comics

 

 

 

Hitting our funding goal

10k: All backers will receive Karl 'CHUBB' Stephan's beautiful cover as a virgin print

 

 

20K Stretch Goal!!!

Tramp Tales, created by Statistical Zero and Myself!

 

After much anticipation I can present to you little Buster, the Tramps loveable scamp sidekick in these original tales by myself and the FANTASTIC Statistical Zero! Buster is a loyal and loveable pooch who keeps his master safe and out of mischief (most of the time) and away from capers that will find him in a bit of bother! Every backer will now get to see all these stories and fall in love with these new Tramp Tales. 

 

                              

                         

                            

                               

                                 

 

30K stretch Goal!!!

This STUNNING colourisation print of the incredible cover by Karl Stephan done by the amazing Ink Spots is available to ALL backers!! Thank you for making Charlie's London a HUGE success so far and we are LESS than a week in!!!

 

 

35K Stretch Goal!

A stunning trading card of the mesmerising opening page of the incredible 'Limelight' image by our main content artist Micky! 

 

50K Stretch Goal!

EVERYONE gets the book again, in a mini 'Silent Edition' format, with no words and random title cards with an incredible new cover by our very own Peter Gilmore!

 

 

Dont forget!

 

This book is OFFICIALLY licensed by the Chaplin Estate and I am thoroughly excited to bring it to life for you all!

 

Thank you for backing and I hope you enjoy the project!

 

 

 

All photographs from Chaplin films made from 1918 onwards © Roy Export S.A.S. All Rights Reserved.
CHARLIE CHAPLIN, the LITTLE TRAMP, certain images on this web site, and the names of some of Mr. Chaplin's films are trademarks and/or service marks of Roy Export and/or Bubbles Inc. S.A. All Rights Reserved.
